I like how easy it is to identify if gluten free. Unfortunately, I am finding a fair amount of stuff that doesn't register. Hopefully they will expand their data base because I really like the functionality of this app.
It almost never finds the product. Unless it's a very common item. I thought the whole point was to be able to scan any item and see if it's gluten free. Oh well it was worth a try.

I have only just started using the app, overall, I am very pleased. I would like it better if, when ingredients tiles are shown, that you could click that tile and find out what ingredient name is being used Which type of nut, or what chemical name they are usung for an animal product . For example, Nutty Bars, your scan indicates meat or fish. I can't tell which ingredient that is and I would like to know so I won't be fooled again!

title: ¬°Bueno para Mi! (Alergia | Intolerancia)
description:
IMPORTANTE:Solo para productos de venta en Espa√±a (no es un fallo que no reconozca los de otros pa√≠ses)

A menudo para las personas con restricciones alimentarias* les resulta bastante complicado localizar qu√© productos pueden consumir de forma segura,¬°Bueno para M√≠! ha sido creado por personas que sufren estas problem√°ticas y necesitan una soluci√≥n que les ayude eficazmente en su d√≠a a d√≠a.

*¬øRestricci√≥n alimentaria? APLV, Alergia alimentaria, intolerancia a lactosa, celiaqu√≠a, vegetariano, vegano, aceite de palma...

En Espa√±a desde 2011 existe un reglamento que obliga a los fabricantes a indicar claramente en el etiquetado de los alimentos la presencia de 14 al√©rgenos,no hay mejor manera de saber si un producto contiene estos al√©rgenos qu√© leer el etiquetado,entonces ¬øpor qu√© existe ¬°Bueno para M√≠!?

Hay necesidades m√°s all√° del reglamento,que ¬°Bueno para M√≠! se esfuerza en cubrir:

TRAZAS:El reglamento NO OBLIGA a declarar las trazas en los productos.Saber si la empresa que fabrica el producto ‚Äúremite a etiquetado" (identifica la presencia de trazas) es vital. ¬°Bueno para M√≠! facilita esta informaci√≥n

IDENTIFICAR al√©rgenos ‚Äúno oficiales‚Äù:Existen muchas alergias no cubiertas por el reglamento,los fabricantes no marcan estos ingredientes,adem√°s pueden encontrarse ‚Äúescondidos‚Äù detr√°s de t√©rminos t√©cnicos.¬°Bueno para M√≠! identifica m√°s de 50 al√©rgenos (y aumentando)

LOCALIZAR qu√© comprar:Planificar antes de ir al super es una labor compleja cuando la √∫nica forma de saber si puedes consumir algo es teniendo el envase en las manos.¬°Bueno para M√≠! Incluye un buscador de productos que adem√°s de generar un listado,marca los productos en colores seg√∫n tus necesidades.

AGILIZAR la compra:la obligaci√≥n de leer la composici√≥n de los productos suele hacer interminables las compras en el super,poder descartar r√°pidamente un producto si no es apto acelera enormemente el proceso.¬°Bueno para M√≠! solo necesita enfocar el c√≥digo de barras para decirte si no lo puedes consumir

AHORRAR:como consecuencia de poder buscar c√≥modamente en casa productos "normales" aptos para nosotros,disminuye la necesidad de comprar productos "especiales" (siempre m√°s caros)de este modo podemos ahorrar en nuestra compra

INFORMACI√ìN de fabricante: acceder r√°pidamente a la informaci√≥n que te pueda facilitar el fabricante puede ser la diferencia entre poder o no consumir un producto.En particular muchos fabricantes de chuches no est√°n obligados a etiquetar sus productos(la normativa exime a envases muy peque√±os),incluso pueden no llevar c√≥digo de barras.¬°Bueno para M√≠! te facilita el acceso a las tablas de al√©rgenos de las marcas en sus web (si est√°n disponibles)

¬øEs gratis? ¬øPorqu√©?
¬°Bueno para M√≠! es un esfuerzo de un padre para con su hija, y una forma de colaborar con la gente que tiene restricciones alimentarias. Los pilares b√°sicos de esta iniciativa:

GRATUITA: Suficiente lastre tenemos ya con nuestras restricciones como para pagar por algo indispensable.

AN√ìNIMA: No necesita registro, an√≥nimamente es 100% funcional.

SOCIAL: Si tienes un producto nuevo, modificado o con errores puedes enviar un aviso y/o informaci√≥n. 

NO HAY ALERGIA PEQUE√ëA: Si podemos detectar el al√©rgeno lo incluimos.

Para finalizar, los "n√∫meros":
- Reconoce el 90% de los c√≥digos escaneados.
- EAN: 160.000 diferentes, 85.000 alimentarios. 
- Detecta: Aceite de palma, Acido benzoico, Aditivos, Almendra, Altramuz, Anacardo, Anisakis, Apio, Aroma, Arroz, Asma, Avellana, Beb√©, Budista, Cacahuete, Cacao, Casta√±a, Cereal, Coco, Crust√°ceo, Embarazada, Especia, Fenilalanina, Fibra, Flatulencia, Fresa, Fructosa, Fruta, Frutos con c√°scara, Frutos rojos, Gelatina, Glucosa, Gluten, Guisante, Haram, Hind√∫, Hiperactividad, Huevo, Kiwi, Lactosa, Leche, Legumbre, Lenteja, Lino, LTP, Ma√≠z, Marisco, Melocot√≥n, Mercurio, Molusco, Mostaza, Ni√±o, Nuez, Pescado, Pi√±√≥n, Pistacho, Pl√°tano, Ros√°cea, S√©samo, Soja, Sorbitol, Sulfito, Taref, Tomate, Trigo, Vegano, Vegetariano, Verduras, Vit.D, Vit.E, Yuca.
descriptionHTML:
IMPORTANTE:Solo para productos de venta en Espa√±a (no es un fallo que no reconozca los de otros pa√≠ses)

A menudo para las personas con restricciones alimentarias* les resulta bastante complicado localizar qu√© productos pueden consumir de forma segura,¬°Bueno para M√≠! ha sido creado por personas que sufren estas problem√°ticas y necesitan una soluci√≥n que les ayude eficazmente en su d√≠a a d√≠a.

*¬øRestricci√≥n alimentaria? APLV, Alergia alimentaria, intolerancia a lactosa, celiaqu√≠a, vegetariano, vegano, aceite de palma...

En Espa√±a desde 2011 existe un reglamento que obliga a los fabricantes a indicar claramente en el etiquetado de los alimentos la presencia de 14 al√©rgenos,no hay mejor manera de saber si un producto contiene estos al√©rgenos qu√© leer el etiquetado,entonces ¬øpor qu√© existe ¬°Bueno para M√≠!?

Hay necesidades m√°s all√° del reglamento,que ¬°Bueno para M√≠! se esfuerza en cubrir:

TRAZAS:El reglamento NO OBLIGA a declarar las trazas en los productos.Saber si la empresa que fabrica el producto ‚Äúremite a etiquetado" (identifica la presencia de trazas) es vital. ¬°Bueno para M√≠! facilita esta informaci√≥n

IDENTIFICAR al√©rgenos ‚Äúno oficiales‚Äù:Existen muchas alergias no cubiertas por el reglamento,los fabricantes no marcan estos ingredientes,adem√°s pueden encontrarse ‚Äúescondidos‚Äù detr√°s de t√©rminos t√©cnicos.¬°Bueno para M√≠! identifica m√°s de 50 al√©rgenos (y aumentando)

LOCALIZAR qu√© comprar:Planificar antes de ir al super es una labor compleja cuando la √∫nica forma de saber si puedes consumir algo es teniendo el envase en las manos.¬°Bueno para M√≠! Incluye un buscador de productos que adem√°s de generar un listado,marca los productos en colores seg√∫n tus necesidades.

AGILIZAR la compra:la obligaci√≥n de leer la composici√≥n de los productos suele hacer interminables las compras en el super,poder descartar r√°pidamente un producto si no es apto acelera enormemente el proceso.¬°Bueno para M√≠! solo necesita enfocar el c√≥digo de barras para decirte si no lo puedes consumir

AHORRAR:como consecuencia de poder buscar c√≥modamente en casa productos "normales" aptos para nosotros,disminuye la necesidad de comprar productos "especiales" (siempre m√°s caros)de este modo podemos ahorrar en nuestra compra

INFORMACI√ìN de fabricante: acceder r√°pidamente a la informaci√≥n que te pueda facilitar el fabricante puede ser la diferencia entre poder o no consumir un producto.En particular muchos fabricantes de chuches no est√°n obligados a etiquetar sus productos(la normativa exime a envases muy peque√±os),incluso pueden no llevar c√≥digo de barras.¬°Bueno para M√≠! te facilita el acceso a las tablas de al√©rgenos de las marcas en sus web (si est√°n disponibles)

¬øEs gratis? ¬øPorqu√©?
¬°Bueno para M√≠! es un esfuerzo de un padre para con su hija, y una forma de colaborar con la gente que tiene restricciones alimentarias. Los pilares b√°sicos de esta iniciativa:

GRATUITA: Suficiente lastre tenemos ya con nuestras restricciones como para pagar por algo indispensable.

AN√ìNIMA: No necesita registro, an√≥nimamente es 100% funcional.

SOCIAL: Si tienes un producto nuevo, modificado o con errores puedes enviar un aviso y/o informaci√≥n.

NO HAY ALERGIA PEQUE√ëA: Si podemos detectar el al√©rgeno lo incluimos.

Para finalizar, los "n√∫meros":
- Reconoce el 90% de los c√≥digos escaneados.
- EAN: 160.000 diferentes, 85.000 alimentarios.
- Detecta: Aceite de palma, Acido benzoico, Aditivos, Almendra, Altramuz, Anacardo, Anisakis, Apio, Aroma, Arroz, Asma, Avellana, Beb√©, Budista, Cacahuete, Cacao, Casta√±a, Cereal, Coco, Crust√°ceo, Embarazada, Especia, Fenilalanina, Fibra, Flatulencia, Fresa, Fructosa, Fruta, Frutos con c√°scara, Frutos rojos, Gelatina, Glucosa, Gluten, Guisante, Haram, Hind√∫, Hiperactividad, Huevo, Kiwi, Lactosa, Leche, Legumbre, Lenteja, Lino, LTP, Ma√≠z, Marisco, Melocot√≥n, Mercurio, Molusco, Mostaza, Ni√±o, Nuez, Pescado, Pi√±√≥n, Pistacho, Pl√°tano, Ros√°cea, S√©samo, Soja, Sorbitol, Sulfito, Taref, Tomate, Trigo, Vegano, Vegetariano, Verduras, Vit.D, Vit.E, Yuca.
summary: Analyzes allergy, intolerance and restrictions on food ingredients.

comments: Me encanta, el codigo de barras es buen√≠simo tiene una cantidad de productos incre√≠ble en su base de datos de distintas marcas blancas de supermercados y marcas en general. Super visual si eliges u tipo de alerta (lactosa por ejemplo) te saca en rojo si el producto escaneado lo tiene como ingrediente. De verdad muy muy √∫til tanto si tienes alergias o intolerancia como si quieres realmente saber que contiene lo que comes y no tienes una lupa a mano! Ademas te saca los productos relacionados pero en "bueno para mi", por ejemplo un pan de molde sin aceite de palma. Me encanta y lo estoy recomendando a mi grupo de intolerancia

Fant√°stico, tiene un mont√≥n de productos (la mayor√≠a de los que he probado) y ofrece un mont√≥n de informaci√≥n, incluso te explica para qu√© sirven los aditivos.  Imprescindible para gente con intolerancias. Por sacarle alg√∫n defecto, la interfaz no es de lo m√°s bonito, pero merece la pena.
No funciona

title: Fooducate - Eat better. Lose weight. Get healthy.
description:
Lose weight and keep it off. Eat tasty, healthy, real food. Track your calories, macros, and workouts. Get motivation from the most supportive community in the world. 

Fooducate is the only app that analyzes and recommends foods based on their ingredient quality. No more tricks by sneaky food manufacturers!

THE BEST NUTRITION & HEALTH TRACKER
+ A meal tracker and so much more
+ Track your food intake and exercise 
+ Track the quality of calories
+ Track your macros: protein, fats, carbs

HUGE FOOD DATABASE
+ Scan over 250,000 product barcodes 
+ Get a personalized nutrition grade (A, B, C, or D) for each food
+ Get suggestions for healthier foods based on what you scan

THE BEST DIET TIPS
+ Free health & diet tips from nutrition professionals
+ Free weight loss tips
+ Motivation, love & support from the community

FOODUCATE TEACHES YOU TO EAT FOR HEALTH!
Fooducate analyzes information found in product nutrition panels and ingredient lists. Scan to discover things manufacturers don't want you to notice:
- added sugars
- artificial sweeteners such as aspartame
- trans fats 
- high fructose corn syrup 
- MSG
- controversial food colorings 
- GMO - genetical modified organisms (premium feature) 
- additives and preservatives 
- and more... 

THE BEST WEIGHT LOSS APP
‚Ä¢ 1st prize - US Surgeon General's Healthy App Challenge 
‚Ä¢ Featured multiple times on the Google Play store
‚Ä¢ Media praise: USAToday, NYTimes, Dr. Oz, Oprah, WSJ, ABC, FOX,. . . 
‚Ä¢ Recommended by doctors, dietitians, fitness trainers, and your friends 

PERSONALIZE FOODUCATE
- age, gender,weight, height, activity level
- desired weight loss rate
- carb control
- health conditions (low cholesterol, pregnancy,...)
- dietary goals (non processed foods, vegetarian)
- avoid MSG, HFCS, GMOs and other ingredients
- Gluten free and other allergens
(Note: some personalization features require a premium account)

IN-APP PURCHASES
Get the most out of Fooducate with these premium features:

* Pro
‚Äî> Low-carb diet
‚Äî> Keto
---> Paleo
----> Mediterranean diet
‚Äî> GMO warnings
‚Äî> Priority support
‚Äî> No ads.

* Gluten & Allergies
‚Äî> Gluten-free diet
‚Äî> Uncover gluten and allergens in your food
‚Äî> Choose allergen free alternatives
‚Äî> Includes gluten, milk, lactose, soy, peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, and shellfish
‚Äî> Priority support. 

* Diet Kickstart
‚Äî> 10 day plan to help you get started with weight loss

* Pet Food 
‚Äî> choose the healthiest food for your dog and cat

developerAddress: Hamelacha 8, Netanya, Israel (4250543)
recentChanges:
* You can now log your food servings in either servings (i.e. 1 cup) or measurements (i.e. 230 milliliters).
* A few bug fixes.
comments: This is such a great idea, and I can see the developers are really putting their hearts and souls into this. Unfortunately, the mobile app component doesn't quite work the way I would like it to, and maybe that's just me. 1) I spent an hour exploring the features and how to do everything, and there were just way too many rabbit holes I fell into - oops, that didn't do quite what I thought it would - backtrack, start over. I would like to see more simplicity. 2) I'm disappointed you have to get the app to get the Health Tracker feature. I can see the benefit of being able to gather information on the fly without having to visit your desktop computer, but when there's a lot of typing involved (for searches and such) it would be nice to be able to manage that date from my desktop computer. 3) When I first signed up for this, I envisioned a tracking feature that, once I entered everything I ate on a given day, would give me a summary of all the nutrients included in all I ate that day. I only found calories, fats, carbs, and [some other thing I can't remember now]. You can make that a pro feature, but I did not see where you have done this. 4) I would have strongly considered the Pro version if it included a "low fat" profile.

On Android, when you click Contact Us, it gives me options to share content via other apps?? No info on how to contact the Devs about issues. Also, if I scan a barcode that's not in the system, it asks me to take 3 pictures. After I do, I get the same issue as the Contact Us button, with a pop up to share content. So I can only add food by searching for it and clicking add food at the bottom of the screen. Otherwise the app is good. The UI could be cleaned up a bit, but I'm happy with it so far.

I thought this app was a really great idea and I still think it is but it doesn't seem like anybody is really putting any work into it there's a lot of good foods out there that they're saying is bad for no good reason they're foods out there that are slightly processed or have a little bit of added sugar that are way better than a lot of other things but they're going to make you think that it's not good because it's slightly processed. processed doesn't mean bad

It wouldn't keep my manual changes to calories and target date, etc. When I went to "contact us," it kept taking me to a quick share option that didn't provide me with any email or other form of contact information. Very frustrating

Such a great app not only for tracking my food, but also for finding better options when it comes to some foods. I love that you can scan the barcode on a package (most packages) and get a letter grade and explanation for it's grade (whether it's preservatives, added sugar, etc). And as mentioned, it will offer alternatives to the scanned item so that you might be able to find a similar but healthier option. I do pay for premium now but even before that I found the app immensely helpful shopping

title: World Dairy Expo
description:
Make the most of the first week of October at World Dairy Expo in Madison, Wisconsin. Download the app that will help you efficiently explore the 850-company Trade Show with a plan, schedule face-to-face meetings with these exhibitors or build a custom itinerary of educational events and more. Create a free user account or log in with Facebook to unlock all features. 

Interactive Features:
-	Schedule: Favorite your must-see events happening during World Dairy Expo to build your own custom schedule. Choose from the list of public meetings, breed shows, Expo Seminars, Virtual Farm Tours, Knowledge Nook Sessions, Dairy Forage Seminars, youth contests and networking events. Truly capitalize on your time at World Dairy Expo with this scheduling tool.
-	Exhibitor Connect: Create a QR code as unique as you! Answer a few questions to generate a free account within the app or log in with Facebook to create a personalized QR code that Trade Show exhibitors can scan for an efficient way to enter you in drawings, giveaways and future promotions. No more wasting time filling out paper contact cards at every booth!
-	Trade Show Search: Search for specific companies or products in the Trade Show to discover where they are located and find company contact information. Select your favorite companies and see their booth light-up in the interactive maps to help chart your course.
-	Maps: Travel through the world‚Äôs largest dairy-focused Trade Show with interactive maps that include features for favoriting and meeting scheduling. 
-	Meeting Scheduling: Be sure the expert you are looking for is available when you arrive at a booth by scheduling a meeting with them. Located within the Trade Show Search and Maps pages, users may select a company name or booth location and request meetings with representatives. Look for the red ‚Äúrequest meeting‚Äù button after you select a company.  

Special Features for Trade Show exhibitors:
-	Easy lead retrieval: WDE Trade Show exhibitors can scan attendee QR codes within the app to collect basic contact and demographic information and take notes specific to that attendee. All collected information may then be exported from the exhibitor account on the WDE website for easy post-show follow-up.
-	Meeting Schedule: Schedule face-to-face meetings with producer attendees through the app. Your company‚Äôs WDE website admin is able to build a schedule of available meeting times during the show, that will be visible to attendees to request a meeting with your company. This feature also allows exhibitors to send meeting attendees private messages, take private notes and ask additional company-specific demographic questions within the app platform.

title: WWDiary
description:
I wrote this application because I started doing Weight Watchers with my wife.

Free base app features:
* Food tracker
* Weight tracker
* Supports new & old systems
* Food calculators
* Activity calculators
* Daily allowance calculators
* Favorites
* Widgets

Subscription features:
* Multi-device and forum sync
* Weight-loss progress chart in your forum profile
* Edit, add, and delete weight-log entries from the forum, have changes sync to your phone
* Simple device changing, no more swapping sdcards, simply sync the data down to your new device!
* Barcode searching for nutrition information!
* More to come!

This program is highly configurable and can be made to work with almost any point program!  Try it out and post feedback on the forum to help make it better for everyone!

IMPORTANT!
All support provided through the forum, please post problems there.  I cannot respond to comments in the market.

By using this program you agree that I am not responsible for any of your problems :)

I am not affiliated with Weight Watchers

recentChanges: Update to fix sync/backup/restore on new devices.
comments: This could be super useful, but it isn't because accessing the database requires a subscription. Having a subscription requires having an account on the Forum, and form registration has been disabled. I've written to the developer several times and got no response. I would love to use the features of this app, but it seems to have been abandoned! Maybe this will catch the developer's attention. If I can get a subscription and access all the features, I might change this to a 5-star review!
This may work for other people, but I found it strangely hard to use. You can save "favorites", but there is no way to just add something you eat from your favorites to your day.

I've been using this app off and on since 2006. I lost 138lbs in just over a year, and I couldn't have done it without this app! It is very simple, has a built in food calculator and is very user friendly.
Easy to use..you need to take the time to put in nutrition info on foods you eat, but if you save to favorites you wont have to put info in again.
I absolutely love this app! I have downloaded it a couple times, in different devices and it is always a joy to interact with. Highly recommended!

title: Dining Note - Simple food diary
description:
Let's start a good eating habit by writing the food you eat every day.
You can also write a simple diary with who, when, and where you ate.

Feature
1. Write breakfast, lunch and dinner.
2. Write snack, coffee and water, number of drinking.
3. Write exercise.
4. Photo attachment.
5. Password setting.
6. A variety color theme.
7. A simple monthly statistics UI.

developerAddress: 2001-7, 234, Beotkkot-ro, Geumcheon-gu, Seoul, South Korea
recentChanges: Apostrophe bug fixed.
comments: It is really simple to use and let's you add all the info you want to. Which most apps don't. However, one thing that is a bit Irish is the drinks and snack sections. Seeing as the snack section has the water and coffee in it, And that's it!!! (No squash, juice, tea...) I presume the drinks section is for alcohol?!? It doesn't really make sense. Either the snack section is for snacks and the drink section for drinks or add a drink tick chart in each section. With breakfast, lunch, dinner...

Simple entry food diary, not for tracking calories. Good for people who eat out and have drinks and want to keep track of those things. I like it just for the purpose of remembering what I consume and being able to look back on the day to reflect on what I need to add to or omit from my diet.

Great app if you want something very simple and clean to log your meals on. No calorie counting. No portions to enter. No searching a database to find the right food.... just type it in and go. Its exactly what I needed to help me log and commit my meals for bright line eating on the go.

Nice and simple... I usually make mine into bullets for easier review (simple enough to do oneself), but I'd love if there were a way to either review or download each day of logs. The app works perfectly for my purposes right now, but if working with a nutritionist or something, being able to send the info for a day, a week, etc would be a huge assist, even if it were just some kind of full-day review screen that I could screen shot. Otherwise, no complaints, aside from the annoying addsüòâ

I love it! It's so simple. Other apps count down your calories and that makes for anxiety. This just allows you to write anything you want in the notes field. Some days I track veggies, others calories, still others protein. It's so simple and this, so versatile.

title: VEGAN PLUS - Vegan Recipes, Scanner, Restaurants
description:
VEGAN PLUS FREE APP FEATURES :

‚òÖ VEGAN RECIPICES : All recipes are completely vegan recipes, free of dairy, meat and animal products.
These healthy cooking recipes apps teach you how to prepare your healthy dishes in the right way so that every one enjoy the pleasure of tasty vegan health recipes without complaining about the bad taste of the vegetables recipe and make your food tasty and yummy.
Healthy vegan recipes always starts with healthy active ingredients. For excellent wellness of the body requires eatingwell. The food you prepare must contain all the crucial nutrients. Healthy easy recipes should include a lot of veggies and fruits.

‚òÖ VEGAN BARCODE SCANNER : Most of the products you buy have chemical compounds on them.
What are they made of? well with this app you will be able to find out.
Ingredients in your products may be of different origins animal, vegetal, mineral.
But the ingredient's names are not always clear about what is the origin of this chemical.
When you are a vegan you need to be sure before buying your products. You need to make sure that the origin it's not animal.
This app lets you find the ingredient and find out if it is vegan or not super quick and learn about what is it made of.
Simply scan the UPC bar code on the package of any food or beverage product, and you'll see.


‚òÖ FIND VEGAN RESTARANTS : Vegan Restaurants near of you, vegan restaurant app guide map. ( coming up feature ).

comments: It's a pretty good app, I'm going vegan and this makes it really easy to find good recipes and to know what is vegan at the market and at your house.üëç

This app literally contain all I need as vegan, scanner to scan barcode of products before I buy them, recipes to make delicious food at home. now I feel more vegan and more proud about that than anytime before. Good job guys!
Needs more better updates. Recipes look delicious. Scanner barely works.
Not enough stuff scanned yet, went shipping with my wife and I'd dudnt recognize 90% of products. YET! I'm sure in time it will catch up, will try again in month or two.
I don't know if I'm doing something wrong but there aren't enough recipes. I mean the recipes they have look really good but they're really not enough.

title: Diaro - Diary, Journal, Mood Tracker with Lock
description:
Diaro is a multi-platform diary, journal, notes & mood tracker, designed to record your activities, events, appointments, experiences, thoughts, feelings, ideas & secrets  throughout the day & sync data across all your devices & PC.
It helps you organise your daily journal entries, notes from the past in the easiest way. Preserve your special memories, store personal moments & memories or keep track of your life with help of Diaro üéâüéäü•≥. 


‚≠ê Diaro - Diary Journal Notes Mood Tracker features: ‚≠ê

üîí SECURE & PRIVATE
Lock & Protect your private diary entries with a PIN, Security code or fingerprint. Protect Privacy with data encryption & passcode 

üé® THEMES & LANGUAGES
Personalize UI with different UI colors & Themes. Multilingual UI(35+ languages), adapted for phones, tablets & web. Simple & intuitive interface for your diary

üîé SEARCH & ORGANIZE
Powerful search & filter functions. Organize diary/ journal entries using folders, tags, locations & find records by keyword, filter them by date, tags, folder or even location 

üòç MOOD TRACKER, ATLAS & THROWBACK
Daily Diary Mood tracker, On this day diary memories/ daily diary throwback, Weather info & beautiful Atlas view

üì≤ BACKUP & RESTORE
Backup diary entries for easy recovery & restore easily 

üìÉ IMPORT & EXPORT
Export to PDF, Docx or Txt & print or share them via Diaro Android or Diaro Online (PDF, DOCX, CSV & TXT).
Import data from other popular diary apps : Journey, Evernote, Google Keep, Momento, Day One, Memorize, Diarium, Universum

‚òÅÔ∏è SYNC
Diaro is truly multi-platform. Using Dropbox you can seamlessly sync between the Diaro app on all of your devices & Diaro Online using any web browser at diaroapp.com 

üìä STATISTICS
Detailed interesting statistics about your diary entries & mood 

‚ù§Ô∏è OTHER FEATURES 
‚Ä¢ Cloud storage & Sync 
‚Ä¢ Automatic geotagging for new diary entries
‚Ä¢ Calendar view for easy navigation & overview of diary entries
‚Ä¢ Attach & store unlimited amount of photos in your diary  
‚Ä¢ Share diary entries & photos via Email, SMS, Twitter, Whatsapp etc.
‚Ä¢ Quickly create a new diary entry from the notification bar icon or widget
‚Ä¢ Multi-window mode
‚Ä¢ Swipe between your diary entries 
‚Ä¢ Speak to write, Voice to text
‚Ä¢ Collage maker, Powerful Image Editor, Stickers 
‚Ä¢ Text Recognition (OCR) 
‚Ä¢ Detailed statistics
‚Ä¢ Mood Tracker
‚Ä¢ Media gallery
‚Ä¢ Templates 

DIARO Premium üëë
‚Ä¢ Sync your diary across all your Devices & Diaro Online using Dropbox 
‚Ä¢ Export to PDF & other formats
‚Ä¢ Ad-Free Experience
‚Ä¢ Priority Customer Support

ABOUT DIARO
Diaro is the smart, intuitive & most secure way to keep a personal diary. Download now for free & keep your secret diary, diet diary logs, travel diary with stories, sleep journal, photos & maps , wish lists, daily expenses, autobiography or daily life diary notes as a book securely.  You can organize your receipts, invoices, or use it as a homework tracker or assignment planner, organizer, notebook or as simple note-taking app/ notepad. Keep A Beautiful, Orderly & Private Journal Of Your Thoughts & Days With Diaro!  Diaro is the best Diary with lock/ password protection to keep your data secure.

Diaro can easily be used as a classic diary, travel journal, mood tracker, notepad, business planner, expense tracker, mood diary, love diary, baby diary, mother dairy, daily diary, pregnancy diary, work diary or even as a diet journal. Diaro as a great universal diary - create agendas, write memos, make notes, write a memoir or a daily gratitude journal. 

LEARN MORE
‚Ä¢ Facebook: facebook.com/diaroapp
‚Ä¢ F.A.Q.: diaroapp.com/faq
‚Ä¢ Blog: diaroapp.com/blog
‚Ä¢ Web: diaroapp.com

 Find the FAQs in the Help & Support or contact us at support@diaroapp.com

recentChanges: Diaro is now more fun with an integrated Collage maker & a powerful image editor. Combine photos with amazing layouts into beautiful collages. Pick the layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, frame, text & much more.
comments: Great app - been using it since 2012, and been a PRO user for a large chunk of that time. Love especially being able to use it both on my phone and in browser - can obviously type faster on the computer, although I do find the mobile interface faster. Today the website seems to not be loading tags or folders, but hoping that's a temporary issue! Edit: all working now, thanks!

I've been trying many journaling and diary apps in search of one that suits my needs. Being able to create different color coded sections with tags, entry dates, weather, and even a map of where I wrote the entry was really cool. It took me a little while to get used to it, but I did and I really like it. I need to keep track of many different things, and Diaro has been working the best for me. I love that Diaro backs up to Dropbox and synchs with all of my devices.

I have been a user of this app since 2015. What makes this app better than its many competitors is its excellent customer service! If you send them an email with a concern, they are on top of it with a quick response with a fix or to inform you that their working on it expediently yet apologetically. Great group of support staff!

I don't usually leave reviews, but this app is one of the exceptions. I really love writing and so I went to look for an app where I can pour all my ideas into. I found this app and I really loved it. The word count, folders, fonts and size adjustments are amazing. I find writing with this app really comfortable. Definitely would recommend.

A great electronic diary. After hand writing a daily diary for 30 years I finally went electronic in 2018. I love this app. It's really easy to use and backs up to Dropbox efficiently every night. The ability to save your diary into a Word document is brilliant. Wish there was the facility on the app to get a year's diary printed into a book professionally. That's the only thing I'd add. Addendum: I've been using this for two years. I still love it. It's never failed me!

title: Biteappy: Allergy Diet Eating
description:
‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô is the app for people with dietary intolerances and allergies who want to search for and locate suitable eateries and restaurants in their area ‚Äì on a worldwide basis.

With such a large range of food allergies, intolerances and special dietary requirements across the world, it can be almost impossible for people to find a restaurant, eatery or bar to cater for their diet or allergy.

Whether you are a vegan with gluten intolerance or someone following a strict kosher diet that wants to avoid MSG, Biteappy will allow you to search for and find the restaurant you need to cater for your dietary needs in just a few taps!
No more searching the Internet and calling restaurants to make sure they cater for your special diet or food allergy.

ALL DIETARY ALLERGIES & INTOLERANCES

Biteappy is the first and only worldwide app to comprehensively address the entire plethora of dietary issues and allergies including gluten free for coeliac, dairy free if you are lactose intolerant, nut free, MSG free, preservative free and other more specific ingredient-free requirements, such as celery or mustard.

The app caters for all special dietary requirements including Vegan, Vegetarian, Paleo, Gluten Free Kosher and Halal.

Don‚Äôt worry if you suffer from multiple food allergies and intolerances our search engine will allow you to select as many as you like no matter what your special diet requirements are.

HOW IT WORKS

1) Login in with Facebook/ Google + or a simple email
2) Users select their specific dietary and cuisine criteria and then search for suitable restaurants in their vicinity, wherever they are in the world.
3) Bite happy with ‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô

TRANSLATIONS

The app also offers simple translations in over 25 languages, so when abroad it can help users communicate their requirements more easily.

ADDED FEATURES

‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô also offers a number of added features including:
- Saving your favourites with the click of a heart button
- Keep your preferred dietary preferences saved in Profile for nearby searches - Contribute to the ‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô community by allowing users to add restaurants to the ‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô database.
- Provide and share feedback and reviews on places visited for others to benefit from.
- Recipes: view an array of gluten free, dairy free, lactose free, vegan, vegetarian recipes and cook along with us.

Don‚Äôt forget to check out our website to use the service to find the right restaurant for your own specific diet through your browser at www.biteappy.com

Follow us on Twitter: @Biteappy
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/biteappy

comments: Biteappy is life saver for allergy sufferers like us. What I like about the app is I can select tags and it will only show those restaurants. I hope they include more information on speciality restaurants.

App does not work, I was trying to use this app, I got an error messages that said "could not load your tags" I do not understand what this means. I should not have to register or login to use this app.
The applications works great. I think people have issues with their settings. Mine on the s8 works first time. Really helpful app. Give the girl credit, it's a free app covering the world!
The description says it finds restaurants of all allergy types. Mine results were smoking hangouts. Uhh
I'm trying for days, but nothing is happening. Not happy at all.

title: myAllergy
description:
The app for Allergy Foodies.

Having a food allergy, intolerance, or dietary restriction shouldn‚Äôt take all the fun out of eating. So, the myAllergy app aims to answer two simple questions:
1) What can I eat?
2) Where can I get it?

Allergy-friendly and free-from options are out there; the trick is knowing where to find them, and the myAllergy app helps you do just that! It is THE social platform for people with food allergies. Simply download the app, set up your profile, and start sharing your Allergy Passport with others. You can also keep up to date with news, recipes, reviews and more via the newsfeed and community forum, and visit our website to take advantage of our other great features. 

Create your own profile by entering your allergies, intolerances, and dietary restrictions, using our allergy symbol system to highlight the severity of your reactions. Choose from dietary options including:

The top 8 major food allergens
- Coeliac disease
- Lactose intolerance
- Personal dietary options
- Plus many more
- You can even add your own!

The app also includes:

- Live food recall updates from the Food Standards Agency.
- Family members section for parents to create & monitor their kids‚Äô Allergy Passports.
- Passport tab to allow you to share or revoke your Allergy Passport as you wish.
- Community forum full of recipes, tips, allergy information, product reviews, and so much more!

myAllergy is a tech-for-good startup with the vision to be the world's largest online community of Allergy Foodies, helping people to gain freedom from food allergies and to learn to love food again. We also empower people with dietary restrictions who want, or need, control over their diet. We are truly passionate about making the world a better place for people with food allergies and want to create the best app we can. As we are still in the development phase, please bear with us whilst we work towards improving the app and adding the features you want and need. If you have any feedback or tips on how we can improve please email us at info@myallergy.com

title: bbdaily: Online Daily Milk & Grocery Home Delivery
description:
Start fresh every day with bbdaily by bigbasket. With bbdaily, get fresh milk and groceries home delivered. bbdaily has a presence across 10 key Indian cities of Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Mumbai, Pune, Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, Kolkata & Ahmedabad. Download the bbdaily app, recharge the wallet, and start shopping.

Order milk and groceries by 10:00 PM and get home delivered before 8:00 AM the next day.

‚óè Explore our wide range of Fresh Milk, Dairy products, Bakery, Fruits, Vegetables and more.
bbdaily has a wide range of fresh milk and groceries. When you buy milk online, there could be a possibility that it gets spoilt in transit. However, with our industry-level packaging and storing process, your dairy products taste and feel fresh the moment you open them. Fruits and vegetables are also carefully picked, sorted, packed and home delivered to ensure they are fresh from the farm to your home, every single day. And don't forget to check out our freshly baked bread & buns.

‚óè Our Guarantee to you:
Contactless delivery
Reliability
Purity - Freshness you can trust & guaranteed
Convenience
Choose a wide range of fresh milk and groceries
Assured On-time Delivery
No minimum order

Try bbdaily in 4 easy steps:
Download the app.
Register using your phone number & address
Recharge your wallet & Subscribe
Get daily delivery for milk items
Choose from over 5000+ other daily essentials and fresh products

Now enjoy the hassle-free experience of getting safe & fresh products home-delivered.

Over 25 million orders delivered
Over 1 million happy customers
Over 1000 brands and 5000+ products to choose
99% On-Time Delivery

If you're happy with us or not, contact us below:
bbdailysupport@bigbasket.com OR Call us at: 080-43133133
www.bbdaily.com

comments: Worst experience with BB daily. I have been complaining in the support chat of App and through mails regarding keeping milk pocket and other items on shoe rack. This is happening for past 20 days. But not resolved. They are not bothering to resolve the issue. They are playing with customers health. This is pandemic time. They don't have social responsibility. They don't have minimum concern of customers health

The BB app shows one discount in banner, but when you add the item in cart, it shows full value of the product. I happened to check it, else would hv ended up being cheated. App doesn't allow to share pictures twice in duration of chat. You can attach it only once

My experience with bbdaily is quite good. The products of daily needs such as milk, vegetables, bakery items etc. are always available. The rates of products are quite reasonable. The delivery service is also satisfactory. No issue till date.

Pathetic app. Though this app is just selling food items but still they don't tie up with any food cards like Sodexo or zeta . While other competitors are doing it like groffers, swigy . not sure founders of this app are sleeping or not progressive at all. Soon people would go away from this daily app if they don't make improvements.

False promotional messages of cashback when you stop ordering from this app. False claims by marketing folks on milk offers. Fresh produce always has a problem. Unfortunately I recharged looking at offers and now there is no cashback. I had gone away for good from this app due to its quality issues. Worse thing for feedback discussion they call you first thing in the morning on a Saturday or Sunday. Not sure what's wrong with these folks. That's the time when people are resting and won't talk!!

title: Cooking Diary¬Æ: Best Tasty Restaurant & Cafe Game
description:
Become the chef of your own restaurant in an exciting and FREE time management game! Cooking Diary is the best cooking game recognized by prestigious awards, loved and supported by MILLIONS OF PLAYERS around the world! Caution: this game can cause real culinary fever!

Welcome to Tasty Hills‚Äîa city where everyone loves to cook! It's your turn to keep a cooking diary. Help your grandpa save his family restaurant chain and build his reputation back up! Don't give your competitors a single chance to cook up evil plans, while you find true friends, manage restaurants and caf√©s, and cook top-quality dishes! Join fascinating events in the city's vibrant lifestyle, and gain fame as a great chef!

Features:
‚óè COOK hundreds of delicious recipes from around the world!
‚óè OPEN dozens of restaurants and caf√©s in all the districts of Tasty Hills and decorate them to your taste!
‚óè AMAZE the whole world by trying on ultra-stylish looks!
‚óè MAKE FRIENDS with cute and amazing pets of all kinds!
‚óè WIN in various culinary competitions with lots of prizes!
‚óè INTERACT with the residents of the city and immerse yourself in an exciting story!

üèÜ Winner of the WEBBY PEOPLE'S VOICE AWARD 2020 for Strategy/Simulation Game
üèÜ International Mobile Gaming Awards 2019 People's Choice Award winner

Play with your friends to cook and have fun together! Cooking Diary is a game that unites lovers of delicious and beautiful food from all over the world! Meet and chat with like-minded people‚Äîa love of cooking is a great starting point for a good friendship.

You can cook at restaurants and enjoy culinary adventures offline as well!

Tasty Hills is waiting for the grand opening of your restaurant! Etch your name in culinary history right now, Chef!

‚Ä¢ Food Truck: take an amazing ride with Eleven and Max!

STRANGER THINGS ‚Ñ¢/¬© Netflix. 2020. Used with permission.
comments: The feedback by developers that "levels are balanced and can be completed without purchases" is bogus. That's like saying you can walk 20 miles to work if you don't have a car. Technically true, practically untenable. Unless you don't care about quickly progressing through levels and don't mind saving up measly 2-ruby daily rewards...skip this. It's an awesome game but without making constant in-app purchases, it's too frustrating to be worth anyone's time. Also the house/pet features are dumb.

It's fun but can get get frustratingly difficult. It's annoying how many gems you need to upgrade your restaurants later when you barely get any. I wish they would change it so you can buy the pet stuff with coins instead of gems, because I don't want to waste my precious gems on them. I know you can get pet stuff via challenges but it can be difficult.

I did so much progress in this game, unlocking new restaurants and having so much equipment and upgraded stuff, I don't remember when or why, but I uninstalled it, now I remembered it and I installed it again, as expected everything was gone, I just made a character and did the tutorial, afterwards, it showed my saves, and it showed that other save and I thought it would bring back all the progress I'd done but it didn't, I just want to know how to restore everything.

I love how there seems to be endless levels without in-app purchases. But... when I first started to play upgrading the interior of the restaurants cost way less bank notes. I don't want to spend hard earned gems on that. I'm saving those for the kitchen. Why did you guys jack up the prices of things? Plus the new house thing. The shear amount of gems I'd need to purchase ONE piece of furniture is rediculous!! So i pretty much ignore that feature. And why do in-app purch cost so much?

I honestly really enjoyed this game to begin with. It was fun, interesting and I really like the guild feature. But I've been playing for maybe a week or so and now it's asking me to pay rubies to upgrade things. I don't have a lot of rubies and I think it's really silly that that are so expensive! You don't earn nearly enough rubies to actually make it worth the wait. The entire game is centered around them and it's really not fun to play anymore as everything gets more expensive! :(

- Write your online diary and set diary lock to protect your secret

comments: Just starting to use the app and it works perfectly for me. Simple and easy to use. Just a comment: Can add an option to sort the diary entries? Sometimes I want to view it by the diary date, the created date, or title; depending on my use. Tried to do so just now but cannot find a way. Would be really useful if the feature is available.

Such a cool app, but the problem is that I don't want to pay to be able to use certain things. I get it, that's how you make money and whatnot but still, I just want to write the entries like I would write them on a piece of paper. With everything available. Still the app is really cool and I love it.

The app's pretty good, it has different themes, different emotes on each entry, and way, way, more. I'm not gonna complain that it isn't free (not all features are there cause I didn't pay for premium) cause I understand that companies have to find a way to make money. I really recommend this app for anyone who likes journaling or just wants to try it out!

First of all, I would like to thank you so much for the existence of this journaling app! I have tried other apps in the past and I'm glad I have finally found this one! The themes are simplistic, beautiful and calming. And I really adore the quality of the stickers, it gives such an aesthetic touch to the diary entries. May I suggest a Web version for the diary? I appreciate the Google sync feature, but a Web version would do wonders. I can't write on the computer because I can't install the app and sync. If there's a Web version, surely I'll be able to write on the computer just as I would on my phone or tablet. And I would really love if you add more free stickers, I love them so much. So far, I'm giving it 5 stars. No ads or constant pop-ups to buy the premium. It's all very relaxing and appropriate for journaling. Keep it up!

Everything about this app is AWESOME! I have to found any problems. I love how if you forgot your password you can type questions! Oh wait.. here's my actual problem.... Nothing! Also I'm so glad that there are no ads!

title: CodeCheck: Food & Cosmetic Product Scanner
description:
CodeCheck is your personal shopping assistant when it comes to healthy and conscious consumption üïµÔ∏è‚Äç-. Simply scan the barcode or EAN number of your food ü•ó or cosmetics üíÑ and in just a few seconds you can find out whether the products are vegan, vegetarian or gluten- or lactose-free. Additionally, if they contain: palm oil, microbeads, nanoparticles, parabens, paraffins, too much sugar, etc.. CodeCheck also helps you, if you have an allergy to something. Now you can also customize CodeCheck to fit you best. Based on your individual needs, it will give you a personal rating circle which shows whether a product is suitable for you. You can set warnings, for gluten or if a product is vegan or vegetarian or not ‚ö†Ô∏è. You will always receive suggestions of better alternatives, too. But CodeCheck isn‚Äôt just a product scanner and a smart shopping assistant. It‚Äôs also a wiki and a news feed ‚Äì all in one app üí™!

HOW IT WORKS
Download the free app or subscribe to the ad-free premium version 
Login and select one of four profiles or build your own. 
Further customize your profile based on your own lifestyle and diet to receive personalized ratings and alerts for example a vegan-, vegetarian- or gluten-alert.
Use the scanner and with a glance, find out if a product is suitable for you.
After scanning, simply scroll down to be shown more suitable alternatives. 
Stay up to date with the latest news on healthy and sustainable consumption
Live more healthily, sustainably, consciously and happily üëç.

INDEPENDENT RATINGS
We follow the latest scientific findings or independent expert opinions from organizations such as Greenpeace, BUND (Friends of the Earth Germany), the WWF, the Food Standards Agency, and consumer protection bodies like Verbraucherzentrale Hamburg, Verbraucher Initiative e.V. and Stiftung f√ºr Konsumentenschutz. The sources referenced for ratings are always listed under each ingredient.

WIKI 
Is your product not listed? Then why not become an active member of our CodeCheck community and enter products and all their ingredients into our database? Our algorithm will then immediately link these to the corresponding ratings by relevant experts.

NEWS FEED
Our news feed will show you all the relevant information besides offering fantastic tips, vegan or gluten-free recipes üë®‚Äçüç≥  and much more.

Ad-free Version
You can buy an ad-free version of CodeCheck.  If you decide to purchase CodeCheck ad-free, it will be done through your Play-Store account. 

If you have any questions, requests or suggestions, please write us at support@codecheck.info!

Do you like CodeCheck? If so, we welcome a positive ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ rating! We hope you have a great time shopping in a healthy, sustainable way.

Your CodeCheck Team

----------

Codecheck.info website

CODECHECK ON SOCIAL MEDIA
Facebook:	https://www.facebook.com/codecheck.info.de
Instagram:	https://www.instagram.com/codecheck_info/
Twitter:	https://twitter.com/codecheck_info
Pinterest:	https://www.pinterest.com/codecheckinfo

recentChanges: Hello from your CodeCheck team. In this release, we have removed the Facebook log-in option to ensure the APP stability and fixed some bugs. If you notice any problems with the new version, please contact us at feedback@codecheck.info
comments: Its a great app and you can always add to it, being a vegan this app is a definite help. Just have to use common sense and Google translate when they have special articles in German.

I highly recommend this app. I use it before every purchase and results show immediately. I also like that it shows alternative products to my intended one. With this app it is easy to make healthier and eco friendlier buying decisions. A great thank you to the developers and please continue to expand the range of articles and continue to improve this app to be compatible with future IT development.

The idea is very good. There are plenty of products reviewed. I love the recommended articles written by codecheck and the fact that they contain product recommendations. Minor bugs: - It may contain misleading information due to the fact that users can upload data about various products without those being certified by a mod. - The app is laggy from time to time - The user can upvote the same comment multiple times without the option to withdraw its vote if the button was mistakenly pressed.
I love this app. It really helps to find unhealthy or alarming ingredients. For example microplastic, palmoil and chemicals which can affect my health. I can only recommend it to everyone!
Great app that can gives you information about variety of products (food, cosmetics) by scanning the barcode. It also highlights potentially negative ingredients (e.g. high salts)

title: Ate - the Mindful Food Journal and Photo Diary
description:
Ate is the most mindful & easiest to use food journal ever. 
It only takes 3 taps to log a meal. Try it out!

What can you do with Ate?
- Quickly log meals via photos.
- Easily reflect on and log why you ate.
- Build sustainable healthy behaviors for lasting change.
- Experiment with new habits, to see what works for you.
- Automatically track your fasting (IF 16/8).
- Stay accountable via friends or your coach.
- Share your day on Social media, if you are into that thing.

What it‚Äôs not?
- We try to make it as non-judgemental as possible.
- We don‚Äôt track calories. Ever!
- It‚Äôs not a magic pill. There is NO magic pill!

Say goodbye to mindless eating and become a better version of yourself with Ate!

See what others are saying:

"I LOVE this app! I was looking for something exactly like this because I can‚Äôt be bothered to enter calories or even (or even search for) food descriptions. All I needed was something to make me be aware of what I was eating, and to record whether it was on the path or not. You have made it so easy and it‚Äôs really helping me every day!" - Phil

‚ÄúI just wanted to let you know that since I started using your app I have lost 30lbs. I have tried MANY different things to lose weight (counting calories, macros, different diets) but I have found that this is the only thing that has helped me.‚Äù - from Christina

Don‚Äôt wait, start food journaling today with the #1 Photo Food Journal!

ALL CORE FEATURES ARE FREE!

____________
Why use it? 
With all the distractions and stress that is present in our lives, it's no surprise that many of us end up eating mindlessly. We end up forgetting what and why we truly are eating. We just simply turn to food, shovel it down and move on.

The impact of this behavior on our health is both physical and emotional. Getting us into a loop where we find ourselves digging a deeper hole to health problems. We try diets and other quick fixes, but all they do for us, in the long run, is cause us to be even more stressed and frustrated.

That is why we built Ate, the mindful food diary that is thoughtfully designed to help you be more self-aware of your eating habits, behaviors, and feelings. All done without ever judging you or making you feel bad. 

We worked with health professionals around the world and built the app on journaling techniques that have been proven over decades.

This food diary app is not about crash diets or restrictive living by calorie counting. It‚Äôs about building a sustainable, healthy lifestyle. A better version of yourself one small habit at a time. Something that you can easily maintain and enjoy in the long run. 

Remember, HEALTH IS PHYSICAL, MENTAL & EMOTIONAL (+ SOCIAL). Make sure you focus on all four and you will discover your true potential!

Download the Ate Food Journal today and start on your new path!


Premium Subscription
Ate‚Äôs core features are free to use and will stay free. We do offer a premium membership that will unlock features such as custom Q&As, liquid and activity tracking, the ability to share your profile via the web and to reuse your favorite photos when saving a meal. You can sign up for monthly, quarterly and yearly auto-renewing plans.

Processing of a subscription is handled by the Google Play Store. Your credit card will be charged through your Google Play Store account when you confirm your purchase. Subscription renews automatically at the same price unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription term. You can manage subscriptions in Account Settings in the Google Play Store after purchase. After the standard 48hour refund period offered by Google, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the subscription term.

Read our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy at https://youate.com/terms-privacy.html

title: Cake Recipes FREE üç∞
description:
Cake recipes app offers you many easy and delicious cake recipes. These include red velvet cakes, chocolate bundt cakes, sponge and vanilla cake, birthday cakes, wedding cakes, mug cakes

Festive recipes
We have created the ultimate cake collection to celebrate special occasions such as Labour Day, Thanksgiving, Halloween, or Christmas. Celebrate summer and fall season with your loved ones. Cook French autumn cakes, flavourous wedding cakes for fall, and tasty summer cakes. 

Popular cake recipes of the month
Recipes like red velvet cake, black forest gateau, marble cakes, pumpkin cake, fruit cakes, tiramisu, cakes for fall, autumn-themed cakes, sponge cakes and tasty fruit cakes such as strawberry and vanilla cake are popular in August and September. 

Simple cakes recipe instructions with picture
All recipes in our cake recipes book come with easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get tasty homemade cake recipes for free in our cake recipes book offline app. Unlike other recipes app, cake recipes can be used offline(no internet). This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favorite cupcake recipes
Add your favorite healthy cake recipes to the app's favorites section. You can use the saved cakes recipes offline. You can also try out different cake recipes from our collections on the basis of cooking and prep time, weekend party ideas, cuisine, dinner ideas. 

Some popular categories are
- Homemade cake recipes
- Simple cake and dessert recipes
- Easy to make cake recipes for kids 
- Wedding cake recipes and decoration ideas
- Birthday cake, Cake for special occasions
- Cake decoration and icing tips
- Cakes to bake without an oven 
- Healthy cake recipes without eggs
- Pancakes and dry cakes
- Based on equipment such as microwave, oven, air fryer, crockpot, freeze cakes, or even without an oven. 

Smart offline cake recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for healthy cake recipes with the ingredients you have. Make fruit cakes, strawberry cakes, special cakes such as eggless cakes, no-bake cakes. We also have cakes for Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes 

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature, lets you search and discover cakes recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have mug cake recipes for people following a vegetarian, paleo, vegan and gluten-free diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have dairy-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, peanut-free recipes, and egg-free. Nutritional information like cholesterol, calories, carbs, and fat are available in the Cake recipes app. Our healthy collection includes low carb keto cakes,  low sugar cakes for diabetes, low fat, and low calorie mug cakes. 

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be quick and healthy with Cake recipes. Start eating cupcakes with proper meal planning and grocery shopping. Our meal planner app gives you the best cake suggestions. 

We offer lots of delicious cake recipes:
Cook tasty and delicious cakes such as banana cake with cream cheese, New York baked cheesecake, chocolate coconut cake, carrot, walnut cake, chocolate mud cupcakes, flourless orange cake, vanilla cupcakes, and red velvet mug cakes. Get crafty with whipped cream, flour, sugar, baking powder, and eggs. We have microwave brownies, raspberry cheesecake, vanilla cupcakes, and more. 


Learn how to make cakes from scratch. We have a simple ingredient list and easy cake recipes for beginners. Our healthy cake recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for fondant, sponge cake, classic cake, chocolate cakes etc. Now that you've our cakes recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Cake recipes app offers you many easy and delicious cake recipes. These include red velvet cakes, chocolate bundt cakes, sponge and vanilla cake, birthday cakes, wedding cakes, mug cakes

Festive recipes
We have created the ultimate cake collection to celebrate special occasions such as Labour Day, Thanksgiving, Halloween, or Christmas. Celebrate summer and fall season with your loved ones. Cook French autumn cakes, flavourous wedding cakes for fall, and tasty summer cakes.

Popular cake recipes of the month
Recipes like red velvet cake, black forest gateau, marble cakes, pumpkin cake, fruit cakes, tiramisu, cakes for fall, autumn-themed cakes, sponge cakes and tasty fruit cakes such as strawberry and vanilla cake are popular in August and September.

This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favorite cupcake recipes
Add your favorite healthy cake recipes to the app's favorites section. You can use the saved cakes recipes offline. You can also try out different cake recipes from our collections on the basis of cooking and prep time, weekend party ideas, cuisine, dinner ideas.

- Homemade cake recipes

Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for healthy cake recipes with the ingredients you have. Make fruit cakes, strawberry cakes, special cakes such as eggless cakes, no-bake cakes. We also have cakes for Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature, lets you search and discover cakes recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have mug cake recipes for people following a vegetarian, paleo, vegan and gluten-free diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have dairy-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, peanut-free recipes, and egg-free. Nutritional information like cholesterol, calories, carbs, and fat are available in the Cake recipes app. Our healthy collection includes low carb keto cakes, low sugar cakes for diabetes, low fat, and low calorie mug cakes.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be quick and healthy with Cake recipes. Start eating cupcakes with proper meal planning and grocery shopping. Our meal planner app gives you the best cake suggestions.

We offer lots of delicious cake recipes:
Cook tasty and delicious cakes such as banana cake with cream cheese, New York baked cheesecake, chocolate coconut cake, carrot, walnut cake, chocolate mud cupcakes, flourless orange cake, vanilla cupcakes, and red velvet mug cakes. title: Ingredian Pro: Scan Food Labels
description:
If a healthy diet is important to you, then take a moment to look at a few food ingredient labels at your local grocery store. You'll find dangerous additives such as monosodium glutamate (MSG) and butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT). The U.S. Food and Drug Administration claims these are "generally recognized as safe", however independent research suggests otherwise. But what about the safety of other additives such as carmine or confectioner's glaze? 

Ingredian Pro uses your phone's camera to scan ingredient label text for quickly detecting additives and other potentially harmful chemicals lurking in your food. All detected ingredients are sorted in order by category with web links to provide additional information for each one. 

Ingredian Pro can also assist in detecting allergens such as eggs, dairy, fish, nuts, soy and wheat. It also includes various diets such as an Alpha-gal diet  to detect ingredients derived from red meat.

Features:
 ¬† ‚úî Ingredient categories: Allergens, Anti-caking agents, Anti-foaming agents, Bleaching agents, Buffering agents, Colorings, Countries of origin, Emulsifiers, Enzymes, Flavorings, Miscellaneous, Nutrients, Oils, Preservatives, Probiotics, Solvents, Spices/Herbs, Stabilizers & Sweeteners
 ¬† ‚úî Diets supported: Alpha-gal, Dairy-free, Fish-free, Gluten-free, Nut-free, Vegan & Vegetarian
 ¬† ‚úî Ingredient Safety options: Safe (green), Caution (yellow), Unsafe (red), Danger (blue)
 ¬† ‚úî Performs fast real-time scans. No need to crop a picture and wait for results
 ¬† ‚úî Supports scanning of large labels such as ones found on frozen pizza boxes
 ¬† ‚úî Ingredients are detected by the device with no server intervention
 ¬† ‚úî Detected ingredients scroll across the screen for quick review
 ¬† ‚úî Supports customization of detectable ingredients and diets
 ¬† ‚úî Camera Zoom option for setting initial zoom from 0 - 100% 
 ¬† ‚úî Speech Synthesizer option to speak ingredients detected
 ¬† ‚úî Detects over 300 allergens from Abalone to Zucchini
 ¬† ‚úî Web links to food safety gov and nutrition info sites
 ¬† ‚úî Scan Accuracy options: Good, Better & Best 
 ¬† ‚úî Scan Mode options: Automatic & Manual
 ¬† ‚úî Camera Flash option for use in low light
 ¬† ‚úî Unlimited number of scans permitted
 ¬† ‚úî High-contrasting user interface
 ¬† ‚úî Minimal permissions required
 ¬† ‚úî Low power consumption
 ¬† ‚úî Database Search option
 ¬† ‚úî Show diet compliancies
 ¬† ‚úî Small download size
 ¬† ‚úî No advertisements!

This app has no data tracking and no required user sign-in. Intended only for the U.S.A. and its territories.

Note: Some older Samsung Galaxy devices have autofocus issues that could prevent them from working with this and other Android apps. Click on this link for a possible remedy:
https://removeandreplace.com/2016/06/09/10-reasons-why-a-samsung-galaxy-phone-is-taking-blurry-pictures

Email us for questions or to request a new database ingredient at CadresSoftware@gmail.com

-- Graham flour. Add to Gluten-free diet.

comments: My husband has Alpha-Gal and my sister has celiac. Being able to scan and check in a hurry has been a blessing. My only downside is I have often unchecked the boxes with things my hubby can tolerate with his AG such as the sugars and carranegan, but it still hits red and doesn't seem to save.

App doesn't work well for allergens. Product can have "processed in facility that also handles eggs" and then app will say that the product contains eggs. Or if you scan a cereal and mentions calories with milk it then shows that the product contains milk. Actually continued using the app over the last few weeks and found it quite useful. Would give it 5 stars if it had a feature to denote the difference between containing vs processed in facility that handles x allergen product.
This app has helped me greatly, newly diagnosed with Alpha Gal, this app has saved me from countless reactions. Its the best money Ive spent for sure.
Needs work-doesn't appear to save allergens ingredients and a diet simultaneously. whenbi go back in to app ibhave to recheck. Plese fix and add Alpha-gal.
Game changer! No more guessing games when it comes to food shopping with multiple food allergies.

title: Cooking Diary¬Æ: Best Tasty Restaurant & Cafe Game
description:
Become the chef of your own restaurant in an exciting and FREE time management game! Cooking Diary is the best cooking game recognized by prestigious awards, loved and supported by MILLIONS OF PLAYERS around the world! Caution: this game can cause real culinary fever!

Welcome to Tasty Hills‚Äîa city where everyone loves to cook! It's your turn to keep a cooking diary. Help your grandpa save his family restaurant chain and build his reputation back up! Don't give your competitors a single chance to cook up evil plans, while you find true friends, manage restaurants and caf√©s, and cook top-quality dishes! Join fascinating events in the city's vibrant lifestyle, and gain fame as a great chef!

Features:
‚óè COOK hundreds of delicious recipes from around the world!
‚óè OPEN dozens of restaurants and caf√©s in all the districts of Tasty Hills and decorate them to your taste!
‚óè AMAZE the whole world by trying on ultra-stylish looks!
‚óè MAKE FRIENDS with cute and amazing pets of all kinds!
‚óè WIN in various culinary competitions with lots of prizes!
‚óè INTERACT with the residents of the city and immerse yourself in an exciting story!

üèÜ Winner of the WEBBY PEOPLE'S VOICE AWARD 2020 for Strategy/Simulation Game
üèÜ International Mobile Gaming Awards 2019 People's Choice Award winner

Play with your friends to cook and have fun together! Cooking Diary is a game that unites lovers of delicious and beautiful food from all over the world! Meet and chat with like-minded people‚Äîa love of cooking is a great starting point for a good friendship.

You can cook at restaurants and enjoy culinary adventures offline as well!

Tasty Hills is waiting for the grand opening of your restaurant! Etch your name in culinary history right now, Chef!

Join us on social media to keep up with the latest news from Tasty Hills:

developerAddress: Clementi Central Post Office, PO Box 041 Singapore 911202
recentChanges:
Our Stranger Things limited-time event has started!

SPECIAL EVENTS

‚Ä¢ Path to Glory: a pet Demogorgon and Steve Harrington as an assistant.

‚Ä¢ Scoops Ahoy restaurant: help the characters from the series save the Starcourt Mall!

‚Ä¢ Food Truck: take an amazing ride with Eleven and Max!

STRANGER THINGS ‚Ñ¢/¬© Netflix. 2020. Used with permission.
comments: The feedback by developers that "levels are balanced and can be completed without purchases" is bogus. That's like saying you can walk 20 miles to work if you don't have a car. Technically true, practically untenable. Unless you don't care about quickly progressing through levels and don't mind saving up measly 2-ruby daily rewards...skip this. It's an awesome game but without making constant in-app purchases, it's too frustrating to be worth anyone's time. Also the house/pet features are dumb.

It's fun but can get get frustratingly difficult. It's annoying how many gems you need to upgrade your restaurants later when you barely get any. I wish they would change it so you can buy the pet stuff with coins instead of gems, because I don't want to waste my precious gems on them. I know you can get pet stuff via challenges but it can be difficult.

I did so much progress in this game, unlocking new restaurants and having so much equipment and upgraded stuff, I don't remember when or why, but I uninstalled it, now I remembered it and I installed it again, as expected everything was gone, I just made a character and did the tutorial, afterwards, it showed my saves, and it showed that other save and I thought it would bring back all the progress I'd done but it didn't, I just want to know how to restore everything.

I love how there seems to be endless levels without in-app purchases. But... when I first started to play upgrading the interior of the restaurants cost way less bank notes. I don't want to spend hard earned gems on that. I'm saving those for the kitchen. Why did you guys jack up the prices of things? Plus the new house thing. The shear amount of gems I'd need to purchase ONE piece of furniture is rediculous!! So i pretty much ignore that feature. And why do in-app purch cost so much?

I honestly really enjoyed this game to begin with. It was fun, interesting and I really like the guild feature. But I've been playing for maybe a week or so and now it's asking me to pay rubies to upgrade things. I don't have a lot of rubies and I think it's really silly that that are so expensive! You don't earn nearly enough rubies to actually make it worth the wait. The entire game is centered around them and it's really not fun to play anymore as everything gets more expensive! :(

title: CodeCheck: Food & Cosmetic Product Scanner
description:
CodeCheck is your personal shopping assistant when it comes to healthy and conscious consumption üïµÔ∏è‚Äç-. Simply scan the barcode or EAN number of your food ü•ó or cosmetics üíÑ and in just a few seconds you can find out whether the products are vegan, vegetarian or gluten- or lactose-free. Additionally, if they contain: palm oil, microbeads, nanoparticles, parabens, paraffins, too much sugar, etc.. CodeCheck also helps you, if you have an allergy to something. Now you can also customize CodeCheck to fit you best. Based on your individual needs, it will give you a personal rating circle which shows whether a product is suitable for you. You can set warnings, for gluten or if a product is vegan or vegetarian or not ‚ö†Ô∏è. You will always receive suggestions of better alternatives, too. But CodeCheck isn‚Äôt just a product scanner and a smart shopping assistant. It‚Äôs also a wiki and a news feed ‚Äì all in one app üí™!

HOW IT WORKS
Download the free app or subscribe to the ad-free premium version 
Login and select one of four profiles or build your own. 
Further customize your profile based on your own lifestyle and diet to receive personalized ratings and alerts for example a vegan-, vegetarian- or gluten-alert.
Use the scanner and with a glance, find out if a product is suitable for you.
After scanning, simply scroll down to be shown more suitable alternatives. 
Stay up to date with the latest news on healthy and sustainable consumption
Live more healthily, sustainably, consciously and happily üëç.

INDEPENDENT RATINGS
We follow the latest scientific findings or independent expert opinions from organizations such as Greenpeace, BUND (Friends of the Earth Germany), the WWF, the Food Standards Agency, and consumer protection bodies like Verbraucherzentrale Hamburg, Verbraucher Initiative e.V. and Stiftung f√ºr Konsumentenschutz. The sources referenced for ratings are always listed under each ingredient.

WIKI 
Is your product not listed? Then why not become an active member of our CodeCheck community and enter products and all their ingredients into our database? Our algorithm will then immediately link these to the corresponding ratings by relevant experts.

NEWS FEED
Our news feed will show you all the relevant information besides offering fantastic tips, vegan or gluten-free recipes üë®‚Äçüç≥  and much more.

Ad-free Version
You can buy an ad-free version of CodeCheck.  If you decide to purchase CodeCheck ad-free, it will be done through your Play-Store account. 

If you have any questions, requests or suggestions, please write us at support@codecheck.info!

Do you like CodeCheck? If so, we welcome a positive ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ rating! We hope you have a great time shopping in a healthy, sustainable way.

Your CodeCheck Team

----------

Codecheck.info website

CODECHECK ON SOCIAL MEDIA
Facebook:	https://www.facebook.com/codecheck.info.de
Instagram:	https://www.instagram.com/codecheck_info/
Twitter:	https://twitter.com/codecheck_info
Pinterest:	https://www.pinterest.com/codecheckinfo
