recentChanges:
Our team of chefs has been busy creating more delicious recipes for your next meal plan. Make sure to update to try them out! For our Pro users, we've made it easier to tweak your advanced filters while still getting a wide variety of recipes. Stay tuned for more updates in the near future.

As always, if you're enjoying Mealime, please leave us a review!
comments: Game-changer for me. I'm not a good cook and it's probably the only place I've found where ingredient quantities are just right in general (and expressed in metric units!). Also the instructions are easy to follow and timing fits well. I now eat more varied, grocery shopping is way easier and I waste less food.

I am obsessed with this app! Here are the top reasons I love it: - It is so easy to use. - It is aesthetically pleasing. - It compiles a grocery list for you that you can add to. - The way that the recipe pages are laid out is GOLD. üëå I don't have to scroll through a blog. I can click on three sections (utensils needed, ingredients needed, and instructions (with ingredients listed underneath so that I'm not having to click back and forth). - Etc.

So far amazing. This is my first week using the app and I'm honestly just loving it. This app curbs my nasty habit of over shopping at the grocery store and yet still forgetting some essential items. I don't have to research recipes that fit into my Keto lifestyle, it's all layed out for me. Just click, and go. I'm honestly shocked at how easy it is to use and how incredibly helpful it is. This is not your turn of the mill list app or meal app. It's all here!

Absolutely five stars. Easy interface, you add recipes to your plan and it automatically generates a categorized grocery list for you. Gone are the days of running around the grocery store grabbing useless stuff that goes to waste, and wasting money. I've been using this app for about 2 months and I'll never go back. I've been using the free version up until now, but I'm about to pay for the premium subscription because it truly is just that good. No, this is in no way an ad.

This app has really helped me and my husband start to meal plan. I've tried to meal plan multiple times and just can't stick to it or it takes up too much time. Having the gluten free option definitely helps as well (celiac here) so thanks for including that! I've thought about going for the pro version but a yearly cost of about ¬£50 is a bit much. I'd maybe consider a one off payment of that, or maybe if it was paying per meal bundle (since I'm assuming that's why it's a yearly payment).

title: E-Codes Free: Food Additives
description:
Check information on chemical food additives (also known as E numbers). Some of them are toxic, while others are just vitamins!

Easily and quickly check which E numbers in the food ingredients can be harmful to you. The E-Codes app is perfectly designed to ensure maximum speed and usability. Just try it!

Screen-shots present the full version (search for: E-Codes). Which additionally includes the scoring system, especially helpful while doing fast shopping!

Fully supported languages: English, Deutsch, Polski.

Disclaimer:
The application has been developed between 2011-2013. It contains information on food additives aggregated from various sources available at that time. The app may be not accurate in accordance to the recent study published since then.

title: Vegetarian recipes - Vegan Cookbook
description:
Vegetarian recipes app offers you many easy and light recipes. These include tasty vegetarian burgers recipes, eggless cakes recipes, cake recipes, paella recipes, cookies recipes, pudding recipes, recipes for lasagna and recipes for pizza.

Tasty vegan recipes of the month
Recipes like ramen noodles soup, french onion soup, Asian vegetable broth, spinach salad, fettuccine alfredo, ginger pumpkin cupcakes, hot-&-sour okra pickles and rosemary garlic flatbread are popular in March & April.

Simple healthy vegetarian recipe instructions with pictures
Every recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many tasty recipes for free in our Vegetarian recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Vegetarian recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite easy vegetarian recipes
Add your favourite vegetarian food recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved vegetarian recipes offline. You can also create healthy vegetarian recipe collections on the basis of breakfast ideas, dinner ideas, cooking and prep time, vegetarian, cooking style etc.

Vegan recipe search
Find veg recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for easy vegetarian recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a veg recipe
Our tasty vegan recipes app lets you cook with the ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients features lets you search and discover vegetarian food recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have vegetarian recipes for people following vegan, paella, vegetarian and gluten-free diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have egg-free recipes, lactose-free recipes, dairy-free recipes, peanut-free recipes and wheat-free. Nutritional information like carbs, fat, calories and cholesterol are available in the Vegetarian recipes app.

Create Veg meal plans
Meal planning is going to be healthy and quick with Vegetarian recipes. Start eating healthy vegetarian recipes with proper meal planner ideas and grocery shopping list. Enjoy healthy diet recipe for your weekly meal plan.

We offer lots of vegetarian recipes:
Cook easy & tasty vegetarian recipes at home using beef broth, white cabbage, brown sugar & star anise. Recipes for classic vegetarian food dishes like mimosa fruit salad, vanilla ice cream, vinaigrette, cucumber salad and bacon ranch potato salad are available in the app. Our favourite vegetarian recipes include maple dijon roasted rutabaga, Mexican corn salad, ravioli & vegetable soup, and banana-bran muffins.

Our healthy vegetarian recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for soup, salad, tacos etc. Now that you've our recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our tasty vegetarian recipes app today.

title: Protein Rich Food Source Guide
description:
Protein Rich Food Source Guide is a free app about top protein foods and high protein diets for vegetarian or non-vegetarian people of all ages. App has information about all type of high quality protein food sources suitable for a number of purposes such as muscle building or Rapid Weight Loss or bodybuilding or just for daily breakfast or other meals.

App as following primary categories:
* Understanding Proteins
* Health Benefits of Proteins
* Protein Diet
* High Protein Cereals and Pulses
* High Protein Dairy Products
* High Protein Fruits and Nuts
* High Protein Vegetables and Beans
* High Protein Fishes and Sea foods
* High Protein Meat and Poultry
* Symptoms of Protein Deficiency
* Protein Deficiency Diseases
* Health Risks due to excess Proteins

Proteins are the building blocks of life and are necessary for the proper growth and development of the human body. Proteins are used by our body to make enzymes hormones which indeed are very much required by our body to perform all the processes and reactions to occur. 

Our daily diet is considered incomplete without sufficient servings of proteins so we must include healthy options of protein rich foods so as to get us enough protein to maintain muscle healthy organs and beautiful skin & hair. We have tried compiling all major categories of Food sources and their availability in all places of the world such as:

1. Top Vegetables and Beans
2. Fruits and Nut
3. Dairy Products
4. Meat & Poultry
5. Fishes & Sea Foods
6. Cereals and Pulses


In this app we have compiled a list of foods that are rich in proteins and essential amino acids required for growth and development in children teens adults pregnant women and all vegetarians and non vegetarian lovers. App contains the complete list of top protein rich foods that are easily available everywhere in the world and are completely natural. This compilation is not only suitable for weight gain and muscle building but also for your Weight loss goals for vegetarians and non vegetarians. 

We have included all type of food items such as fruits vegetables meat and dairy products that can help you gaining muscles really fast. You can share these images as photo in just single Tap to your Facebook WhatsApp twitter tumblr or any other social media website or App. You can also email these pics as attachment to your friends or can download to your cell phone memory or memory card gallery of your mobile.

title: Recipes for Kids - Cookbook Junior
description:
Looking for spooky Halloween bites to serve your little ones? Our scary selection of snacks and treats will make your kid happy on this Halloween day. Explore a variety of Halloween recipes like graveyard cupcakes, mummy muffins, spooky white pizzas, etc.

Cook healthy and tasty children's recipes with step-by-step recipe instructions, recipe videos, nutritional information and much more.

Start cooking tasty recipes for free. The tasty Cookbook Recipes app has recipes from around the world. You can download the Cookbook Junior App to create an offline collection of healthy and delicious recipes.

The kids' diet should contains healthy carbohydrates, fibre-rich food, fish and good fats.

We have developed the cookbook recipe app with the following functions:

1. Collect recipes - choose your favourite recipes from the cookbook recipe collections.
2. Daily recipe planner for kids recipes and other tasty cuisines.
3. 10,000 kids recipes free of charge
4. Create a grocery list for easy grocery shopping.
5. Send the delicious kids recipe shopping list to your partner.
6. Send simple recipes to friends.
7. Get delicious recipes offline without internet. (No internet required)
8. Delicious recipe finder based on ingredients.
9. Simple recipe search for ingredients, occasions, eating habits, cooking difficulties, etc.
10. Get popular & tasty recipes from around the world.

Cookbook recipes categories: -
> Breakfast recipes
> Recipes for lunch
> Dinner recipes
> Snack recipes
> Side dish recipes
> Dessert recipes
> Spice recipes
> Smoothie recipes

Our Cookbook Jr (Junior) app focuses on:-
+ Healthy carbs like fruits, vegetables, whole grains, legumes (beans/peas) and low-fat dairy (milk/cheese).
+ Fibre-rich food moderates digestion and helps in controlling blood sugar.
+ Good fats like avocado, nuts, canola oil, olive oil and peanut oil.

Download this tasty junior recipe app today. Enjoy the best tasty recipes for kids.

title: ShopWell - Better Food Choices
description:
Know your Food. Shopwell. 
 
The free Shopwell app simplifies nutrition labels and helps you discover new foods that fit your lifestyle. 
 
Shopwell provides personalized nutrition scores when you create a Food Profile with your dietary goals, health concerns, allergies and dislikes. Simply scan any item to see quick nutritional information and learn how it matches with your needs -- not an average. Discover products that are a better match for you. Create lists of your favorite finds and share them with family and friends. It‚Äôs that easy. 
 
Shopwell personalized results are a free, easy and fun way to discover the foods that are right for you.
 
 
Features:
 
‚Äî Barcode scanner translates nutritionals into quick, easy-to-digest information on more than 400,000 foods
‚ÄîPersonalized food recommendations.
‚Äî Location awareness to find products in your local grocery store.
‚Äî NEW! Create lists of your favorite foods and share them with your friends and family. Follow lists made by your friends and celebrity influencers
 
We help you stay on track by offering alerts and support for food allergies and food goals including:
 
Pregnancy

comments: Best app I found for seeing if certain foods will aggravate my food sensitivities without having to scan every goddamned label and look everything up myself. Could stand to be fleshed out a bit more, but a great tool nonetheless.
This is a very addictive sites to look at ingredients but no longer possible to use it on browser unless you just browse by the category only but good to look at nutrition fact.

I began using this app when my doctor recommended I do the low fodmap diet for 6 weeks. I thought this would make shopping for specific foods a lot easier. Boy, was I wrong. It is not accurate when you scan items in the store. For example, I would scan items, and it would say to avoid this item because of a certain ingredient in it, like soy. I would then look at the ingredients on the product and nowhere would it be listed. I would not recommend this app.

So far so good! My only suggestion would be to add a filter menu to searches / scanned items / lists, which provides options for sorting by food groups, brands, descending/ascending number rating, and excellent, good, poor, etc. matches only. As it is, looking through lists and searches is a nightmare when you have a LOT of items to look through. Another helpful feature would be to add an option to filter out duplicate items in searches--I once had a search give me 10+ dupes for several items.

I was reluntant at first to try this app due to a lot of negative reviews and comments. I just found out some food allergies that is includes in lots of foods, such as wheat, and this app is a good help. It also helps with other ingredients you want to avoid, such as sugar, etc. It even shows you foods that will be good for you to choose that disclides everything, which is good for someone new to a bad allergy trying to find new foods to eat. So far, I love this app

title: Find Me Gluten Free
description: The best gluten free restaurant finder out there! Find Me Gluten Free helps you easily eat gluten free. Whether you're celiac, gluten sensitive, or just on a gluten free diet, easily find restaurants, fast food, bars, cafes, grocery stores and more! Easily find dedicated gluten free places with one tap. Search your current location or a specific address. View menus, call, or get directions for each business. View others' ratings and reviews and submit your own.  We're constantly adding businesses, so suggest your favorites. Happy gluten free dining!

recentChanges: New review format!
comments: This really is a great app. Especially if you are visiting an unknown location. I would give this 5 stars except for one thing: you charge for premium for content that is largely gathered by your customers. I understand the need for the income, but see no compensation for the contributers. I would like to see something like 'free short-term premium for X reviews/additions'.

Awesome app. Have been using for years, and they have the most expansive reviews in even off the main road areas. Have used in other countries and was really helpful in our first trip to Barcelona. Travel in states we have used for first time trips - Chicago, Nashville, Kingsport, road trips between cities, Portland, Oregon Coast, Oahu just as examples.

must have for anyone with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity. I'm not thrilled with the new "premium" features, but I spoke to the developer and understand why he implemented them. and there are a couple ways around using them, if you're cash-strapped like me and don't eat out enough to need them.

It has definitely been useful in some countries, but not in others. Really needs a lot more input from users to be as helpful as possible. Frequently I have to add new places as there are no reviews - and the app fights you tooth and nail when you try to add places. But we will get there! And I would still say it is a "must have" for a traveling celiac.

Every useful feature is now behind a pay wall. Used to have several features I've paid for off and on over the years, now there is absolutely no point to the free version of the app. And the price isn't worth it for questionable crowd sourced information that might be detrimental to your health.

title: Dr. Greger's Daily Dozen
description:
Dr. Greger‚Äôs Daily Dozen details the healthiest foods and how many servings of each we should try to check off every day from his book How Not Die‚Äînow including the 21 Tweaks from How Not to Diet‚Äîweight-loss accelerators to help maximize our natural fat-burning capabilities.

All the proceeds from his books, DVDs, and speaking engagements are donated to charity.

NutritionFacts.org is a non-commercial, nonprofit, science-based public service provided by Dr. Greger, providing free daily updates on the latest in nutrition research via bite-sized videos. He has nearly a thousand videos on every aspect of healthy eating, with new videos and articles uploaded every day. Like this app, everything on the website is both free of ads and free of charge.

comments: This is the best app I've ever used for keeping you on track with nutrition. It's simple, easy to use and has lots of information if you need it. Best of all - it's free and without ads! Dr Greger is a genuinely good person who was inspired by his grandmother beating cancer and has shared her tips in this easy to use, free app!!

this app is wonderful. i am a huge fan of Dr. G,. his work to improve the health of the planet is such a blessing and a totally free gift~ that is true altruism and genuine compassion. the app takes me about 25 seconds to do and its an awesome way to remind me the holes in my diet to be mindful of filling. its a thing of beauty! and i thank him and his staffüòÄüå∑üåû! I stand by everything I said earlier in my first review, but PLEAZE bring back the vit D box &above all THE FULL SCREEN SUN BURST!!

I don't write much reviews but this is one of the best apps I have used. It's simple and effective, with lots of useful and wonderful information. My daily life has become an adventure of exploring and discovering new food and vegetables and it has changed my life for better. Thank you Dr. Greger üå±üçëü•¶üôÇ

Great way to approach what you are eating (what should I include in my diet as opposed to what shouldn't I eat. All of these foods have plethora of data supporting their ability to fight disease. App gamifies eating healthier (how many checkboxes can you get for how many days), free, well formatted.

Exceptional app. Easy to use. So practical, taking much of the stress away from daily food choices. I recommend this over any other system/plan I've come across for eating a plant-based diet or just eating healthier.

title: Yuka - food & cosmetic scan
description:
‚óÜ 19 MILLION USERS ‚óÜ

Yuka scans food & personal care products to decipher their ingredients and evaluate their impact on your health.

In a world of incomprehensible labels, Yuka provides clarity in one quick scan so you can make clear-sighted purchases.

Yuka uses a simple color code to inform you of the product's impact on your health: excellent, good, mediocre, or poor. You can access a detailed info page for each product, to help you understand its grade.

‚óÜ 700,000 FOOD PRODUCTS ‚óÜ

Every product is evaluated according to 3 objective criteria: nutritional value, additives, and the organic dimension of the product.

‚óÜ 300,000 COSMETIC PRODUCTS ‚óÜ

The scoring method relies on analyzing all of the product's ingredients. Every ingredient is assigned a level of risk, based on current scientific research.

‚óÜ BEST PRODUCT RECOMMENDATIONS ‚óÜ

For any product with a negative grade, Yuka will recommend in total independence a similar product that's better for your health as an alternative.

‚óÜ 100% INDEPENDENT ‚óÜ

Yuka is a 100% independent application. This means that product evaluations and recommendations are completely objective: no brand or manufacturer can influence them in one way or another. In addition, the application does not advertise. Find out more about our funding on our website.

comments: Needs a better database in Australia. I've contributed several things but nearly every food item in my pantry needs manual input. Maybe you guys could crawl the web for products sold over here. Our 2 major supermarkets are Coles and Woolworths. Upon further investigation, you seem to be using / sharing a database with openfood facts. Not sure if you have the ability to manually add items.
I was looking for an app like this!!! Very well done to whom did this app. I'm thinking to switch to premium but it should surprise me! After one day I know what I should change in my house!!
I love this app! It really helps me to make better choices when I do the groceries. It's easy to use, the only thing is that many products are still not known in their database.

perfect app... need to expend to the Whole europe. here in Poland i can't even add new product. aparently. I am stuck at the "Validation of the Ingredients" picture.... ü§∑ maybe it doesnt reconised the language ü§î. looking forward to have an update like this üòé

I really like this app. I live the design and the idea but it has 1 major flaw. The fact that people are able to manually contribute additional items that were not in the system before is a GREAT idea and I love it but at the same time it comes with a problem. The app base it's ratings off of 100g of the item however when people input the nutritional data they will use the number that are listed on the product which often are based on a different number of grams. This causes bad data.

title: Golden Farm : Idle Farming & Adventure Game
description:
If you ever dreamed to escape everyday routine and spend some idle time to play farm in a quiet town or village - this farm life simulator is for you.

Imagine yourself starting the day at a beautiful fazenda: stacks of hay, fruitful fields and a blooming garden seem like a pure paradise for a city person like you.
Your village friends are always there to help at your farmland harvest fruits and vegetables, care and feed the animals and trade on the market. Hey, by the way your family can join the game, too, to have more fun together!

We collected all the top farming game activities in one game to make you enjoy a real prime of your family farm:

‚òÖ Build a village and upgrade farm buildings! Make sure your factories are running and your barn is big enough to store all the harvest and goods.

‚òÖ Grow fruit trees and plants in fields and gardens! Prove yourself to be a great gardener in garden games! 

‚òÖ Breed animals: feed a chicken flock, buy a cow or two and shear the sheep! 

‚òÖ Make hay while the sun shines: take part in seasonal and daily in-game events to gain prizes and become the best farmers!

‚òÖ Explore diamond mines below the farm! The Golden rush is contagious! 

‚òÖ Produce and trade all sorts of your fazenda goods: from dairy to jewelry! 

‚òÖ Connect with locals! Add Facebook friends as neighbors farmers, or make new friends on the family farm! 

‚òÖ Challenge other farmers at the Fair of Achievements! 

‚òÖ Create your own farm community to achieve better results! 

‚òÖ Manage a top grade delivery service: by car, train or even airship! 

‚òÖ Color up your farm! Choose from tons of furniture, decor and flower items to make your funky mansion look trendy! 

‚òÖ Visit neighboring farms to find out whose grass is greener! 

‚òÖ Get your daily serving of farming fun! Grab a lottery ticket and scratch off your way to the jackpot. 

‚òÖ Equip an expedition and travel to a tropical island: exotic animals are waiting! 

‚òÖ Run a Zoo and an Amusement park and decorate them to your taste! 

‚òÖ Start a treasure hunt! Who knows, maybe your search will get you to discover your own gold mine. 

‚òÖ Bring some cute pets from the island and fill your meadows with life! 

‚òÖ Cooking is always fun and relaxing - try new recipes and make a successful food delivery business.


Download and start your idle farming empire

comments: Update: I started to really like it but, very expensive for a free game. Spent $15 already out of cash and diamonds, level 17. Storage is all full (expensive upgrade) Can't get any further without spending another $15 on the cheapest pop-up now, or playing very slowly :( I'd say about $10 a day to enjoy. Great graphics, but I'm just tired of "free games" costing a fortune, especially when we're all unemployed, stuck at home and broke

Great game at first, then they rob you and limit you from buying any trees, bushes, and flowers. They steal your coins and change the prices on each item that you buy and sell at a lower price. I don't understand this game is no fun anymore. I do enjoy my neighbors and my members that play in my group. They too are worried about the game ugh why are you doing this to the game? I really enjoy this game. Please give me my coins back 30,000. I didn't do anything but move my strawberries around ?

I used to enjoy the game until all the recent changes were made, too many problems to write here without running out of room, don't waste space on your devices you will be disappointed! and the developers just keep giving everyone the same bs about maintaining game balance blah blah as an excuse for their crappy updates, a good game completely ruined! PS thanks for the reply but unless these ridiculous changes are reversed I doubt very much I will be sticking with you's!

I have played this game for a long time and worked hard to get where I am in it and have, mostly, enjoyed it. Then, out of the blue, just like many of the other games they made progress much more difficult so that in order to make real progress you have to buy coins or whatever. Dont do it. Dont load this game. You will be let down. There are other games like this one... maybe give them a try.

I have played this game every day for over 1 year. Can only buy items when I first get my check once a month. Never had a problem getting stuff from the store. When someone buys an item it would take it off right away. Now for 2 days straight, every time I see a item that's hard to find and I try to get it you say it's been sold but keep it up there like it hasn't been bought. It really makes you mad. Normally when it has been bought you take it right off. To me that's cheating. Please stop it.

title: Low FODMAP diet A to Z food list for IBS sufferers
description:
This app was created by a software developer with Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) who found the low FODMAP diet to be very effective in avoiding trigger foods. It includes the following key features:

‚úì Clear and simple FODMAP rating system
‚úì Database of 600+ everyday foods and ingredients
‚úì Breakdown of each FODMAP rating (showing oligos, fructose, polyols and lactose content) 
‚úì Search by food name and filter by category/rating to find exactly what you want

If you have IBS and are following the low FODMAP diet to improve your digestive health by avoiding trigger foods then this A to Z food list is for you.

Note: this app is provided for educational purposes only; please ensure you seek the advice of a qualified doctor before making changes to your diet.

comments: Fantastic app. This has made my life so much easier. I do t need to keep looking up food on Google to find out whether it's good to eat. Very clear and easy to understand. Gives you 2 weight allowance amounts as well as red, green or amber. Highly reccomend

This app is super great! I can easily look up food and check if they are low fodmap, in addition to what exactly it has (like oligos, fructose, etc). What could make this even better, is the possibility to look up items such as snacks that are low fodmap.
Great App. Makes looking things up quick and easy. Gives safe serving sizes of items and what FODMAPs they contain. Hope to see many more items added in the future.
Our needs are different. Each person has different problems, let's face it IBS covers a huge range of problems. Great guide. I have one question, whats the little cross for ?
Easy quick way to check safe vs risky foods, with explanation for classification; still a work in the making with missing information

title: Food Scanner ‚Äì free barcode scanner for nutrition
description:
Food Scanner is a simple barcode grocery scanner that lets you quickly discover a food's ingredient information. It's a useful essential if you care about the food you eat. And it's ideal for those with a particular sensitivity or allergy. Or for people with specific diets, such as vegan, vegetarian, gluten free, halal and kosher.

Grocery shopping can be tricky sometimes. If you have a particular diet, or you find yourself wondering is it gluten free? Or is it vegan? With this app you can simply scan or search by name to get detailed nutritional information in seconds.

Find out for certain if a food or drink is vegan. Or check if it's vegetarian, gluten free, halal, kosher or sugar free. Plus you can also check for allergens, e-additives, preservatives and the nutritional values of foods.

Install Food Scanner today, and you can de-clutter your phone of all those other scanning apps, as it's an all-in-one product scanner, offering a gluten scanner, halal scanner, vegan scanner, ingredients scanner and qr & barcode scanner.

Top features:
- Instant barcode scanning
- Scan using the built-in flashlight
- Easily search for products manually by simply entering the product name
- Scan an unlimited number of products
- Share the details of food products you scan
- Check the history of previously scanned food
- Get detailed information about a food's packaging
- Plus useful new updates coming soon

Terms of use: https://telegra.ph/Terms--Conditions-02-28
Privacy policy: https://telegra.ph/Privacy-Policy-02-28-12

comments: Downloaded because of high recommendations. App doesn't load and keeps telling me I'm not connected to the internet, even if I hardwire to my modem.

It scans well and comes back with results quickly, but it's not accurate. I scanned two well known absolutely vegan products and it came back as non vegan. It's a shame because the app has promise. Lost stars due to the accuracy of the results.

Don't waste your time. The first product I scanned was not recognised and you have to go through a process of scanning and providing the details yourself. Fine it helps others but since gluten is not apparently an allergen and is one of the most common it is clear they have not made any serious attempt.
Scanned 3 common items just to see how it works. No information on any of them, 1 was a nationally available loaf of bread. Don't waste your time.
Not working on Xiaomi Mi Mix 3

title: Gluten Free Recipes
description:
Gluten is a family of proteins found in wheat, barley, and rye. Glutenin and gliadin are the two primary proteins found in these grains and they play a role in giving gluten-containing foods like dough its elasticity and bread its spongy texture. An ingredient that has been derived from a gluten-containing grain can be labeled as "gluten-free".

A gluten-free diet is the only treatment for the condition. Gluten is found in grains wheat, barley, and rye. On the gluten-free diet, you can eat many foods including meat, fish, fruit, vegetables, rice, and potatoes. You can also eat gluten-free substitute foods and processed foods that don't contain gluten.

A healthy gluten-free diet is no different from an otherwise healthy diet except for the fact that it doesn‚Äôt contain gluten. You should still aim to consume a balance of lean protein, healthy fats, fresh fruits, and nutritious veggies but you‚Äôll need to be careful about which grains you consume. You can still enjoy corn, rice, quinoa, buckwheat, arrowroot, and other ancient grains as well as flours made from nuts and seeds like almond flour and coconut flour. So a gluten-free diet is simply a diet made up of gluten-free foods.

GLUTEN FREE APP EXPERIENCE

This app is simple to navigate and also has multiple tutorials available on how to use the app.
As the recipe is a set of instructions for cooking, our app also provides nutritional information, servings, total time for preparation and recommendations so that nothing can go wrong when you‚Äôre cooking.

Theme Support

Protect your eyes from being hurt by a bright screen at night by enabling dark mode.
Make your Gluten-free cooking experience more comfortable at night.

Smart Shopping List for Gluten-Free Recipes

An organized shopping list allows the user to create ingredients list so you won‚Äôt miss any for the recipe. Users can also add items directly from recipes.
It also has offline access.

Search 1M+ Recipes

Apart from shopping list our app also provides a global search feature
where you can find the recipes you looking for or discover new recipes

Collect Your Favorite Foods

Use our bookmark button to save and organize recipes in your favorite recipe list. They also have offline access.

Personal Profile

Do you have a wonderful Gluten-free recipe that you‚Äôd like to share? We would love for you to upload it. To submit your tasty recipe all you need to create an account. In addition to that, you can also upload your tasty food photos, and leave feedback, comments, and tips over our chef community.

Native Language

Another key feature of our app is it supports multiple languages.
Currently, we offer around 13 main languages.

Recipes Finder

Recipe Finder can help you find a good recipe based on what you have in your fridge. You can provide a list of ingredients you have and bounce ideas off recipe finder so you never end up wasting any food!

Download the free Gluten-free recipes app today. Happy Cooking!

comments: Love the app. You can even select ingredients to have in the house and it'll pull up recipes based on the ingredients. Very helpful when you have to worry about gf eating.
I've just installed the app and already I'm excited just looking at these recipes! Can't wait to start cooking ü§òüëç.

Not all gluten free! The name suggests the app has all gluten free recipes. One of the ingredients in one of the fried chicken recipes is wheat germ. Always check the ingredients in recipes and store bought products. Don't trust an app or anyone to tell you if something is gluten free if you have celiac disease because you could get extremely sick.

I just downloaded the app so I'll give four stars for now. I love the way the app looks, it appears very organized with great quality recipes. I also like how you can check off ingredients like a grocery list within the app. I'm super excited to try these recipes :).
As I am a coeliac it is great having this app There is lots of recipes to choose from.I like the baking recipes to bake the delicious breads and cakes

title: Vegetarian and vegan recipes
description:
Looking for vegetarian and vegan recipes? Fast, delicious, Italian veggie food? You've found it!  
VegMenu is an app to prepare lots of veg foods. Cooking in vegetarian and vegan version some of the typical and most healthy recipes of the Italian cuisine.
 
A cookbook full of appetizers, first courses, main courses, salads, side dishes and delicious cakes, children's recipes, quick dishes, seitan recipes, tempeh recipes, tofu recipes.
Whether you follow a vegetarian diet, a vegan diet or an omnivorous diet, you will find lots of healthy recipes, to suit every palate.

With VegMenu you can:
‚Ä¢ Browse through hundreds of vegetarian and vegan recipes for free!
‚Ä¢ Cook many recipes of Italian cooking in vegetarian and vegan version.
‚Ä¢ Choose the number of portions and VegMenu will automatically calculate quantities.
‚Ä¢ Get step by step help in preparing the recipe.
‚Ä¢ View the nutritional values and calories for each recipe to help you keep in shape!
‚Ä¢ Find menus for all occasions: Christmas, New Year, Carnival, Easter, Halloween etc...
‚Ä¢ Buy ingredients and keep them in a shopping cart.
‚Ä¢ Respect portions by using a spaghetti doser.
‚Ä¢ A spaghetti doser to always respect the portions.
‚Ä¢ Eat healthy and cheap with the help of an in-season fruit and vegetable guide.
‚Ä¢ A handy measurement converter to easily convert from grams to ounces, from milliliters to liquid ounces and from Celsius to Fahrenheit.
‚Ä¢ Search by color recipes to have an iron constitution, or to prepare a romantic dinner for your partner, in short, for the right recipe for every occasion!
‚Ä¢ Look up recipes without gluten, lactose or eggs.

A diet based on plant foods is:
‚Ä¢ Ethical, because it respects animals.
‚Ä¢ Eco-sustainable, because it respects the environment
‚Ä¢ Healthy, because it respects the well-being of your body and of your mind.
A vegetarian or vegan diet prevents many diseases such as cancer, cardiovascular disease, obesity, diabetes, osteoporosis, dementia and Parkinson's.

For technical support or for other help, send an e-mail to the app developer: help@vegmenu.net

title: Lifesum - Diet Plan, Macro Calculator & Food Diary
description:
Diet plan, food diary, macro calculator, calorie counter and healthy recipes, all in one convenient place. Get healthy and feel great with Lifesum!

Looking to try a keto, fasting, paleo or sugar free diet? We have the perfect diet plans for any goal. Need a health tracker to stay in check? Fear not. We've got an intuitive food diary, macro calculator and tons of nutritional guidance.

Meal planner and macro tracker - TOP Lifesum features:
‚óè        Diet plan & diet tips for any goal - lose weight and eat healthy
‚óè        Keto, fasting, paleo, sugar detox and more diets & plans
‚óè        Calorie counter & food tracker with barcode scanner for easy logging
‚óè        Macro calculator - keeps tabs on daily macros, nutrition & calories
‚óè        Food planner - eat healthy food from delicious recipes for any plan
‚óè        Health tracker - stay on top of fitness and health

WEIGHT LOSS AND DIET PLAN
Lose weight with a personalized diet plan. Take our test to discover which food planner is the most suitable based on schedule and lifestyle. From fasting, paleo to sugar free diets and everything in between, we have the right plan to achieve any weight loss goal.

RECIPES AND MEAL PLANNER
Healthy recipes to support all meal plans. Stuck in a diet rut? Explore tasty keto recipes, beat cravings with a no sugar meal plan or search for paleo food lists and snacks. 

CALORIE COUNTER AND FOOD PLANNER
Calorie counter and food tracker functions provide an overview of daily nutritional values. Did a workout today? Go premium and sync Lifesum with FitBit, Runkeeper, Moves and other fitness apps.

FOOD DIARY AND MACRO TRACKER
Macros mythbusting. It's easy with our macro tracker - reach the right type of energy consumption with the macro calculator. Simply scan barcodes for macros and nutritional information, or enter manually.

Join 40 million users on the journey to better health and discover how tracking small habits can make a big difference in becoming happier and healthier.

Download Lifesum now and improve your health today! Also benefit from daily feedback to stay focused and motivated when working towards weight loss goals.

Lifesum integrates with Google Fit and S Health allowing users to export nutrition and exercise data from Lifesum to Google Fit and S Health, and import fitness data, weight and body measurements back to Lifesum.

For extended features such as specialized diets and detailed nutrition information, and to sync with fitness apps such as Moves, Nokia Health, FitBit, Jawbone, Endomondo and Runkeeper, get the Lifesum Premium membership.

comments: Apart from the occasional incorrect listing in the food database, this is the best calorie counting app I've found. Easily the best looking UI, with a clean uncluttered layout, and great features. Had a small hiccup where changing phones caused the app to lose my premium subscription, but the developer sorted it out quickly. Would be 5 stars but for the database errors. In fairness, I have never found a similar app that didn't have the same problem.

It's been pretty good so far. I've noticed my girlfriends app she uses that cost $2.99 one time has less of a library of foods already in the database. The recipes are nice and it syncs with a lot of the other health apps. My main complaint is the inability to set my own calorie and macro goals. If this is fixed, I would consider extending my subscription when it is up.

I have used other apps including Weight Watchers. This app is as user friendly as any I have used including a scanning option for tracking food. What makes this different is this app let's you see the nutrients in the food you eat. I thought I ate a lot of protein daily, but it turns out I was wrong. I wanted to include more carbs in my diet and this app has helped me to do that and to discover healthy carbs to add daily. I appreciate the reminders through the day.

Barcode scanner is super quick and has almost everything I've ever scanned, have used the app for a couple years now in a couple of ways (weight loss, maintenance, muscle building gains) and the only thing I can say I miss from this app is a pregnancy option to help stay on track with how many calories you should be eating for positive healthy weight gain during each trimester. Every other aspect of the app is awesome.

I am very disappointed about the latest update released yesterday, the new interface is just to ruin the effect, I don't understand why put all the food logs into each meal so that we have to perform 1 extra click to see the details? I will adjust the quantity quite often, now I have to think in which meal to find my food again and have to give an extra unnecessary click to edit it.

title: Top Vegan Recipes - Delicious & 100% Meat-Free
description:
All recipes are completely vegan recipes, free of dairy, meat and animal products.

These vegan cooking recipes apps teach you how to prepare your vegan dishes in the right way so that you can cook for everyone.

These recipes are so good that even carnivores love them and will be begging you to make more!

Fight meat & cheese cravings by simply cooking amazing & delicious vegan meals.

If you love plant-based food, this app is for you, with the top vegan recipes from all around the world you'll never be stuck on what to cook!

recentChanges: Initial release
comments: Although this app doesn't use meat as an ingredient in any recipes, they do list various cheeses (with no mention of using a plant-based substitute) and chicken broth in recipes. Quite a few actually. I directly inquired why they call/advertise the app as "Vegan Recipes" when recipes use or call for animal products. I have yet to recieve a response after months. Seems like false advertising that blurs the lines of vegetarianism and veganism. This app should be called "Vegetarian Recipes".
Love the recipes. I've tried several so far. I make the frozen cream shake recipe about every week

Nice recipes but I've seen a couple where there is an ingredient in the title but not on the ingredient list... Could be a bit miss leading also people won't know the amount to use. Who ever is up loading needs to double check this.
Just downloaded this app...love it! I tried with 3 other apps, this is the only one that works. Beautiful pics of the dishes, too. Nice flavors..can'wait for the 1st, to get a few ingrediants...
The recipes are good. They use a lot of pasta. The lack of a print button means you have to flip through a lot of pages which makes it difficult to use.

title: Foodzilla! Nutrition Assistant, Food Diary, Recipe
description:
See nutrients, calories, vitamins and minerals by just taking pictures of your meals. Discover new healthy recipes and use filters to find the ones that fit your diet such as "Low Carb", "High Protein", "High Fat", "Low FODMAP" and more. 
No In-App Purchases. No Ads. No email required.

TRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY

‚Ä¢ Track Nutrition ‚Äî Count calories and macros by just taking pictures of your meals.
‚Ä¢ Track Food Groups ‚Äî Understand the variety of foods in your diet and the serving amounts. Food is categorised into these groups: "Dairy", "Bread (Starch)", "Fruit", "Vegetable", "Meat".
‚Ä¢ Find Recipes ‚Äî Discover healthy recipes for the ingredients you have with cooking instructions and nutrition already calculated.
‚Ä¢ Recipe Filters ‚Äî Filter recipes by diet labels such as "Low Carb", "High Fat", "High Protein", by cuisine "Korean, Japanese, German, Indian", by allergens "Dairy-Free", "Low FODMAP", "Vegan", "Vegetarian", "Pescatarian" and others
‚Ä¢ Quick Logging ‚Äî Easily log items that you know the calories for or manually by adding ingredients.
‚Ä¢ Track All Nutrients ‚Äî saturated fat, trans fat, mono fat, protein, carbs, sugar, fiber, cholesterol, added sugar, iron, magnesium, sodium, vitamins, and minerals.
‚Ä¢ Track Water ‚Äî Log water intake in ml
‚Ä¢ Food Diary ‚Äî Catalogs previous meals and sorts them based on calories
‚Ä¢ Save Recipes ‚Äî Catalogs your favourite recipes in one place
‚Ä¢ Sync Food ‚Äî Sync the food and nutrition intake with other apps such Fitbit

LOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS

‚Ä¢ Automatic activity tracking ‚Äî Sync calories burned and exercise data with other apps like Fitbit, Polar, Garmin & Strava.
‚Ä¢ Choose from 100+ exercises.
‚Ä¢ Log Cardio Exercises ‚Äî Including running, walking, biking, boxing, cycling, swimming, yoga, pilates and more.
‚Ä¢ Log Strength Exercises ‚Äî Including sets, reps, and weight per set.
‚Ä¢ Track Steps ‚Äî Set a daily step goal and sync steps from Fitbit.

NUTRITION SUPERPOWERS IN YOUR POCKET

‚Ä¢ Share data ‚Äî Share your data with your nutritionist, dietician & personal trainer.
‚Ä¢ Insights ‚Äî learn about the nutrient distribution of your diet, about the food you eat, ingredients you eat often, vitamins distribution, and missing minerals.
‚Ä¢ Progress charts ‚Äî Beautiful daily and weekly charts to track your nutrition & stay healthy.
‚Ä¢ Food composition databases ‚Äî Access food composition databases from New Zealand, Australia, and the United Kingdom.

CUSTOMISE YOUR GOALS

‚Ä¢ Choose your goals ‚Äî Set multiple goals such as weight loss, weight gain, strength gain, understanding food, feel young and more.
‚Ä¢ Macronutrient goals ‚Äî Set daily goals for tracking macronutrient intakes like fat, carbohydrates, protein, and fiber.
‚Ä¢ Energy goals ‚Äî Set daily goals for calories intake and calories burned.
‚Ä¢ Body goals ‚Äî Set body weight and fat percentage goals.
‚Ä¢ Food groups goals ‚Äî Set serving goals for each food group such as "Diary", "Bread (Starch)", "Fruit", "Vegetable", "Meat" 

Notes:

- Calories estimated may have a margin of error of minus/plus 100 calories.
- Nutritional information is a best-effort estimate and the actual meal may contain more ingredients that are not possible to detect using machine learning such as oil.
- The information in Foodzilla is not intended to replace the advice of your GP, a one on one relationship with a qualified health care professional and is not intended as medical advice. It is not intended for self-diagnosis, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
--------

Terms: foodzilla.io/terms.html
Privacy: foodzilla.io/privacy.html
Feedback: support@fitzilla.io

descriptionHTML:
See nutrients, calories, vitamins and minerals by just taking pictures of your meals. Discover new healthy recipes and use filters to find the ones that fit your diet such as "Low Carb", "High Protein", "High Fat", "Low FODMAP" and more.
No In-App Purchases. No Ads. No email required.

TRACKING FOOD IS FAST AND EASY

‚Ä¢ Track Nutrition ‚Äî Count calories and macros by just taking pictures of your meals.
‚Ä¢ Track Food Groups ‚Äî Understand the variety of foods in your diet and the serving amounts. Food is categorised into these groups: "Dairy", "Bread (Starch)", "Fruit", "Vegetable", "Meat".
‚Ä¢ Find Recipes ‚Äî Discover healthy recipes for the ingredients you have with cooking instructions and nutrition already calculated.
‚Ä¢ Recipe Filters ‚Äî Filter recipes by diet labels such as "Low Carb", "High Fat", "High Protein", by cuisine "Korean, Japanese, German, Indian", by allergens "Dairy-Free", "Low FODMAP", "Vegan", "Vegetarian", "Pescatarian" and others
‚Ä¢ Quick Logging ‚Äî Easily log items that you know the calories for or manually by adding ingredients.
‚Ä¢ Track All Nutrients ‚Äî saturated fat, trans fat, mono fat, protein, carbs, sugar, fiber, cholesterol, added sugar, iron, magnesium, sodium, vitamins, and minerals.
‚Ä¢ Track Water ‚Äî Log water intake in ml
‚Ä¢ Food Diary ‚Äî Catalogs previous meals and sorts them based on calories
‚Ä¢ Save Recipes ‚Äî Catalogs your favourite recipes in one place
‚Ä¢ Sync Food ‚Äî Sync the food and nutrition intake with other apps such Fitbit

LOG YOUR EXERCISE AND STEPS

‚Ä¢ Automatic activity tracking ‚Äî Sync calories burned and exercise data with other apps like Fitbit, Polar, Garmin & Strava.
‚Ä¢ Choose from 100+ exercises.
‚Ä¢ Log Cardio Exercises ‚Äî Including running, walking, biking, boxing, cycling, swimming, yoga, pilates and more.
‚Ä¢ Log Strength Exercises ‚Äî Including sets, reps, and weight per set.
‚Ä¢ Track Steps ‚Äî Set a daily step goal and sync steps from Fitbit.

NUTRITION SUPERPOWERS IN YOUR POCKET

‚Ä¢ Share data ‚Äî Share your data with your nutritionist, dietician & personal trainer.
‚Ä¢ Insights ‚Äî learn about the nutrient distribution of your diet, about the food you eat, ingredients you eat often, vitamins distribution, and missing minerals.
‚Ä¢ Progress charts ‚Äî Beautiful daily and weekly charts to track your nutrition & stay healthy.
‚Ä¢ Food composition databases ‚Äî Access food composition databases from New Zealand, Australia, and the United Kingdom.

CUSTOMISE YOUR GOALS

‚Ä¢ Choose your goals ‚Äî Set multiple goals such as weight loss, weight gain, strength gain, understanding food, feel young and more.
‚Ä¢ Macronutrient goals ‚Äî Set daily goals for tracking macronutrient intakes like fat, carbohydrates, protein, and fiber.
‚Ä¢ Energy goals ‚Äî Set daily goals for calories intake and calories burned.
‚Ä¢ Body goals ‚Äî Set body weight and fat percentage goals.
‚Ä¢ Food groups goals ‚Äî Set serving goals for each food group such as "Diary", "Bread (Starch)", "Fruit", "Vegetable", "Meat"

Notes:

- Calories estimated may have a margin of error of minus/plus 100 calories.
- Nutritional information is a best-effort estimate and the actual meal may contain more ingredients that are not possible to detect using machine learning such as oil.
- The information in Foodzilla is not intended to replace the advice of your GP, a one on one relationship with a qualified health care professional and is not intended as medical advice. It is not intended for self-diagnosis, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
--------

comments: Buggy. Meals logged to diary disappear, then they turn up on the wrong date after going to the logged meals sections. Somehow I ended up drinking 2700ml of water today and I've only been awake 30 min! It's obviously not tracking dates/times correctly. Could this be because I'm in the USA and the app seems to be based in Europe, and is defaulted to a different time zone?
Great app. Well done.

title: Calorie Counter, Carb Manager & Keto by Freshbit
description:
Freshbit - The Simple & Powerful Calorie Counter and Carb Manager. Whether you're trying to eat less sugar, lose weight via a Keto diet, or ensure you have a well-rounded diet with the right balance of macros & vitamins, we help you achieve your health goal. Freshbit is a macro calculator and nutrient tracker that helps you understand the impact of what you eat on your body as it's always better to eat the right food than to take medicine or supplements. Freshbit, one of the highest 5-star rated Calorie Counter and Carb Manager apps, helps you become your healthiest version of you! 

TOP FEATURES
‚óè Use the Macro Calculator to go on a customized, keto, or sugar free diet 
‚óè Browse through healthy recipes or create your own recipe
‚óè Log your daily food with a barcode scanner, track water, and record exercises in the Diary
‚óè Use as a Food Planner to ensure a healthy diet

3 IN ONE - CALORIE COUNTER + WATER TRACKER + EXERCISE LOG
‚òÖ Don‚Äôt use three separate apps - a calorie tracker, water tracker, and exercise log. Use Freshbit‚Äôs powerful database and track your diet, water, and exercise, all at once in your diary. We have 300,000+ foods, 800+ exercises, and pre-set water amounts for you to choose from. 

CUSTOMIZE TO YOUR DIET PLAN
‚òÖ Set custom goals for your Keto or non Keto diet plan, choose daily targets for calories, fat, protein, and carbs to reach your diet goals. Create your own foods, mix different foods & ingredients to create your own recipes. This Calorie Counter helps you track Net Carbs and Total Carbs. All of this can be configured within the app, to create a customized Macro Calculator just for you.

ENSURE A WELL ROUNDED FOOD DIET
‚òÖ Being healthy isn‚Äôt just about going on a sugar free diet or keto plan, eating fewer carbs, fat or calories. Eating healthy is also about taking enough vitamins, minerals and other key nutrients your body needs. We track 20 different nutrients including Macros, Vitamin A, Vitamin B, Fibre, Iron, Magnesium, etc. for every food to give you a comprehensive picture of what you eat. This food tracker is much more than just a macro calculator.

SUPER EASY TO USE
‚òÖ Striking the right balance between providing many powerful features while keeping things simple is what makes Freshbit different from all other Macro Calculator apps. We talk to our users daily and update the app frequently to make Freshbit Calorie Counter and Carb Manager as easy-to-use as possible.

DOZENS OF SURPRISING FEATURES
‚òÖ Use Freshbit‚Äôs Nutrient Guide to learn more about all 20 nutrients tracked in the app. Create custom daily/weekly reminders to help you stay on track. Use the shopping list to help your grocery shopping. 

You talk, we listen! We consistently take feedback and update the app to provide a better experience to our users.

Support: afoodapp@gmail.com

Privacy Policy: http://getfreshbit.com/ppolicy.html

Terms of Service: http://getfreshbit.com/terms.html

comments: Great app, a must have if you're serious about following a keto diet. It's a particularly sharp way to track hidden carbs, actual macros, goals, and milestones. The GUI is clean, the color scheme perfect and the overall application is very intuitive. A two thumbs up. Thank you for all the hard work in this combination!

I have looked and tried other apps. And this one is by far the best for me. It's worked great. It's been very very helpful. I love the meal ideas. My wife was originally on board. But after making some of the dinner meals, she's been supportive. I have learned a lot also. In four and half weeks I have lost 24 lbs. Thank you so much.Love lovelove it.

I used to get stuck + stressed when trying to figure out what to cook or put on the grocery list but now I just have to pull up this app and get loads of friendly meal ideas. keto. It doesn't sound like an informational ad or anything, but it really makes my life a lot easier.

Thank you for this great app. This is the best Keto app I could find. It has it all in one package: set up macros with goal tracking, recipes with visualized step-by-step instructions, daily food tracking with detailed summaries and historical range of your choice, create Shopping lists right from the recipe you want to make and the interface very easy to use.

I am very impressed with this app !!!! The recipes are endless. My fingers are tired of scrolling through amazing inspirational recipes and information about Keto and explain the calorie counting clearly and concisely. Good work, everyone. A barcode scanner would be super awesome!

title: My Diet Coach - Weight Loss Motivation & Tracker
description:
‚àö Keep your motivation alive with inspiring tips, photos, and virtual rewards
‚àö The best weight tracker & calorie counter - Easily journal your diet plan with our user-friendly diet diary
‚àö Easy, Fun, Motivating - Way more than just a calorie calculator  & weight tracker
‚àö Learn to lose weight fast and get into fitness by making small lifestyle changes
‚àö Free water tracker

*** So, how will MY DIET COACH HELP YOU TO LOSE WEIGHT? ***

My Diet Coach will help you find your inner motivation, keep you on track, make healthy lifestyle changes, resist food cravings, avoid exercise laziness and other weight loss difficulties:

‚Ä¢	Set your goal (We'll help you to achieve it)
‚Ä¢	Track your progress (New! Visual weight tracker ‚Äì see your lost weight ‚Äòdrop off‚Äô ‚Ä¶)
‚Ä¢	Get reminders of what's important (Your goal, motivational photos, fitness class)
‚Ä¢	Take up small, healthy lifestyle challenges  ‚àí you'll never forget to drink water again!
‚Ä¢	Boost your weight loss motivation with our inspiring tips and quotes 
‚Ä¢	Stay on track with our user-friendly calorie counter
‚Ä¢	Be rewarded for your success ‚Äì lots of fun and super motivating (for women!)
‚Ä¢	It's FREE!

MORE DETAILS:
In order to lose weight, you just have to consume fewer calories than you burn. Sounds easy, doesn't it? So, how comes losing weight didn‚Äôt become any easier? Well ‚Ä¶ While other apps offer just a calorie counter, My Diet Coach offers a full set of lifestyle changing and motivation tools:

1. Customized reminders ‚Äì boost your motivation, improve your health and plan your diet:
‚Ä¢	Drink water
‚Ä¢	Always be prepared with healthy snacks
‚Ä¢	It‚Äôs time for your exercise class
‚Ä¢	And much more ‚Ä¶

2. Visual weight tracker ‚Äì Your LOST weight counter ‚àí visually see and track how much you've lost so far!

3. Daily challenges program which will help you to: 
‚Ä¢	Improve your fitness and nutrition
‚Ä¢	Lose body fat and increase calorie burn
‚Ä¢	Drink more water

‚àö Get ‚ÄòHealthy Lifestyle‚Äô points for your achievements
‚àö Steps counter

5. Helpful tips and tricks for common weight loss setbacks:
‚Ä¢	Tips for food cravings
‚Ä¢	Tips for exercise laziness
‚Ä¢	How to get your motivation back
‚Ä¢	Much more ‚Ä¶

6.  Get ‚ÄòHealthy lifestyle‚Äô points for doing the right thing and improving nutrition:  
‚àö Redeem your points for virtual fashion items to dress your avatar (for women only) 

7.  Lose even more weight with the Pro UPGRADE. By upgrading, you‚Äôll get:
‚Ä¢	Food cravings panic button and tips
‚Ä¢	Weight, water, and measurements charts (syncs with the tracker)
‚Ä¢	Diet diary, which includes meals and exercise journal, calorie burned counter, and barcode scanner for foods
‚Ä¢	Water consumption tracker
‚Ä¢	BMI calculator
‚àö Get more points and fashion items for your avatar

> Record and view your weight loss progress‚Äîwith the Pro weight chart!

> Personalize your diet plan ‚àí define your own meals, exercises 
> One diary for exercises, meals, and other events ...
> Set reminders that will remind you to plan and journal
> Calories calculator for hundreds of types of exercise and thousands of foods

> Track carbs, fats, and protein

comments: I had purchased the pro version of this app - which for some reason is now discontinued. I am now being asked to pay a onetime amount for a repeated pro subscription by the developers. Have reached out to them multiple times over email and have received only one automated response in return. Taking money for the pro version then pulling the application out -- that's a proper scam. There is no guarantee that, if one pays for the pro subscription now, these developers won't ring in the same scam again. Uninstall. Move on.

I have purchased the pro version which I prefer over the free one. This isn't a bad app at all but there is certainly loads of room for improvement. Some suggestions: Add a barcode scanner, healthy alternative options, recipes, grocery lists, conversions and being able to connect to different exercise devices or: Fitbit, Garmin, Google fit etc. My rating will definitely change to 5 star with some or all of these options included.

I've used this app before, paid for the basics. Now that is gone, when I look for foods most are gone now. It's like you deleted your food library. Uninstalling it and looking for a new app. No longer works for me.

Had this app numerous times, and every time ive tried a new one always came back to this one. Super easy and simple as well as personally effective to see what helps me to track what i eat. For someone like me who has ibs it is great to log what u have eaten that day and symptoms as well as weight loss planning :)

I had the Pro version of this a while ago, and it worked wonderfully. Now, I didn't mind needing to pay for Pro again with the new app, but I'm pretty upset that I can't even access the features I paid for... I still get ads, can't access my weight chart. What's the point of having spent the money at all?

title: KITCHENPAL: Pantry Manager, Grocery List & Recipes
description:
*Recommended by PRI Radio (US), Food Navigator, Honeycombers, Radio France, Le Mans, 100% Mag and many more.

KitchenPal (iCuisto) is the only pantry manager, grocery list, and recipe ideas app, all rolled into one. You can use one just feature or all; and the app learns and provides suggestions the more you use it, just like a personal assistant.

Save time & money - never forget another product while shopping, and minimise food wastage through automated pantry check and with tasty & healthy recipes based on your ingredients.
And unlike other grocery or recipe apps, you can simply scan your favourite brands or products to add them to your kitchen or shopping list; or to find the best recipes. 

PANTRY MANAGER
- Easily organize your kitchen into pantry, fridge food, freezer items, etc (we even have a wine & bar section)
- Set quantities and food expiry dates: ideal for pantry check and tracking food inventory (for many items, especially fridge food, produce, etc, we detect expiry automatically)
- Receive alerts when your products and ingredients are about to go bad
- Add your favourite brands by simply scanning the item (our database contains millions of products from most major grocers)
- Share and sync the app with family members and easily manage your pantry inventory together
- Easily add your favourite items from the pantry to your shopping list

RECIPES BY INGREDIENT
- Links to the pantry manager and automatically suggests recipes which match your existing food inventory (not available in other recipe apps)
- Easily search recipes by ingredient from millions of tasty recipes and ideas
- Find fridge recipes keeping your health and specific diet in mind (gluten free, lactose free, pork free, vegetarian, vegan, etc)
- Keep fit with light and healthy recipes (with nutritional information for easy tracking in fitness apps)
- Add missing ingredients or your favourite recipes to your grocery list at the touch of a button.
- Upload your own recipes and share your favourite recipes with others

GROCERY LIST
- Create your shopping list for groceries in seconds, including quantities so that you never forget or run out of an item
- Receive automated recommendations based on your pantry inventory [recently finished, running low, frequently bought] and favourite recipes.
- You can even add your favourite brands, especially useful if asking others to do the grocery run for you
- Share your grocery list with friends and family, and mange it together in real-time
- Easily access past shopping list and track your purchases

PERSONALISED SETTINGS
- Fill in your profile details to get personalised nutritional information for recipes
- Set your specific diet preferences and allergies (gluten free, lactose free, pork free, vegetarian, vegan, no shellfish, etc).
- Choose between Metric or Imperial (US) Measurements and set your preferred currency
- An in-built tracker that tracks your achievement and helps you save money and reduce food wastage.

Still wondering if KitchenPal is for you?
- Visual, easy to use interface that our users love
- Easily add items by scanning barcodes, voice input or text input
- Customise your kitchen layout and design (food cupboard, fridge, freezer, bar, household supplies, etc)
- Manage your pantry inventory and track fridge food expiry: reduce waste and save money
- Create a new grocery list in seconds, based on an automated pantry check: no more extra grocery runs
- Manage and Share Shopping List or Kitchen with other family members 
- Easily find tailored healthy and delicious recipes to cook and eat, linked to your food inventory or if you want, search recipes by ingredient
- Save recipes to your Cookbook and even Upload your own

If you have any questions or feedback, please write to us. We started KitchenPal based on the problems we faced while cooking and shopping, and which other grocery and recipe apps didn't seem to address. Our aim is to build an app our users love and absolutely can't live without.

comments: After a while, the barcode scanning functionality (and certain other features) gets hidden behind a paywall. You need to use WiFi to access your shopping list in a grocery store. It doesn't save your sorting method between sessions. If you just want to delete an item, it still gets added to your shopping list and you'll need to delete it there, too.

So far so good, though I'm concerned by the comments about a paywall... I am putting the effort in to load my pantry info and allowing them to use the info, I hope I don't get paywall blocked halfway through...

This app is okay and kind of fun. But I have two pet peeves. So far I haven't figured out a way to add my own categories. For instance, I would like a separate category just for baking. Also it doesn't group things together by item. what I mean is I have four cans of black beans. Because they're all four different brands. They are located in four different places. so instead of saying that I have four cans of black beans, it says I have one of this brand, one of that brand, etc etc.

The closest pantry app 2 what I've designed in my head 2 meet my needs but could not execute since I'm not a programmer. Barcode scanner is best part! I agree w/some other reviews about crashing, grouping items like corn together rather than having each brand listed separately. There are some logistical issues I'd like to see improved & I'll email developers bcz app is useful enough 2 me that I paid $12 for a year of premium & I feel the developers want to keep improving the app, & will. :-)

I'd been looking for the perfect kitchen organizer app for years. Kitchenpal isn't perfect, but it's the closest one I've found and has the most potential. I love the automatically adding low items to my shopping list & the expitation date warnings. You'll spend a couple of hours getting your food scanned into the app, but it is worth the effort. Not everything you scan is in the database, but it's also easier than most apps to add or modify items.

title: Chicken Recipes
description:
Chicken recipes app offers you many light and quick recipes. These include noodles, sandwich, puffs, roasted chicken fries, grilled barbecue, chicken skewers, nachos, soup and appetizer recipes.

Festive recipes
Ultimate chicken recipes for American Super Bowl dinner party. Also, find several chicken recipes that suit any occasions like Valentine's day and Chinese New Year.

Popular tasty chicken recipes of the month
Recipes like grilled chicken, chicken breasts with mushroom cream sauce, cornflake crusted chicken, slow cooker bbq chicken legs, bbq chicken sliders, slow cooker chicken taco soup, enchilada salad and chicken cacciatore are popular.

Simple chicken recipe instructions
Every healthy chicken recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many tasty recipes for free in our Chicken recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Chicken recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite easy chicken recipes
Add your favourite tasty chicken recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved chicken recipes offline. You can also create healthy chicken recipe collections on the basis of cuisine, dinner ideas, non-vegetarian, cooking and prep time, weekend party ideas.

Easy Chicken Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for tasty chicken recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving, Easter, Christmas, Halloween recipe categories.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with the ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients features lets you search and discover chicken recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have healthy chicken recipes for people following paleo, low carb keto, gluten-free and high protein diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have seafood-free, egg-free, peanut-free, lactose-free and dairy-free recipes. Nutritional information like carbs, cholesterol, calories and fat are available in the Chicken recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be easy and healthy with Chicken recipes. Start eating easy chicken recipes with proper meal planner ideas and grocery shopping list.

We offer lots of tasty chicken recipes:
Cook tasty chicken recipes at home using 7-spices, heavy cream, baby spinach & washed and shredded. Recipes for classic healthy chicken dishes like roast chicken and root vegetables, orange chicken, chicken tamale casserole, spatchcocked saffron chicken and cheesy chicken enchiladas are available in the app. Our favourite easy chicken recipes include Roman-style chicken, Moroccan chicken brochettes, easy chicken parmigiana, and grilled chicken & vegetable tacos.

Our tasty chicken recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for soup, snacks, meatballs etc. Now that you've our chicken recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Get tasty food in the ultimate Chicken recipes app curated for USA, UK, France, India, Indonesia, Italy, Japan, Korea, Mexico, Romania, Russia and Germany. Cookbook's tasty treats with chicken are available in different languages around the world. Join the tasty universe in languages like Arabic, Espa√±ol, French (Fran√ßais), German (Deutsch), Italiano, Japanese, Korean, Nederlands, Portugues, Romana, Russian & Spanish.

title: Paleo Diet CookBook & Recipes
description:
Trying to live the Paleo Diet or Primal lifestyle but struggling with recipe boredom?  Paleo CookBook is full of wide variety of hundreds of great Paleo Diet recipes for main courses, side dishes, appetizers, desserts, soups, salads and drinks.  

Recipes are included with step-by-step instructions and nutritional information including macronutrients (calories, fat, carbohydrates, protein) and micronutrients (vitamins and minerals) so you can choose the recipe that is right for you.

Those familiar with the Paleo Diet know that the word ‚ÄúPaleo‚Äù doesn‚Äôt mean the same thing to everybody.  If you have special dietary requirements outside the broad definition of Paleo, you can specify dietary Intolerances (or Allergies) such as Dairy, Eggs, Gluten, Peanuts, Seafood and more.  Furthermore, you may elect to filter out recipes that have ingredients you don‚Äôt like or that don‚Äôt suit your dietary goals.  

SEARCH RECIPES BASED ON YOUR ALLERGIES
Filter out foods you are allergic to including dairy, eggs, gluten, peanuts, seafood, sesame, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nuts and wheat

*************************************
MORE GREAT APP FEATURES
*************************************
- Save interesting recipes for later, or schedule them for a specific meal in the future
- Save recipes you liked and keep modifications (needs more coconut oil) for next time
- Create a shopping list.  Add the ingredients of any recipe directly to your shopping list with one click. 
- Modify existing recipes to suit your tastes
- Filter out foods and ingredients you dislike

***************************************
BENEFITS OF THE PALEO DIET
***************************************
The Paleo (or Primal) Diet is associated with many health benefits due to the restriction of processed foods and refined sugar and an emphasis on whole, real foods such as meat, fish and vegetables.  Those who eat paleo typically start to see benefits such as increased energy and an improved mood in a matter of days, followed by weight loss and a leaner, more muscular physique.  The paleo diet has also been associated with better blood glucose control, better sleep, reduced inflammation, increased insulin sensitivity and improved gut health.  The paleo diet also naturally avoids wheat and gluten which are problematic or proinflammatory foods for many people.

What‚Äôs more the paleo diet is quite easy for most people to follow because it is simple and doesn‚Äôt require you to count calories or even worry about restricting the amount of food you eat.    

Basics of the Paleo (or Primal) Diet:
The following foods are allowed:  Meat, fish, eggs, vegetables, fruit, nuts, sweet potatoes
The following foods are not allowed:  Legumes, grains, dairy, refined sugar, processed foods


************************
SAY HELLO
************************
We are constantly working hard on making this app better and more useful for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the app, do not forget to rate us on play store.

comments: Lots of great recipes and great meal planner. The shopping list is very simple and adding multiple items in a recipe is rather tedious. It adds items to the list without a very good description.

Super Paleo, super awesome! This app is so helpful for my Paleo family. It helps me stay on track by figuring out how to urilize the foods I have in my fridge in a Paleo way. If my kids are feeling like seafood (yes, my kids love seafood!) I just simply type in "shrimp" or "halibut" or whatever seafood I have handy and look for a recipe that I can make that's Paleo and delicious. I'm excited to try the desserts out in m6 household and see what my kids think! This app is awesome. We love it! Yes!
Great recipes to try for people that are new to the paleo diet and easy to follow cooking instructions.

Had to start cooking for family ,this is an easy app with great pics (cause I'm a guy) easy step by step for beginner chefs....simple ,healthy, with minimal ingredients! Having fun with it ....Family hasn't been disappointed yet .
We have multiple allergies and preferences in our family. This app is a lifesaver!

title: Favor - Anything Delivered. Food, Alcohol + More
description:
Favor is the easiest way to get anything you want in your city delivered to your door in under an hour. 

New users: See why Favor is Texas‚Äô favorite delivery app‚Äîdownload it today and get 
FREE DELIVERIES your first 2 weeks! 

Favor delivers what you want, when you want it. Want to order Chinese food? Need to order beer or wine? Our personal assistants (we call them Runners) are ready to help with quick delivery from any of your favorite restaurants and stores. 

Stay safe and healthy with Doorstep Deliveries, a 100% contact-free delivery experience. Your order will be dropped off at your door, and you can still contact your Runner by text. 

Favor is also supporting local businesses throughout Texas with Local Favorites. Now, you can get free and discounted deliveries from hundreds of the local restaurants you love. 

Whether it‚Äôs lunch at the office, dinner at home, or those quick trips you just don‚Äôt have time for‚Äîwe can deliver it in just a couple taps.
