New Features
‚Ä¢ We thought it‚Äôd be cool to view pictures of the items you‚Äôre ordering. Our menus now have that functionality. Keep your eyes peeled for these delectable photos, they‚Äôre coming.
Bug Fixes
‚Ä¢ Occasionally placing an order would result in a blank Favor. This is obviously sub-optimal, to say the least. We fixed it.
‚Ä¢ We found a crash where the app would try to read a number, just say nope, and shut down to protect its sanity. Now the app has the confidence to compute, no matter what.
comments: Works great, though lacks some modern features associated with most delivery apps. No real-time tracking of the runner on the map. Card scanning function is iffy if all the info is on the back of the card. The entry fields for new cards aren't recognized as autofill fields for Google Pay. Support is friendly and helpful if anything does go wrong with your order.

While I think the app is great it's lacking the following : Cannot build an order ahead of time if the restaurant is closed. Cannot look at other restaurants without clearing items in cart. Few promo codes compared to other delivery services Menu item descriptions are usually missing $0 delivery item link does not display complete list

This app sucks. Can't login after it logged me out. Hit reset password and it sends an email or so it says. I never get it. I say if you can't get your app to work just give up the business. I'm done with Favor.
Menus are not used friendly, most places don't have the full menus, or doesn't have simplest things on the menu. Takes a very long time to get orders usually
This is easily my favorite food delivery app. Very customizable and easy to use. Lots of deals and local stuff, too.

title: Ice Cream Recipes
description:
Ice cream is a frozen dessert usually made from dairy products, such as milk and cream, and often combined with fruits or other ingredients and flavors. Ice cream recipes are very easy to prepare. Many 5 minutes easy and quick recipes are there. Most varieties contain sugar, although some are made with other sweeteners. Ice cream is a sweetened frozen food typically eaten as a snack or dessert. It may be made from dairy milk or cream and is flavored with a sweetener, either sugar or an alternative, and any spice, such as cocoa or vanilla. Ice cream is also known as frozen custard, frozen yogurt, sorbet, gelato, and others are used to distinguish different varieties and styles.

In some countries, such as the United States, "ice cream" applies only to a specific variety. Ice cream can be served with other desserts, such as apple pie, or as an ingredient in ice cream floats, sundaes, milkshakes, ice cream cakes and even baked items, such as Baked Alaska. India is one of the largest producers of ice cream in the world, but most of its ice cream is consumed domestically. Make homemade ice cream in exactly the flavor you crave. Give everybody something to scream over with these yummy ice cream recipes you can.

Our app contains recipes for French ice cream that is basically ice cream with egg(custard). In addition to that our app has homemade recipes for delicious mango, Vanilla, Paleo Mango, Kiwi, Chocolate and many more. Having ice cream after dinner is very common. Gelato is made from whole milk, sugar, sometimes eggs, and natural flavorings. Ice cream is loved more by kids.

OUR APP EXPERIENCE

This app is simple to navigate and also has multiple tutorials available on how to use the app.
As the recipe is a set of instructions for cooking, our app also provides nutritional information, servings, total time for preparation and recommendations so that nothing can go wrong when you‚Äôre cooking.

Theme Support

Protect your eyes from being hurt by a bright screen at night by enabling dark mode.
Make your ice cream cooking experience more comfortable at night.

Smart Shopping List for Your Frozen Desserts

An organized shopping list allows the user to create ingredients list so you won‚Äôt miss any for the recipe. Users can also add items directly from recipes.
It also has offline access.

Search 1M+ Ice Cream Recipes

Apart from shopping list our app also provides a global search feature
where you can find the recipes you looking for or discover new recipes

Collect Your Favorite Desserts

Use our bookmark button to save and organize ice cream recipes in your favorite recipe list. They also have offline access.

Personal Profile

Do you have a wonderful ice cream recipe that you‚Äôd like to share? We would love for you to upload it. To submit your tasty recipe all you need to create an account. In addition to that, you can also upload your tasty food photos, and leave feedback, comments, and tips over our chef community.

Native Language

Another key feature of our app is it supports multiple languages.
Currently, we offer around 13 main languages.

Recipes Finder

Recipe Finder can help you find a good recipe based on what you have in your fridge. You can provide a list of ingredients you have and bounce ideas off recipe finder so you never end up wasting any food!

Download the free Ice Cream Recipes app today. Happy Cooking!

Do a cafe makeover, participate in covet culinary fashion and create masterpieces in this awesome kitchen game and become a hero chef and join the chef world. Take part in the cooking craze at your tasty restaurant and spread the cooking fever with Flo & Emily with a dash in the chefs' guilds.

title: Healthy food recipes
description:
Healthy food recipes app offers you many healthy and light recipes. These include low-carb recipes, crock pot recipes, dessert recipes, slow cooker recipes, soup recipes, stew recipes, recipes for keto diet and recipes for cake.

Festive recipes
Celebrate this festive season with healthy recipes for¬† Chinese New year, American super bowl, romantic recipes for valentine's day and much more.

Popular healthy crockpot recipes of the month
Recipes like ravioli & vegetable soup, hash brown casserole, crunchy coleslaw with buttermilk dressing, bean and capsicum salad, summer shrimp and pineapple stir-fry, caesar salad, roman-style chicken and pork tenderloin with seasoned rub are popular in January & February.

Simple healthy recipe instructions with picture
Every weight loss diet recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many tasty recipes for free in our Healthy food recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Healthy food recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite slow cooker recipes
Add your favourite diet plan recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved keto diet plan recipes offline. You can also create healthy casserole recipe collections on the basis of dinner ideas, weekend party ideas, vegetarian, weight loss diet plan, cooking and prep time etc.

Fitness Diet Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for healthy crockpot recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover healthy recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have weight loss diet recipes for people following vegetarian, paleo, high- protein and low- carb diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have peanut-free recipes, gluten-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, lactose-free recipes and dairy-free. Nutritional information like calories, cholesterol, carbs and fat are available in the Healthy food recipes app.

Create Meal plans

Cook tasty keto diet plan recipes at home using molasses, basil, green sweet pepper & ground ginger. Our healthy crockpot recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for healthy brunch, casserole, healthy dinner etc. Now that you've our healthy recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: Easy Vegetarian
description:
Here you‚Äôll find everything you need for a successful vegetarian diet - loads of quick vegetarian and vegan recipes, easy to use shopping lists and lots of helpful vegetarian information at your fingertips.

The Easy Vegetarian App was created by the people behind hurrythefoodup.com, namely Kat, Dave and Hauke. Over time we‚Äôve built up a great resource of quick and nutritious vegan and vegetarian recipes. 

Our goal: making the switch to the vegetarian diet as easy as possible. We think recipes should be enjoyable and not a constant source of worry or second guessing. So, of course, we needed an app with easy vegetarian recipes too!

EASY VEGETARIAN APP FEATURES

- Almost 200 Vegan and Vegetarian Recipes - more added every week
- Many high protein recipes
- Nutrition information with each recipe
- Shopping List ‚Äì add ingredients from any vegetarian recipe or add ingredients manually
- Smart Ingredient Sorting ‚Äì your ingredients on the shopping list are divided by recipe.
- Favorites Section - save your fave vegetarian recipes in one handy list
- Read offline - available only for the recipes you visited before
- The Veggie Guide - we answer all important questions around the vegetarian diet
- Many more features on their way

ALMOST 200 VEGAN AND VEGETARIAN RECIPES!

You can choose from close to 200 vegan and vegetarian recipes, more added every week. Most of them are done in much less than 30 minutes and are very nutritious. Best of all, we love high protein recipes, so you‚Äôll find many of those as well.

If you're already a seasoned vegetarian we‚Äôre confident that we can surprise you with a couple of creative vegetarian recipes you haven‚Äôt come across yet. 

That being said, we work with a team of professional chefs to develop vegetarian recipes that are exciting, easy and come out great.

This is what our recipes will help you with in a nutshell:

- easily make the transition from meat to meat-free
- get all the nutrients you need (yep, especially protein and other essentials)
- make vegetarian cooking as easy effortless as possible without sacrificing the taste

ABOUT THE VEGETARIAN DIET

The vegetarian diet excludes the consumption of meat (also poultry and fish) as well as any by-products of animal slaughter like rennet and gelatin.

The vegan diet goes one step further and removes all animal products from the menu, meaning meat and also dairy, eggs and honey. 

Roughly half of our recipes are vegan, the rest includes dairy and/or eggs.

GOING VEGETARIAN IS COMPLETELY SAFE AND HEALTHY

The American Dietetic Association says an appropriately planned vegetarian diet including vegan diets are healthful, nutritionally adequate, and may provide health benefits in the prevention and treatment of certain diseases. With that opinion, they‚Äôre in line with Harvard Medical School as well.

We keep a close eye to their guidelines when developing our vegetarian recipes. That doesn‚Äôt mean there are no ‚Äúnaughty recipes‚Äù on our app, but our focus is mostly on the healthy side.

THE VEGGIE GUIDE INCLUDES:

- Why Become a Vegetarian?
- What Going Vegetarian Can Do For You
- Proteins
- Fats (Omega 3 vs Omega 6)
- Vitamin B12
- Iron
- Is a Vegetarian Diet Healthier Than a Diet Including Meat
- How to Make a Gradual Switch to a Vegetarian Diet
- How to Announce Going Vegetarian
- Losing Weight on a Vegetarian Diet

The current version of the EASY VEGETARIAN App is just the beginning and we‚Äôre more than happy to receive feature requests. Oh, and if you have any cool easy vegetarian recipe ideas you think we should create, we‚Äôre all ears!

For any (recipe) ideas and feedback please send an email to hello@hurrythefoodup.com - Thank you!

A big thank you to Martin, our talented developer! The Easy Vegetarian App would still be only wishful thinking without your help.

Curious what else we‚Äôre up to? Make sure you check us out at hurrythefoodup.com for more delicious vegetarian recipes, meal plans and articles all around the vegetarian diet.

summary: Quick and easy vegetarian recipes, shopping lists and much more!
comments: A lovely range of vegetarian recipes all in one app! I've only recently 'turned' vegetarian. This app is actually a really helpful tool and gives some wonderful recipes and new ideas (like noodle omelette, yum yum!) Thank you for your help in my first steps! :)

Haven't tried cooking anything, so I cannot speak as to the quality of the recipes (amateur cooking skills notwithstanding), but most dishes look quite delicious just from the pictures. Each recipe has an estimate for preparation time and nutritional information, and you can click on any one of the ingredients to add them to a shopping list!
Easy to navigate. The shopping list feature makes it easy to gather ingredients and menu plan. The food is delicious and most of the recipes are quick and easy.

Really great app with diverse recipes. I love that it displays nutritional Facts, otherwise I would not have pursued it. I would like to see more uniformity on telling u what a serving size is. Some recipes have it some do not. Other than that amazing! And thank you !!!

I feel like the recipes I've tried are simple, look and taste like they have quality, and I'm getting a much more healthy diet as a relatively new vegetarian. I also like how it doesn't have ads. The only thing i would change is being able to adjust servings.

title: RP Diet Coach
description:
Get in the best shape of your life by planning what you eat with a diet coach in your pocket. Designed by top PhDs and Registered Dietitians to transform your body, the RP Diet Coach will help you look and perform your best. 
 
What You Get:

 ‚Ä¢ Personalized macro breakdowns based on your body and fitness goals.
 ‚Ä¢ Meal timing recommendations that will help you maximize results, decrease hunger, and maintain muscle. 
 ‚Ä¢ Diet filters including Dairy-Free, Vegetarian, Vegan, Paleo, Gluten-Free, Grain-Free, and Low FODMAP.
 ‚Ä¢ Smart scheduling accommodates all schedules - including night shift and intermittent fasting.
 ‚Ä¢ Meal prep made easy with our automatic shopping list made from your food choices.
 ‚Ä¢ Weekly diet review - recommends changes to your diet based on your progress and goals.
 ‚Ä¢ Food database of over 750,000 foods and constantly growing.
 ‚Ä¢ Barcode scanner and restaurant search - mostly US, but more international foods coming soon!
 
How It Works:

 ‚Ä¢ Enter your info and choose your fitness goal: lose fat, gain muscle, or maintain your weight.
 ‚Ä¢ You choose your foods - the app tells you how much and when to eat.
 ‚Ä¢ Every week, review your progress and the app will recommend an updated plan for the next week.
 ‚Ä¢ Get results!
 
 
With thousands of 5-star reviews (world-wide) and a free 14-day trial, now's the time to get on the right path to finally reach your health and fitness goals!
 
Who We Are:

RP is a group of leading sport scientists, dietitians, and coaches with a proven track record of amazing results with hundreds of thousands of members across the world, including countless pounds lost. After years of diet and nutrition coaching, we've used the data and results from this to create the cutting-edge algorithm that powers the RP Diet Coach App.
  
If you purchase a RP Diet Coach subscription, please note billing and charges are done through your Google Play account and auto-renewed based on your subscription term. At the end of the term, unless auto-renewable subscriptions are disabled, your subscription will automatically renew in your Google Play account. You will be charged for the regular price of your subscription within 24 hours prior to the end of the current term. Your subscription can be managed or cancelled in your Google Play Account Settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://renaissanceperiodization.com/rp-diet-app/privacy-policy

Terms of Service:
https://renaissanceperiodization.com/rp-diet-app/terms-of-use

comments: It's a great program that provides results even if you don't have 100% adherence! (Though much better results if you do, of course). The update that just came out in Oct. 2020 has caused some growing pains as new features are integrated and kinks are ironed out, but the dev team seems to be working hard to fix issues asap. I see no reason for the hissy fits some people are throwing about slight delays in waiting for the app stores to approve the updates. Very glad I got this app!

I loved the old version but the new version I just downloaded on the 10/22/20 is very confusing. For example it says I go to bed at 2100 and wake up to eat at 2330? I am having a really hard time with this.
App has again been updated and is working as it should.

So I'm paying $15 / month for a diet app that won't let me start a fat loss diet. Their support desks solution was wait for the update after next! Thanks for being patient! Translation: you're a sucker
Please add mini cut cycle. Also the day is starting from midnight and the last meal is carrying over to the next day. That's kind of weird.

title: Open Food Facts - Scan food. Get the Nutriscore
description:
‚ñ∂ Scan, find & compare more than 1,3 million food products

The app allows to scan the 1,3 million products already contained in the free and open database Open Food Facts.
The app is collaborative. If we don't have the product, you can add pictures and data to get the Nutri-Score and NOVA score on food processing.

In short, we're kind of "the Wikipedia of food", as many have nicknamed the project. Open Food Facts has enabled the creation of over 100 apps like Date Limite, Yuka or FoodVisor.

To discover the volunteer-run Open Food Facts project, visit https://world.openfoodfacts.org/discover

‚ñ∂ Choose the products that are good for you

‚ûú The Nutri-Score grade, from A to E :  Nutritional quality
‚ûú The NOVA group, from 1 to 4 : Avoid ultra-processed foods (Group 4)

‚ñ∂ Contribute to Food Transparency

‚ûú Open Food Facts is a food products database made by everyone, for everyone.
‚ûú You can use it to make better food choices, and as it is open data, anyone can re-use it for any purpose.
‚ûú You can start contributing today by adding a product from your fridge.
‚ûú Open Food Facts is a non-profit project developed by thousands of volunteers from around the world. We have lots of exciting projects you can contribute to in many different ways.

‚ñ∂ Decipher food labels

‚ûú Open Food Facts helps you decipher products labels. You will be able to find:
‚ûú carbon footprint (CO2 emissions) and packaging (as well as recycling instructions),
‚ûú Nutriscore (nutritional score), nutrients, fat / fat content, saturated fatty acids, carbohydrates, sugars, fiber, protein and salt and sodium.
‚ûú brands, allergens, labels (bio, gluten free, vegan, vegetarian, halal, kosher ...), traceability information (packaging codes, origins of ingredients)
‚ûú On wines and beers, you will find the alcohol content.

‚ñ∂ Our grades are science-based, and the project is helping science back!
‚ûú We don't make up things. We rely on peer-reviewed science.
‚ûú The Nutri-Score has been created by the independent French team led by Professor Hercberg.
‚ûú The NOVA groups on food processing have been designed by the international team of Professor Monteiro.
‚ûú The additives synthesis is based on reviews by EFSA on exposure levels on food additives.
‚ûú The Open Food Facts community is collaborating with research teams across the planet to improve nutrition research that benefits all.

‚ñ∂ Works well in any condition
‚ûú You can add new products, even with bad or no Internet connection
‚ûú The app loads only the minimum to reduce data and battery consumption
‚ûú You don't need a camera to look up a product. You can also type the barcode if you lack a camera or have an issue with it.

‚ñ∂ Your food, your data. Privacy-friendly app.
‚ûú Your data is yours, and is never sent online
‚ûú You can use the app anonymously
‚ûú You can export your scan history

‚ñ∂ Set up allergen alerts on products
‚ûú Milk, Gluten, Eggs, Soybeans, Nuts, Fish, Celery, Mustard, Sulphur dioxide and sulphites, Peanuts, Sesame seeds, Crustaceans, Molluscs or Lupin allergy ?
‚ûú Speed up your shopping by doing an initial screening of your food with Open Food Facts.
‚ûú Be careful that the information may not be 100% accurate, and detection may not be 100% accurate. So always double check by yourself, with the packaging.

‚ñ∂ More

Open Food Facts is also available on the web at https://world.openfoodfacts.org
Questions, feedback : contact@openfoodfacts.org

summary: Scan food and to get ingredients, additives and nutrition facts
recentChanges:
All 25k OFF volunteers kept working hard: 1,4M products, 182 countries üôÇ
1. OFF goes big in the US: 237k products with Nutri-Score !
2. Dark mode: lighter on your eyes, lighter on your battery
3. Help compute Nutri-Score: slide up for blue questions & get credited for your answers.
4. Massive improvements to the vegan, vegetarian & palm oil detection.
5. Instant product edition even with bad or no network
6. Products To Be Completed page (right menu) is now real time.
comments: I like the Yuka app better because of the overall grade and the quick and easy explanations on additives, but Open Food Facts is a more open system where everyone can edit & improve product information, irrespective of the country /language (for example Yuka does not cover Dutch products).

Opened database relies on people data feeds. Product addition requires 2 minutes with training. Above nutrition facts and labels, you get NOVA food classification (i.e. 4 processing levels defined by UN), vegan compliance and palm oil flags. You can build your product lists. You can review scanned products later (/ local logs). If you don't want to rely on advertising and don't have enough time to inspect packaging, you should try it.

Great, now I can scan and see what's ultra processed! Still there's no Nova scale for marigold nutritional yeast flakes :( I guess it's only minimally processed? Because it's yeast that's dried with no additives, flavourings, colourings, added salt etc? I hope so any great source of B12 for vegans :)
Fantastic way to find out about food ingredients. And you can share info about new products that haven't been added yet.
Quite interesting, although I feel there are more than a few products that are missing.

title: Calorie Counter - MyNetDiary, Food Diary Tracker
description:
Discover the diet app that takes care of what the other apps don‚Äôt. MyNetDiary - sleek, smart, simple. It's your personal weight-loss, diet, and nutrition assistant.
 
Rated #1 mobile diet app by American Journal of Preventive Medicine. 
 
Recognized by The New York Times as ‚Äúsimpler‚Ä¶ quicker‚Ä¶ also, it looks nicer‚Äù comparing with other similar apps.

Also featured in ABC, USA Today, Fox, Consumer Reports, Chicago Tribune, and The Wall Street Journal

THE PROOF IS IN THE NUMBERS
‚óè Over 9 million members. 
‚óè Average active members lose a 1.4 lbs each week
‚óè Active members demonstrate 27 lbs or over 12% body weight loss within the first 7 months
  
BEING HEALTHY HAS NEVER BEEN EASIER
‚óè Set a weight goal
‚óè Enter a target date ( vacation, wedding, or reunion )
‚óè Get a calculated Calorie Plan
‚óè Log daily meals and exercise

recentChanges: Accelerate your weight-loss with Premium Diets - plan and track net carbs, get special premium recipes, articles library, diet advice and guidance from the virtual coach, and all of the Premium tools in MyNetDiary.
comments: All I wanted was a food diary to add up calories. I found it knows how many calories in restaurant foods, brand name items in my pantry, even homemade stuff! I told it how much weight I wanted to lose and it gave me how many calories a day to shoot for. Easy! Then it suggested I add a little activity, which it has a complete table of excercises and calorie burn. I can even add in vitamins! Best free app on my phone! 9 pounds off in 3 wks, and before I couldn't seem to lose anything. Try it!

Started using this again and it is driving me nuts. Why can't EVERY item have the option of weight!!! Why cups??? Weight!! Then having created a meal and scanned all bar codes and weighed every item there was no where to say it's a meal for 4. So I get all 4 meals added for my dinner. And no way to edit it. Obviously I have not created my meal correctly but I shouldn't have that option. I could go on but I won't. So frustrating as could be very good

It's free and easy to use. Great way of tracking the energy that goes in (calories) and energy that goes out (exercise) and showing you what difference you need to be able to lose/sustain/gain weight. It scans most foods so quick and simple. I haven't yet for how to add a recipe (maybe due to lack of time and looking!?) I have recommended this app to people that want to lose weight.

Fantastic app for tracking calories! It's so easy to either scan a barcode, look up a food, or create one. Great planning tools as well. Premium is worth it if, say, you want to track more specific stuff or change your macro percentages. Two (display) features I want added are: 1. Ability to simply change the order (drag/drop) of foods logged because sometimes I'll log what I plan to eat, then add stuff that ruins the order. 2. Ability to organize the home screen (being able to drag widgets).

This app is so easy to use. I find that during this time of covid19 scare it works for me. I even went for the extended plan where I paid for the year and can't believe how great it is. My daughter inlaw also is on it. So far she has out done me. We're both on our final 18lbs to go. Now the race is on. I recommend very much the free version but I know once you get used to it you will want to try the extended. Now that i highly recommend.

title: Instant Pot
description:
Welcome to the official Instant Pot¬Æ app ‚Äì your home for fast, delicious and easy recipes for the growing Instant Family of appliances from Pressure Cookers to Air Fryers and Blenders.‚Äã

The Instant Pot recipe app makes it easy to search recipes, save favorites, make notes, and even create grocery lists so you can get to fun part  - cooking tasty meals!‚Äã

Features:‚Äã

Instantly access our ever-growing database of nearly 1,000 recipes for the Instant Pot, Instant Vortex Air Fryers, Instant Omni Toaster Ovens, and Instant Ace Blenders‚Äã

Learn useful tips and tricks ‚Äì whether you‚Äôre an Instant Pot newbie who‚Äôs just getting started, or an Instant Pot pro, looking to test your skills in the kitchen. ‚Äã

Discover how to make the most of your Instant Pot. When should I use preset functions?  When should I use natural or quick pressure release?  What is sous vide? Find answers to those questions and many more. ‚Äã

Get inspired! Try new cuisines like Mediterranean, Korean, Chinese, Indian, Latin and more.‚Äã

Find easy recipes that fit your diet and lifestyle.  We‚Äôve got plenty of ideas, for our paleo, keto, diabetic, vegan, dairy-free or gluten-free friends!‚Äã

Learn new ways to cook popular foods like eggs, rice, and chicken or try your hand at something a little sweeter - like baking cheesecakes, brownies and cobblers‚Äã

‚Äã

Cook faster, easier, healthier and tastier meals with the Instant Pot and the Instant family of appliances!‚Äã

comments: No help for the Instant Pot Duo Crisp. The manual the Duo crisp comes with says to visit the website for recipes & help. The website says download the app & the app says to cook ur food in the Instant pot then transfer to the oven to crisp the exterior. The app doesnt even recognize the Duo Crisp as an appliance. I expected more from Instant pot. Everyone says it's the best and they cant live without it but my experience has been the opposite every time I try to use this thing. Very frustrating!

The search function requires a lot of improvement - for example if you type yoghurt (yogurt) the results doesn't put yoghurt recipes at the top - you have to scroll through loads of pointless results until you find an actual yoghurt recipe. If the search worked as expected it would be a very useful app

Great companion with the InstaPot! Recipes are easy to follow and even have timers if you click on the recipe link. I like being able to search an ingredient and then have tons of options to choose from for what I want to make.

Instant pot aura pro not included I recently purchased the instant pot Aura Pro and was hoping to find additional recipes to use. Looking over some of the recipes and they all seem to be for the instant pot pressure cooker. The Aura Pro is not a pressure cooker. Please update to include recipes for this appliance. In the meantime, I have no use for this app.
It needs improvement. I've a Instant Pot Smart Wifi model but the app doesn't work with it in Android mode. The App doesn't show Devices option at all. It has tons of recipes to choose from however.

title: Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker - Medisafe
description:
Get the free ‚ÄúMUST HAVE‚Äù award-winning pill reminder and medication tracker ranked #1 by pharmacists, physicians and patients. Join the millions of people using Medisafe who are taking control of their medication management with our free app - stay on track and never miss another med.

üíä Features
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder and alarm for all medication needs
‚Ä¢ Drug-to-drug interaction checker
‚Ä¢ Family and caregiver support via ‚ÄúMedfriend‚Äù functionality
‚Ä¢ Medicine tracker
‚Ä¢ Refill reminders
‚Ä¢ Dr appointment manager and calendar
‚Ä¢ Support for complex dose schedules 
‚Ä¢ Add ‚Äúas needed‚Äù medications, vitamins and supplements
‚Ä¢ Full selection of OTC and RX medications
‚Ä¢ Daily, weekly & monthly med reporting with logbook to share with your doctor
‚Ä¢ Track health measurements for various medical conditions (diabetes, hypertension, cancer, anxiety, depression, HIV, multiple sclerosis, MS, Crohn‚Äôs, lymphoma, myeloma and leukemia) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels
‚Ä¢ Android Wear enabled
‚Ä¢ Customizable reminders and time settings (i.e weekend mode so you can sleep in)
‚Ä¢ Automatic time zone detection
‚Ä¢ Easily customize your pill reminder notifications. 

‚ù§Ô∏è A Health Tracker Built for You
Medisafe doesn‚Äôt just remind you to take your meds. As a medication management platform, Medisafe is a comprehensive tool that compiles all of your medical and health information in one place: pill and medicine reminders, drug-to-drug interactions, refill alerts, doctor appointments, and health journal with 20+ trackable health measurements


üîíPrivacy
‚Ä¢ Medisafe is available for free and no registration is required
‚Ä¢ We comply with strict privacy laws (HIPAA and GDPR compliant) to safeguard medical information


‚úÖ App Permission Information
Read Your Contacts - used if you choose to add a doctor or Medfriend. The app never stores your address book content and it doesn‚Äôt access your address book without asking you first. 
Find Accounts on the Device - Medisafe uses push notifications to Medfriends to let those with permission know if the main user has forgotten to take medication.

comments: After a rocky start, I have finally figured out this app and it's almost perfect! Sometimes I run into issues when I experience a time change (for travel or daylight savings), and I would love an option to record a ketone measurement. Other than those, I'm so grateful that this app helps me keep track of my son's complicated medication schedule!

Honestly, this is a life saver! I was losing track of all the meds i was taking, missing out numerous doses and occasionally taking medication twice by accident! This app allows me to add all my medication (and give it an icon that actually looks like the tabley/inhaler/etc) and set up reminders for each day. The great thing is that if I'm in the middle of something and can't take my meds there and then, I can "snooze" the reminder to go off in 5/10/15+ minutes! Fantastic app :-)

This was a good app on my last phone but on my new phone it's very unreliable. Customer support sorted out my problems last time but now it's missing reminders again and I've changed nothing. It's happening every few days. I think the recent update killed it. I've never encountered a more troublesome app, ever! I'm now looking for another medication tracker as these problems seem to be more trouble than they're worth. EDIT: Rating lowered to 2 stars due to app breaking again after another bad update and customer support not responding for 17 days. I've resorted to using my bedside alarm clock and a paper note for guaranteed reminders. EDIT2: I did contact customer support. You choose to not respond. I'm not going to beg for help. Sort your app out. 20 people agree with me so far.

Reminds me when to take my meds and every week it lets me know how often I have missed them. If I miss my meds I am asked a multiple choice question of why. At the end of the week I am able to see why I miss my meds so I have insight on how to fix the situation. This app is better than I expected, although it could be a tad more user friendly.

I found a few glitches here and there but this app is very well done if you're somebody like me who has several serious medical conditions requiring medications at different times a day and you'd like to track on the effectiveness of such medication highly recommend this app. The designers and developers really did put the user in the driver's seat. There is still some work that could be done however I'm extremely impressed and I use this app every day multiple times a day. I love it.

title: Bitesnap: Photo Food Tracker and Calorie Counter
description:
Bitesnap is a fun and easy way to track what you eat. It saves you time by recognizing what's on your plate. 

Check out what our users have to say:
- ‚ÄúI LOVE THIS APP..it is really keeping me on track i have never ate this well on other calorie app there's something about taking a picture that really helps keep track of your intake‚Äù
- ‚ÄúIncredibly easy to use, remarkably intuitive, and great functionality. Best food journal type app I've come across because of its combination of ease of use and features.‚Äù
- ‚ÄúI think its genius. It makes logging food so simple and it even breaks screening down into percentages. All the stars!!‚Äù

Keeping track of your diet has never been this easy. Bitesnap figures out the foods in the picture, letting you track calories and nutrients without the hassle of entering items by hand. Ditch your text log and get the full picture of your diet by seeing what you eat. 

Whether you're trying to lose weight, eat more healthily, or just want more insight into your diet, Bitesnap can simplify your life by making logging a breeze! 

Try it today to start building healthy eating habits.

FEATURES
- Log your meals in seconds with our advanced image recognition
- Track calories, macros and micronutrients
- Stay on track with customized targets based on your weight loss goals
- Log past meals in a single snap with past meal recognition
- Scan barcodes for packaged products
- Quickly copy frequently eaten meals with our smart suggestions
- Share your log with your trainer or nutritionist with free export to CSV
- Keep a visual diary of your meals

comments: Love the idea of taking pics for food diary! It's great whether you're visually tracking or following specific macronutrients. Something I might like differently is having the actual # I set for macros listed on the graph for the day as it does not show that now (just bars that never end?) I would also like the #s instead of the percentages on the home page, but that's just a personal preference. Otherwise this app has been great for tracking food intake and my weight for a bikini competition!

Its a really good app, but i feel like the whole point of this app was to make it easier for you to log meals. Taking a picture of your meal and the app figuring out what your meal consists of is what is suppose to set this app apart from other apps like it. So that could use a little work, but overall it's the best meal logging app i have came across so far.

Really good and usable with just enough features, but there are a few issues. The biggest thing for me is that it doesn't have a large database of prepackaged or fast food. This is a major advantage to competing apps. The second main issue is that the UX is a bit confusing. After adding one meal it's not clear what you're supposed to do at first.

Pretty happy with it so far. It's a lot easier than any other food tracking app I've tried, and it's the first time I feel like I can stick to it! There are some usability things that I think could use some work though (there's no inertia scrolling on some screens, and sometimes navigating is a little unintuitive). Thanks for the great app! :)

Best food tracker app in the whole Pkaystore! I enjoy the app because it is simple to use. Recording of the food can be done by having the app take a picture or putting in the name of the food. The amount of food eaten is easily adjusted by a on screen slide chart. All of the information is in a easy to see size. Yes, it is totally free! Nutritional information is provided and it is easily tailored to what you want to see. Carbs, protein and fat count is nicely displayed as well.

comments: This app used to be brilliant, inspiring and easy to use. The updates and new features are time consuming and creatively crippling. Now to find a simple recipe you have to put in all the ingredients you have and even then the search results are sadly limited. Like hello, I'm looking for a recipe to fit the couple of ingredients I want to use up and am *going to buy the other stuff I need*.I've used this app for years but it's extremely unhelpful now, will be looking for an alternative.

App is pretty decent really like the way to have the pantry ready recipies section available. Wish you could add corresponding cookware, where you could add more types of recipes that require different types of tools and cookware. not everyone has a blender or cupcake pans available to them to make some recipes. it'd be nice for unexperienced cooks to have that option to know what to use to cook their food with.

I do not like how you have to tap a button to get directions. I wish they were just done at the bottom of the recipe. I'm also having trouble getting the directions, it just says something like how they're having technical issues. I do really like how organized things are! And how aesthetically pleasing the app is

This app is basically a search engine for cooking; food & recipes. It also includes useful features for tailored results, building recipe lists and of your in the right place, making a shopping list - although the auto-shopping features will not not work for me in Adelaide, South Australia.

I love this app. Been a long-time Pinterest user, but there's just too much other stuff on Pinterest and I like the fact that I can find what I want and not have all the other junk come up too. Great job!

title: Gluten Free recipes with photo offline
descriptionHTML:
A gluten-free diet (GFD) is a diet that strictly excludes gluten, a mixture of proteins found in wheat and related grains, including barley, rye, oat, and all their species and hybrids (such as spelt, kamut, and triticale). Gluten is a composite of storage proteins termed prolamins.

Gluten proteins have low nutritional and biological value, and the grains that contain gluten are not essential in the human diet. However, an unbalanced selection of food and an incorrect choice of gluten-free replacement products may lead to nutritional deficiencies. Quinoa, amaranth, and buckwheat are healthy alternatives to these prepared products and have high biological and nutritional value. A gluten-free diet should be mainly based on naturally gluten-free foods with a good balance of micro and macro nutrients: meat, fish, eggs, milk and dairy products, legumes, nuts, fruits, vegetables, potatoes, rice, and maize are all appropriate components of such a diet.

title: mySugr - Diabetes App & Blood Sugar Tracker
description:
Have your diabetes under control today, it's quick and easy!

Ranked the Top Diabetes App by Healthline 3 times. Featured in Forbes, TechCrunch, and The Washington Post.

The mySugr Diabetes App is your loyal and free diabetes logbook, which keeps your diabetes data under control. With one app you'll have:
‚Ä¢ Blood sugar tracker
‚Ä¢ Carb logger

mySugr: make diabetes suck less ‚ù§Ô∏è

Adding the mySugr Diabetes App to your daily routine with diabetes (Type 1, Type 2, or Gestational diabetes) will make your life easier. It auto-logs your data plus you can collect your daily therapy info such as:
‚Ä¢ Meals
‚Ä¢ Diet
‚Ä¢ Meds
‚Ä¢ Blood glucose levels

‚òÜ APP FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Easy and personalized dashboard (diet, meds, carb intake, meals, blood glucose levels and more).
‚Ä¢ Clear blood sugar level graphs.
‚Ä¢ Estimated HbA1c at a glance, no more surprises.
‚Ä¢ Motivating challenges and feedback.
‚Ä¢ Daily, weekly and monthly medical analysis.
‚Ä¢ Detailed reports to your doctor.
‚Ä¢ Secure data backup (built with regulatory compliance, quality, and safety).

‚òÜ INTEGRATIONS

‚Ä¢ Steps, activity, blood pressure, CGM data, weight, and more.
+ USA: Accu-Chek¬Æ Aviva Connect; Accu-Chek¬Æ Performa Connect; Accu-Chek¬Æ Guide, Accu-Chek¬Æ Guide Me (activate mySugr PRO for no charge! Please see our FAQ on the website for the latest information).
+ Australia: Accu-Chek¬Æ Aviva Connect, Accu-Chek¬Æ Guide, Accu-Chek¬Æ Instant & Accu-Chek¬Æ Mobile
+ Ireland: Accu-Chek¬Æ Mobile

‚òÜ PRO FEATURES

Take your diabetes therapy to the next level! mySugr PRO can be activated at no charge with some Accu-Chek¬Æ; devices or with a monthly or yearly subscription.

‚Ä¢ Smart search: build your own searchable database of places, meals, activity, tags, etc.
‚Ä¢ Insulin Calculator (EU only): calculate your insulin dose, corrections, and meal shots.
‚Ä¢ PDF & Excel reports: save or print all your data for you or your doctor.
‚Ä¢ Blood glucose reminders: you won't forget to check and log.
‚Ä¢ Meal photos: snap your meals to improve your carb counting.
‚Ä¢ Basal rates: for pump users.

Get it now! The best logbook to monitor, control and manage your diabetes: all your medical information right on your smartphone and ready to be used! Stay on top of your health, monitor your diet, manage your medicine intake, avoid hypers / hypos, and be in control of your health every day!

SUPPORT:
We are always working to make the mySugr Diabetes App better, and we need your feedback! Have a problem, criticism, question, suggestion, or praise? Get in touch at:

‚Ä¢ mysugr.com
‚Ä¢ facebook.com/mysugr
‚Ä¢ support@mysugr.com

https://legal.mysugr.com/documents/general_terms_of_service_us/current.html
https://legal.mysugr.com/documents/privacy_policy_us/current.html

###

Upgrading to mySugr PRO will charge your Play Store account. Your subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Cancellation of the current active subscription period is not allowed. Your subscription and auto-renewal options can be managed in Account Settings in the Play Store settings after purchase.

comments: I've been using the app for several months, ever since the VA shipped me a new Guide Me meter. The linkup between the phone and meter is pretty cool, and works well most of the time. When it doesn't, it's usually because my older LG v20 decided to take a break. The big weakness for me is reporting. I should be able to view category averages in-app, like Fasting, etc. When my healthcare provider asks me what my fasting average is, my response now is "Duh?" Then I start scrolling through all the entries and say, "Well, on this day it was X, and on this day it was Y." Give me a button to tap to show 30/90-day category averages; otherwise those categories and such are useless. For that matter, I should be able to see those same averages in the report I export. You're making this report useless for us to share with our care providers, because it's too much work to extract useful data from it. You let us enter all sorts of cool numbers, like basal, bolus, and so forth. But you don't give us an uesful way to view the data. So why should I enter all of those numbers. And there's really no need for the massive advertisement that takes up almost 1/4 of the first page. It stands to reason that if I've exported this report, then I know what mySugr Logbook is, so I don't need a big ad for it. My care providers don't need the add either, especially since there's a URL at the bottom of every page.

I love this app. I was diagnosed with type 2 this year and it was very scary. This app has helped me manage my numbers and track my progress accurately. The last time I checked my A1c I was at a 8.1 but the app said it was a 6.7. My only complaint is the time. For some reason I can't change the time so I can know when I checked my blood sugar. It says GMT -5 but I am central standard time. I check my meter to be sure it had the correct time and it does.

Love this app for tracking. It is the best and easiest I've ever had. Only 2 issues: 1. If you're 60 yrs old then you must scroll through 60 x 12 months to set birthday. Please make it easier to set the year. 2. It doesn't AUTO-connect to the One touch Flex Verio which is preferred meter by doctors in my whole area (and insurance).

Do not get this app unless you are willing to manually enter each reading. I loved this app until I started using the Freestyle Libre 2 CGM System. The app will not scan the sensor and according to the company there are no plans to make that happen. So I tried to import my data via .csv files. That functionality has been removed with no plans to bring it back. Also according to the company. This app has become worthless to me.

There are some good basic features but the rest is for purchase only at a rediculous price. I don't need all the features, like a coach. In other words there should be different levels of subscription. I also want to see what an export and report looks like before I subscribe. e.g. add a trial period

I know it's Gambling. But hell I've played Real Slots looser than this game when challenges need to be met.

This is by far my favorite slots game. I like the weekly competitions and side games. I enjoy the interactive slot games, all the oompa loompa slots on all levels. With they had it where you could use real cash. They would be F****** awesome...

Very expensive to play. Trying to hit daily and weekly goals has cost thousands. More expensive to play than a real casino slot machine. Promotional game wiped out points with nearly 600 near-consecutive losses. The Zynga algos are geared for max losses.

What the heck? I had over 50 billion coins, the game had a glitch where it wouldn't let me spin, everytime I pressed it a pop up came up to try to get me to buy coins. I came back in yesterday and all my coins were gone!

title: FoodSwitch
description:
Make healthier food choices with FoodSwitch. Simply scan a barcode to get its nutrition facts and healthier alternatives! 
Whether you‚Äôre looking to eat healthier, track calories, avoid gluten, or looking for products low in salt or sugars, FoodSwitch will help you develop healthy habits when grocery shopping.
________________________________________________________________________________________ 

MAKING HEALTHIER FOOD CHOICES IS FAST AND EASY
1. Barcode Scanner --> Simply scan barcodes to view the nutritional information of packaged food products. Over a million barcodes recognized in our huge database.
2. Nutritional Tracker‚Üí Information on the nutritional quality of packaged foods.
3. Nutrient Details --- > View Energy, Fat, Sugar, Salt content and more.
4. Healthy Food Choice --->  Make healthier food choices based on what you scan. ________________________________________________________________________________________
 
VIEW NUTRITION INFORMATION IN TWO MODES
 
1. Health Star Ratings --->  Rates products from 0.5 to 5 stars. Higher the star rating, healthier the food.
2. Traffic Light Labels --->  Green(low), Amber(medium) and Red(high) ratings for salt, sugar, fat and saturated fat content. 
________________________________________________________________________________________ 

MEET YOUR SPECIFIC DIETARY GOALS USING OUR FILTERS
Choose a Switch below to filter healthier food choices (Please note some filters might not be available in your country) 
1. FoodSwitch ---> gives overall nutritional rating to make a healthier food choice. Great for people looking for overall health alternatives to their favorite foods.
2. SaltSwitch ---> Lists healthier choices having lower amounts of salt than the scanned product. Helpful for people concerned about their blood pressure.
________________________________________________________________________________________ 
 
MORE BENEFITS
1. Create and save personalised lists of favourite foods.
2. Help us out! Send us photos of any items that you are not able to scan.
3. Identify Vegetarian products easily.
4. Use ‚ÄúCompare‚Äù function to scan and compare up to 10 similar products against each other
 
 
Check out this video. Professor Bruce Neal - Executive Director at The George Institute for Global Health talks about the FoodSwitch program and its vision to improve health 
https://www.georgeinstitute.org/videos/launch-food-the-foodswitch-program
 
FoodSwitch data is used by governments and health organisations around the world. Download the app today for credible and impartial information.
 
FoodSwitch is owned and operated by The George Institute for Global Health.
 
For more information about FoodSwitch and FAQs, please visit 
http://www.georgeinstitute.org/projects/foodswitch.

For our Terms of use, please visit 
http://www.georgeinstitute.org.au/sites/default/files/foodswitch-terms-of-use.pdf

title: World Dairy Expo
description:
Make the most of the first week of October at World Dairy Expo in Madison, Wisconsin. Download the app that will help you efficiently explore the 850-company Trade Show with a plan, schedule face-to-face meetings with these exhibitors or build a custom itinerary of educational events and more. Create a free user account or log in with Facebook to unlock all features. 

Interactive Features:
-	Schedule: Favorite your must-see events happening during World Dairy Expo to build your own custom schedule. Choose from the list of public meetings, breed shows, Expo Seminars, Virtual Farm Tours, Knowledge Nook Sessions, Dairy Forage Seminars, youth contests and networking events. Truly capitalize on your time at World Dairy Expo with this scheduling tool.
-	Exhibitor Connect: Create a QR code as unique as you! Answer a few questions to generate a free account within the app or log in with Facebook to create a personalized QR code that Trade Show exhibitors can scan for an efficient way to enter you in drawings, giveaways and future promotions. No more wasting time filling out paper contact cards at every booth!
-	Trade Show Search: Search for specific companies or products in the Trade Show to discover where they are located and find company contact information. Select your favorite companies and see their booth light-up in the interactive maps to help chart your course.
-	Maps: Travel through the world‚Äôs largest dairy-focused Trade Show with interactive maps that include features for favoriting and meeting scheduling. 
-	Meeting Scheduling: Be sure the expert you are looking for is available when you arrive at a booth by scheduling a meeting with them. Located within the Trade Show Search and Maps pages, users may select a company name or booth location and request meetings with representatives. Look for the red ‚Äúrequest meeting‚Äù button after you select a company.  

Special Features for Trade Show exhibitors:
-	Easy lead retrieval: WDE Trade Show exhibitors can scan attendee QR codes within the app to collect basic contact and demographic information and take notes specific to that attendee. All collected information may then be exported from the exhibitor account on the WDE website for easy post-show follow-up.
-	Meeting Schedule: Schedule face-to-face meetings with producer attendees through the app. Your company‚Äôs WDE website admin is able to build a schedule of available meeting times during the show, that will be visible to attendees to request a meeting with your company. This feature also allows exhibitors to send meeting attendees private messages, take private notes and ask additional company-specific demographic questions within the app platform.

title: Diabetic Recipes : Healthy Food
description:
Diabetic cooking doesn't have to be a challenge. These recipes make it easy to whip up delicious, healthy, diabetic-friendly meals. For people with diabetes, healthy eating is not simply a matter of what one eats, but also when one eats. Discover delicious, healthy recipes that fit into a diabetic diet. People with diabetes can eat any food that they want, preferably a healthy diet with some carbohydrates, but they need to be more aware of the carbohydrate content of foods and avoid simple sugars like juices and sugar-sweetened beverages.

Whether you‚Äôre trying to prevent or control diabetes, your nutritional needs are virtually the same as everyone else, so no special foods are necessary. But you do need to pay attention to some of your food choices, most notably the carbohydrates you eat. While following a heart-healthy diet can help with this, the most important thing you can do is to lose a little weight.

Losing just 5% to 10% of your total weight can help you lower your blood sugar, blood pressure, and cholesterol levels. Losing weight and eating healthier can also have a profound effect on your mood, energy, and sense of well being. Even if you‚Äôve already developed diabetes, it‚Äôs not too late to make a positive change. By eating healthier, being more physically active, and losing weight, you can reduce your symptoms or even reverse diabetes. The bottom line is that you have more control over your health than you may think.

Nutrition and physical activity are important parts of a healthy lifestyle when you have diabetes. Along with other benefits, following a healthy meal plan and being active can help you keep your blood glucose level, also called blood sugar, in your target range. To manage your blood glucose, you need to balance what you eat and drink with physical activity and diabetes medicine if you take any. What you choose to eat, how much you eat, and when you eat are all important in keeping your blood glucose level in the range that your health care team recommends.

DIABETIC RECIPES APP EXPERIENCE

This is simple to navigate and also has multiple tutorials available on how to use the app.
As the recipe is a set of instructions for cooking, our app also provides nutritional information, servings, total time for preparation and recommendations so that nothing can go wrong when you‚Äôre cooking.

Theme Support

Protect your eyes from being hurt by a bright screen at night by enabling dark mode.
Make your diabetic recipes cooking experience more comfortable at night.

Smart Shopping List for Your Diet Control

An organized shopping list allows the user to create ingredients list so you won‚Äôt miss any for the recipe. Users can also add items directly from recipes.

It also has offline access.

Search 1M+ Healthy Recipes

Apart from shopping list our app also provides a global search feature
where you can find diabetic-friendly recipes you looking for or discover new recipes

Collect Your Favorite Diet

Use our bookmark button to save and organize low carb recipes in your favorite recipe list. They also have offline access.

Personal Profile

Do you have a wonderful diabetic recipe that you‚Äôd like to share? We would love for you to upload it. To submit your tasty recipe all you need to create an account. In addition to that, you can also upload your tasty food photos, and leave feedback, comments, and tips over our chef community.

Native Language

Another key feature of our app is it supports multiple languages.
Currently, we offer around 13 main languages.

Recipes Finder for Low Calorie Recipes

Recipe Finder can help you find a good diabetic recipe based on what you have in your fridge. You can provide a list of ingredients you have and bounce ideas off recipe finder so you never end up wasting any food!

Download the free Diabetic Recipes app today. Happy Cooking!

title: Vegetarian recipes free apps offline with photo
description:
Vegetarianism is the practice of abstaining from the consumption of meat (red meat, poultry, seafood, and the flesh of any other animal), and may also include abstention from by-products of animal slaughter.

There are variations of the diet as well: an ovo-lacto vegetarian diet includes both eggs and dairy products, an ovo-vegetarian diet includes eggs but not dairy products, and a lacto-vegetarian diet includes dairy products but not eggs. A vegan diet excludes all animal products, including eggs and dairy. Some vegans also avoid other animal products such as beeswax, leather or silk clothing, and goose-fat shoe polish.

Semi-vegetarian diets consist largely of vegetarian foods but may include fish or poultry, or sometimes other meats, on an infrequent basis. Those with diets containing fish or poultry may define meat only as mammalian flesh and may identify with vegetarianism.

title: Low FODMAP diet A to Z
description:
Diet Recipes Low FODMAP
if you are following the Low-FODMAP diet, you will want to avoid all foods high in FODMAPs. They include: fructans, galacto-oligosaccharides, lactose, excess fructose and polyols. If you have already taken hydrogen breath tests and know you can either completely absorb fructose or lactose, you do not have to negate either from your diet, but can as an extra precaution during the elimination phase.
descriptionHTML:
Diet Recipes Low FODMAP
if you are following the Low-FODMAP diet, you will want to avoid all foods high in FODMAPs. They include: fructans, galacto-oligosaccharides, lactose, excess fructose and polyols. If you have already taken hydrogen breath tests and know you can either completely absorb fructose or lactose, you do not have to negate either from your diet, but can as an extra precaution during the elimination phase.
summary: Low FODMAP Diet for IBS: List of Foods to Eat and Avoid

title: Dairy Free Recipes: 1000s of No Dairy Diet Recipes
description:
The most common food allergy among chilldren is cow's milk, afffecting 3% of kids under 3.  It tops the list of the eight most common allergens. Many, but not all, children will eventually outgrow this allergy. 

People with a milk allergy are allergic to the protein in milk. However those with Lactose intolerance is far more common than dairy allergy, and affects as many as 65% of people.

A dairy free diet can help with lactose allergy, milk protein allergy, as well as potential improvements in acne, inflammation, digestion, thyroid function, candida, and weight loss.

Therefore, a dairy free diet has many potential healthy benefits, and thus we present 1000s of dairy free recipes that you can search from and include the macros, calories, and nutrient count for each recipe along with ingredients and instructions.

title: Laktose-Ampel
description:
Die Laktose-Ampel-App ist ein mobiles Hilfsmittel zur Darstellung von Laktose in Lebensmitteln. Die Farbcodierung ist f√ºr laktosefreie Lebensmittel gr√ºn, f√ºr laktosehaltige Lebensmittel gelb und f√ºr laktosehaltige Lebensmittel rot. Das Programm soll das Tragen in Buchform ersetzen.

Die Lactose-Ampel f√ºr das iPhone ist die beliebteste Lactose-App in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und der Schweiz.

Die App verwendet eine internetbasierte Datenbank. Die zugrunde liegende Datenbank enth√§lt Informationen zum Laktosegehalt von mehr als 10.000 Lebensmitteln, die in regelm√§√üigen Abst√§nden erweitert werden. Es basiert auf Informationen aus dem Lebensmittelgesetzbuch, der Universit√§t Hohenheim, der Nationalbibliothek des USDA und den Herstellern. Die Datenbank kann jedoch weiterhin Fehler enthalten oder die Hersteller haben die Zusammensetzung des Lebensmittels ge√§ndert. Daher kann die Ampel-App nur als Leitfaden dienen. Die Informationen entbinden Sie nicht von der √úberpr√ºfung Ihrer Gerichte auf Laktosegehalt.

descriptionHTML:
Die Laktose-Ampel-App ist ein mobiles Hilfsmittel zur Darstellung von Laktose in Lebensmitteln. Die Farbcodierung ist f√ºr laktosefreie Lebensmittel gr√ºn, f√ºr laktosehaltige Lebensmittel gelb und f√ºr laktosehaltige Lebensmittel rot. Das Programm soll das Tragen in Buchform ersetzen.

Die Lactose-Ampel f√ºr das iPhone ist die beliebteste Lactose-App in Deutschland, √ñsterreich und der Schweiz.

Die App verwendet eine internetbasierte Datenbank. Die zugrunde liegende Datenbank enth√§lt Informationen zum Laktosegehalt von mehr als 10.000 Lebensmitteln, die in regelm√§√üigen Abst√§nden erweitert werden. Es basiert auf Informationen aus dem Lebensmittelgesetzbuch, der Universit√§t Hohenheim, der Nationalbibliothek des USDA und den Herstellern. Die Datenbank kann jedoch weiterhin Fehler enthalten oder die Hersteller haben die Zusammensetzung des Lebensmittels ge√§ndert. Daher kann die Ampel-App nur als Leitfaden dienen. Die Informationen entbinden Sie nicht von der √úberpr√ºfung Ihrer Gerichte auf Laktosegehalt.

NEU: Update (29. September 2014) - Erweiterung der Datenbank um √ºberwiegend laktosefreie Produkte. Die Datenbank enth√§lt jetzt mehr als 10.000 Produkte.

App bezieht sich auf Laktose, Unvertr√§glichkeit, Ern√§hrung, Milchzucker, laktosefreie Lebensmittel, Milchallergie, Reizdarmsyndrom, Flatulenz, Rektum-Syndrom

title: American cookbook - American food recipes
description:
American Recipes app offers you many light and tasty recipes. These include cheeses recipes, instant food pot recipes, soup recipes, cocktails recipes, casserole recipes, slow cooker recipes, recipes for loaf and recipes for cake.

Festive recipes
We have created the ultimate American recipes for  Chinese New year, American super bowl. Celebrate this season of romance with tasty valentines day recipes and much more.

Popular American slow cooker recipes of the month
Recipes like braised short ribs, bbq roast chicken, Alabama white bbq shrimp, slow cooker bbq chicken legs, Lebanese grilled chicken recipe with garlic, tandoori chicken burger, Arabian gulf-style fish in banana leaves and cajun picanha with bean salad are popular in January & February.

Simple healthy American recipe instructions with pictures
Every American food recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many easy recipes for free in our American Recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, American Recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite American crock-pot recipes
Add your favourite traditional American recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved American slow cooker recipes offline. You can also create healthy American recipe collections on the basis of cuisine, cooking and prep time, dinner ideas, breakfast ideas, cooking style etc.

American Food Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for American crock-pot recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving, Christmas , Easter, coloumbs days, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with the ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients features lets you search and discover Traditional American recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have American slow cooker recipes for people following a diet, paleo, low-carb and gluten-free diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have egg-free, gluten-free, lactose-free, wheat-free and seafood-free recipes. Nutritional information like cholesterol, fat, carbs and calories are available in the American Recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be quick and healthy with American Recipes. Start eating healthy American recipes with proper meal planner ideas and grocery shopping list. The meal planner ideas are filled with plenty of healthy diet recipes.

We offer lots of American food recipes:
Cook tasty American crock-pot recipes at home using mayonnaise, boneless chicken thighs, honey & avocado. Recipes for classic Traditional American dishes like mint and cumin-spiced lamb chops, sweet heat Cheerwine baby back ribs, bourbon bbq glazed pork chops, grilled kebabs and Moroccan chicken brochettes are available in the app. Our favourite American slow cooker recipes include honey mustard chicken drumsticks, spatchcocked saffron chicken, bbq chicken sliders, and grilled chicken.

Our healthy American recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for  Instant pie pot, salad, hot dog, Air fryer french fries recipes. Now that you've our American food recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: Calorie Mama AI: Meal Planner & Food Macro Counter
description:
Automatically count calories by taking food photos! Calorie counting should be as simple, fun, and easy as taking a picture of your food. Calorie Mama can tell you the calories in your food just by analyzing your food photos. It can recognize thousands of food categories including staples such as fruits, vegetables, meats, grains, beverages; complex cuisines and dishes such as American, Western, European, Asian, Latin American; and US/Canada packaged foods with a front-facing image or barcode.

How It Works:
1) Snap a picture of your food 
2) Calorie Mama analyzes your food photo and suggests what the food might be
3) Confirm the food to log your calories!

The more you snap, the more accurate and smarter Calorie Mama gets!

More Details:
The creators of Fitness Buddy, Instant Heart Rate, Argus, and Sleep Time bring to you Calorie Mama, a simple, elegant food tracker and calorie counter uses food recognition machine learning algorithms to identify many different foods, including packaged goods and barcodes. We do a lot of fancy work behind the scenes with deep artificial intelligence (AI), neural networks, computer vision, image recognition, to provide you with nutrition data. Our food detection and identification platform can recognize Western, European, Asian, Latin American and many more cuisines. Our app also detects packaged foods with a front-facing image or barcode for most US/Canada items. Snap a food photo and you‚Äôll be surprised at what Calorie Mama can detect! Find our more at http://caloriemama.ai

Unlock additional features by subscribing to Premium! Features include:

Automatically log additional nutrients such as carbs, fats, and sodium
Ability to toggle ON/OFF what factors into your calorie budget (steps, exercise, etc.)
Customizable calorie goals tailored to your individual goals
Customizable macro/micronutrient goals for those who have a more sophisticated diet plan (bodybuilders, personal trainers, elite athletes, etc.)
Access to scientifically proven home workout plans to supplement your training and fitness goals

Access to premium features of all of Azumio‚Äôs apps including Argus, Fitness Buddy, Instant Heart Rate, Argus, and Sleep Time

recentChanges: Performance and stability improvements
comments: Please fix a bug on Android where the app consumes several gigabytes of disk space within a few hours, causing my device to run out of space. I have to clear storage of calorie mama every day, otherwise it occupies like 3 gigs of space.

Cute name, big promises, but lots of issues. 1) why is it nearly 10 gb installed? Fresh install, no data and it's.9.5 GB. That's unacceptable. Makes me very suspicious of what the app is doing. 2) first run experience is not good. For some reason it didn't record my answers the first time and after I made an account, asked me the same questions AGAIN. frustrating. 3) why is image recognition and bar code scanning seperate functions??? Other apps combine them, as you might expect. Poor ux.

I didn't even sign up. As soon as I opened it, it asked me what my goal is. I chose "be more active." Right after that it asked me how active I am. I chose "Sedentary." It immediately proceeded to tell me that my "calories goal" to "reach my target weight" (WHAT TARGET WEIGHT? It never asked me about my target or current weight!) is 2378 kcal!! I'm 160 cm tall (5'3") and weight 50kg (110 lbs). If I were to consistently eat 2378 kcal I'd be obese within a few months. üòï Is this a joke?
I like it!!!! Its a good apps for those who want to try....

On a good way, needs a global barcode database, otherwise a US-only app. Combined with the fact that adding your own items does not allow you to add the macro composition without going premium is a real show stopper. That's a basic function that pretty much all competitors offer. Don't shoot yourself in the leg by being greedy. You won't convert users going premium for basics - right from the beginning with the first steps they're taking with your app, but only frustrate them, causing uninstalls

title: Food and Symptoms Diary LITE
description:
This mobile food and symptoms diary enables you to narrow down food intolerances such as lactose, histamine or sorbitol intolerance, fructose malabsorption or food allergies. It can also be used to determine your personal threshold (tolerance level) for different foods once a diagnosis has been made. 
The app contains neither advertisements nor any hidden costs such as in-app purchases.
-----
What does "Lite version" mean?
-----
This version is free, there is also a paid PRO version. In the LITE version, you cannot generate a PDF, log your bowel movement, set a reminder, or import data.
If you like this diary app, you can later buy the PRO version and then export your diary entries from the LITE version and import it into the PRO version.
------
Why use this app?
-----
If you believe that you may be suffering from some form of food intolerance or food allergy it is essential to keep a food and symptoms diary for about 2 weeks. With the help of such a food and journal, the medical professional you are consulting can narrow down the reasons for your symptoms. This means they can focus on the right follow-up (eg. H2 breath test) and thus reach an accurate diagnosis.

The app can also be used after diagnosis. Different foods need to be tested to establish a person‚Äôs individual tolerance level, e.g. fructose or FODMAP levels. Therefore, keeping a food and symptoms diary makes sense. 

The app is simple and intuitive. You can record your daily meals by entering them into the journal or simply taking a photo. You can also track your bowel movement (PRO Version only) or note your symptoms as well as the degree of severity and produce a clearly readable PDF (PRO Version only) which you can take to your doctor‚Äôs appointment. Symptoms can also be recorded by taking a photo, which is especially useful when you have symptoms such as rashes or other skin changes.

Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD)
The app can also be used for recording the symptoms of inflammatory bowel diseases such as Crohn‚Äôs disease. 

Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)
Also patients who follow a FODMAP diet due to IBS may use this app to track their nutrition and symptoms.

-----
Questions or comments?
-----
This app has its own support forum at www.food-intolerance-network.com. If you do find any bugs please drop us a line on the website so we can fix them as fast as possible. Thank you!
----
The symptoms diary app needs the following permissions:
----
+ Photos/Media/Files, Camera: You can, for example, take a picture of your meals or ingredients lists; The files are stored on your device (SD card); The data you enter will also be stored on your device.
+ Identity, Contacts: the app will access your ‚Äúme‚Äù contact information in order to copy your email address, name and date of birth (if you have entered this information into your device) in order to personalize the diary for your doctor. These settings can be changed at any time. The app will NOT read or access any other details in your contacts and will not send any such data back to us.
+ Other: With this app you can create and send a PDF file using the network connection of your phone. There are additional reading materials (e.g. Help & Support) which can only be accessed via the internet. The license authentication is also acquired via the internet. The notifications need the phone to prevent from sleeping and run at startup.

title: Diabetic Recipes app
description:
Get tasty and healthy diabetic recipes, with step by step recipe instructions, recipe videos, nutritional information and more. 

Start cooking these diabetic recipes for free, with Cookbook's Diabetic recipes app. Your search for healthy and easy diabetic recipes ends today. Learn to cook tasty diabetic meals from recipe collections of the finest diabetic recipes in the world. You can download diabetic recipes to create an offline collection of healthy diabetic recipes. Diabetic diet means that the diet eliminates the sugar content and reduces the load on your pancreas. 

For people affected by diabetes, this helps to cope with the low insulin content produced by the pancreas. Get your diabetes under control by eating healthy diabetic-friendly meals with our diabetic recipes app. 

The diabetes diet contains healthy carbohydrates, fibre-rich food, fish and good fats.

 We designed the diabetic recipes app with features like:- 

1. Choose your favourite recipes from diabetic recipe collections. 
2. Daily recipe planner for diabetics. 
3. Diabetic Recipes for free 
4. Make a shopping list for diabetic-friendly grocery shopping. 
5. Send the diabetic recipe shopping list to your partner. 
6. Send diabetic recipes to friends. 
7. Get diabetic recipes offline without internet. (No internet required) 
8. Diabetic recipe finder by ingredients. 
9. Diabetic recipe search by ingredients, occasions, dietary preferences, cooking difficulty etc. 
10. Get popular diabetic-friendly food recipes from around the world.

 Diabetic recipe categories:-
> Diabetic breakfast recipes
> Diabetic lunch recipes
> Diabetic dinner recipes
> Diabetic snack recipes
> Diabetic side dish recipes
> Diabetic dessert recipes
> Diabetic condiment recipes
> Diabetic smoothie recipes

 Our diabetes recipes app focuses on:- 
+ Healthy carbs like fruits, vegetables, whole grains, legumes (beans/peas) and low-fat dairy (milk/cheese). 
+ Fibre-rich food moderates digestion and helps in controlling blood sugar. 
+ Good fats like avocado, nuts, canola oil, olive oil and peanut oil.

A lot of people with diabetes ask us -
1. How can I control my sugar?
2. Can I keep my sugar levels in check with intermittent fasting?
3. Does maintaining a diabetes logbook help me reduce my sugar levels?

We designed the diabetic diet app to help answer various problems faced by diabetes patients. The diabetic diet app's carb counter helps to measure the carb/glucose intake. The diabetic recipes ensure that glucose levels are maintained within normal levels. By reducing glucose levels by carb counting, healthy diet & intermittent fasting you can control your hba1c.

Download this free diabetic recipes app today and get started on your diabetics journey. Enjoy the best diabetic recipes app

comments: Only taken a look and saved some favourites but looks pretty good so far. Had a look at a few diabetic apps but this looks most usefully laid out with extra benefits so dont mind the subscription fee. Would be better if your free trial was longer, say 14-28 days to give us a chance to use the app in practice. That might also appease some of the bad reviewers

I just opened the app. So far so good. There are alot of different recipes broken into nutrition, carbs in the food. Waiting for more updates and quick recipes. As a newbie to the diabetic world. This app is great and quick.

Would get more stars if it didn't keep sending me messages to buy premium at reduced rates. I already have premium! Also now sends notifications for recipe groups which when you click on them say nothing found. Has happened multiple times since last update. Sort it out

Wonderful app for diabetic recipes! This app helped my friend who was going through gestational diabetes. Cooking delicious recipes without compromising on taste was easy with diabetic recipes app by her side. Satisfied taste cravings and healthy too..Thank you!

Awesome app!!! I found this app easy to use and healthy. Snacks are healthy and easy to cook. The recipes are tasty and sugar free diabetic diet recipes. This will help me to manage my diabetes for the long run.

title: Diet Doctor Eat ‚Äî low-carb & keto recipes
description:
900+ free and delicious low-carb and keto  recipes, with nutritional information you can trust ‚Äî backed by the world‚Äôs leading experts on low carb and keto.

Strict keto, moderate or liberal low carb ‚Äî you decide! We provide trusted, tasty, searchable recipes complete with shopping lists so that you can focus on cooking, eating, and enjoying delicious and nutritious food.

Diet Doctor is the world‚Äôs #1 keto & low-carb site. Our goal is to empower people everywhere to dramatically improve their health by making low carb and keto simple.

Millions of people have used our site to lose weight, reverse their type 2 diabetes, normalize their blood pressure or change their lives for the better in many other ways.

If you‚Äôre interested in low carb or keto, we‚Äôll do our best to make your journey simple and inspiring.


SUMMARY OF WHAT YOU GET IN THIS APP:

900+ LOW-CARB AND KETO RECIPES
