‚Ä¢‚ÄÉIntuitive insights into how the Eczema tracks over time.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTrack which trigger causes a spike in Eczema or the absence of which trigger will cause Eczema to settle down and your skin turn normal.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉHow the various types of treatment and care regimens which you use is effective in controlling break outs.

Eczema Tracker:
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTrack the severity of your Eczema - determine your Atopic Index
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMeasure and monitor your Quality of Life Index (POEM)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMeasure and track symptoms related to Atopic Dermatitis like Itchy skin, Dryness of skin and Sleep loss.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉUse the app to keep a picture log of your Eczema and get analytics information about the progression of Eczema

Care Plan:
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉKeep track of which treatment you use and how often you use them.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSelect from various types of treatment like moisturizers, dermatitis creams, steroids, medicines and bathing routines.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉGet insights into which treatment you use and how it impacts your Eczema
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉDetermine which eczema treatment regimen helps cure your Eczema

Triggers:
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSelect from a list of Triggers in various categories including Allergies, Environmental, Foods, Activities, Health Events, Products.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCreate your own custom trigger which you think might be causing a flare up in Eczema and start tracking.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉLoad the results from an Allergy test and use the App for tracking an elimination diet on how certain food affect the severity if Eczema.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉEnvironmental Triggers like Pollen count, UV Index, Humidity, Air Quality and Temperature are automatically logged when a user Tracks their Eczema severity.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTrack which allergen or irritant is causing Contact Dermatitis.

Type of by default Triggers in our app consists of
o Allergies [pets, dust, mold, pollen, grasses]
o Environmental [heat, cold, air conditioning, sweat, sun]
o Foods [dairy, soy, wheat/gluten, oats, shellfish, fish, peanuts, tree nuts, legumes, eggs]
o Activities [sports, hobbies, housework, hand washing]
o Health Events [recent illness, asthma exacerbation, allergy attack, school or work stress]
o Products [detergent, soap, wool, synthetic fabrics, rough fabrics, tight clothing, scented products]

All these features are available for free.

What makes us Unique?

While undergoing treatment for Atopic Dermatitis, it is very important for the individual to track his / her activities and treatment actions to ensure that the Care-plan which s/he is following is effective. EczemaLess allows users to track their Eczema, users can also share the information with their Doctors.

Get insights on how your Eczema, trends, over a period of time and how various triggers exacerbate the problem and which treatment regimen helps. Compare your current condition with the previous using graphs and check different parameters in the same period.

Generate Summary report about how your Eczema has been doing, you can decide to share this with your Dermatologist who can determine if you are a candidate for Biologics or other prescription treatment options.
summary: Track triggers which cause your Eczema, treatment which helps you- Your AI guide
recentChanges: We update the Eczemaless app as often as possible to help make it faster and more reliable for you. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: i have used this app for my daughter. my wife hates using steroids . our Dermatologist advised us to use steroids only when rash is severe otherwise switch to non steroidal cream we were having a hard time determining when to use steroids. this app helped us determine the severity of a rash. will keep using.
I think it is a very usefull and great application. will you translate it in french ? (It could be easier to do it everyday in french :-) )

Absolutely love this app! It's great at keeping track of our infant son's triggers and daily routine. The charts and graphs help us to with trying to identify any new triggers. Would recommend it to anyone suffering with eczema.
Love love love this app! Super helpful and always reminds me of my progress!
This app is helpful. I was suffered by eczema a few days ago. This app helped me a lot to track the severity of eczema of my skin. I am recomemding this app to use for eczema issues.

title: MyNutriScan
description:
Your smart digital nutritionist, at the supermarket.

Low on sugar? Contains gluten? lactose? Is it healthy? Vegan?

Having trouble reading food labels? Or choosing which products are most suitable for you?

The solution has arrived! üéâ With MyNutriScan, making healthy decisions in the supermarket has never been easier!

How? You just need to scan the bar code of a food product in order to see its most relevant information as well as if it suits your nutritional profile.

We cross-check your requirements (allergies, illnesses and intolerances) and nutritional goals with the food product‚Äôs information and provide personalized feedback.
Therefore, in an easy, fast and intuitive way you can find the food products that best fit your needs.

Your benefits: 
üë§ Personalized feedback 
‚ù§  Healthier decisions
üìò Informed decisions
‚è± Save time

Features:
‚úÖ Transform the labels in easy and intuitive information.
üö¶ Nutritional traffic lights: 3-colour code which allows to know the level of fat, saturated fat, sugar and salt in food products.
‚≠ê Classification of the products by considering positive factors such as: fiber, protein, fruit and vegetables and negatives such as calories, saturated fat, sugar and salt.
‚ö† Receive the most relevant warnings according to your personal plan (allergens, lactose, gluten, animal products). 
üóÇ More than 100.000 products in the database.
üëç Give us your opinion about a product: Like your favourites, dislike on the ones you do not approve.
üéÅ Rewards system: Did not find a food product you were looking for? Help us load the database: submit photos of the product and, in exchange, receive avocados. In the future you will be able to exchange those avocados for fantastic benefits!
‚ô¶Ô∏è Premium features: Personalized plans.

You have at your disposal 6 pre-defined plans ready to be used. Nonetheless you can you define your own personalized plan.

Pre-defined plans:
üçû Gluten intolerant? Find out if a product contains gluten with the No Gluten plan.
ü•õ Lactose intolerant? Use the No lactose plan.
üç¨ Cutting on sugars? The Low sugar plan is the best choice!
üçÜ Vegan diet? Find out if a product contains ingredients of animal origin with the Vegan plan.
üçâ Looking for healthier products? Be healthy is your plan! 

Personalized plans: These plans are a premium feature. Enjoy the free trial period and use this feature free! The personalized plans include information such as:

Diseases:
- Diabetes
- Obesity
- Hypertension
- Celiac disease
- Hypercholesterolemia
- Hypertriglyceridemia
- Hypolipidemia

Intolerances:
- Gluten
- Lactose

Goals:
- Lose weight
- Gain weight
- Maintain Weight

Allergies:
- Dry fruits
- Celery
- Crustaceans
- Eggs
- Wheat
- Lupines
- Milk and dairy products
- Mustard
- Peanut
- Fish
- Mollusks
- Sulfur dioxide and sulfites
- Soy
- Sesame

Other Options:
- Avoid dyes
- Avoid preservatives

The first step towards adopting a healthy lifestyle starts in the moment of choosing a food product in the supermarket! Kick-off 2020 healthier, install now!

Be aware! The product is still in beta testing phase, and thus we would love to receive your feedback. Do you have any suggestions or found any bug? Do not ponder, contact us at: geral@mynutriscan.com or through our social media. 

Disclaimer:

The suggestions and recommendations given by MyNutriScan were compiled based on information gathered and validated by health professionals. Even though caution was taken on order to ensure the precision and correctness of the data, no 100% guarantee can be given. Consequently, the information given in the application aims to guide the user and it never substitutes the nutritional advice from a professional. In case of doubt, we recommend to always verify the actual product label. MyNutriScan is not responsible for any loss or damage that may result from the use of the app.

title: Glusearch: Gluten free places
description:
Looking for venues, restaurants, shops or hotels with gluten-free options? Discover Glusearch for your gluten-free worldwide life.
   
Glusearch offers you detailed information on a wide range of gluten-free venues. On Glusearch you can find for each facility... address, phone, URL, Facebook, email, services, coordinates, geolocation, directions, photos and other features such as:
   ‚û°Ô∏è activities belonging to National Associations, such as FACE in Spain, AIC in Italy, etc.
   ‚û°Ô∏è 100% gluten-free venues
   ‚û°Ô∏è activities with lactose-free options
   ‚û°Ô∏è and more
   
From the main screen, you can find venues by:
   ‚û°Ô∏è geolocation
   ‚û°Ô∏è activity name
   ‚û°Ô∏è entering city name
   ‚û°Ô∏è entering the full address for more detailed searches
   
On Glusearch you will find also:

title: Daily Journal - Diary & daily journaling
description:
Write your daily journal from day one, without writing a single line. Our micro journal app helps you to track moods, thoughts, feelings & activities. 

Daily journal app
Start the habit of writing a diary daily from day one. The journal app with lock is free and lets you add an unlimited number of days to your personal diary. Reflect daily for self-care and self-improvement. Take a minute daily to self reflect and create a note in your private journal.

Cloud/Private journal app - Diary stores your notes & memories securely
All your personal notes are safely stored in your journal account. Restore your journal when you change your phone or log in on another device.

Journal with lock - fingerprint
In the journal with lock app, you can lock your private journal with password or fingerprint lock. From day one, you can securely lock your thoughts, secrets and memories. Start daily journaling without the fear of others reading your journal/notes. Only you have the key to your dairy with lock.

Create a daily journaling habit
Win badges and awards for regularly writing in your diary from day one. Daily reminders ensure that you spend at least 1 minute daily for yourself. Gather your thoughts and feelings and write them in your daily journal/notebook.

Statistics and insights from daily journals
Know yourself better using our journal analytics. Have you ever wondered about things like - 
1. What makes me happy?
2. How did I feel last Tuesday?
3. What makes my weekends awesome?
Get answers to all these questions from day one and more with daily diary stats. Understand mood swings, how different activities make you feel etc by writing daily in your thought journal/diary.

Writing a notebook with your life memories and feelings are super easy with the jurnal app with lock. Become the best version of yourself with daily journaling and self-reflection. With our lockable diary, you don't need to worry about privacy.

So, start writing your daily memoirs with thoughts and feelings in your journal app now.

title: Histamine Diary
description:
Do you experience unexplained headaches or anxiety? What about irregular menstrual cycles? Does your face flush when you drink red wine? Do you often feel bloated or gassy? Do you often have acnes or pimples? Do you get an itchy tongue or runny nose when you eat bananas, avocados, or eggplants? If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you could have a histamine intolerance.
Histamine Diary implemented the common food-symptom diary method for mobile, making the first step of diagnosis easier. Follow your diet and histamine related symptoms with the help of the application, so that the app can estimate the chance of histamine intolerance! 
Also, use Histamine Diary for learn more about histamine intolerance! Learn the symptoms and the biological background of histamine intolerance and the foods are better to erase from your diet!

title: Fructika
description:
We built Fructika to help everyone living with Fructose Malabsorption choose which foods are right for them.

‚òÜ Quickly search thousands of foods in our database.

‚òÜ No ads, no tracking. Fructika is and always will be completely free.

‚òÜ Smart search to help you quickly and easily find the food you're looking for.

‚òÜ Save foods to your favourites.

‚òÜ Quickly see Fructose levels at a glance.

‚òÜ Choose the food groups you want to search.

‚òÜ Set your own Fructose warning level or use our default to highlight the foods with high Fructose. 

‚òÜ Visualise the Fructose/Glucose balance in a food.

‚òÜ See the Total Sugar content and  a breakdown of the sugar content.

‚òÜ Now includes Lactose and Protein levels.

title: DietSensor - Macro Calculator & Calorie Counter
description:
DietSensor macro calculator was born from the family background of our founders. Their daughter suddenly got sick in 2013 and their daily life changed: they had to calculate her food in order for her to live. That's why they turned to science and invented DietSensor with doctors. The app was immediately catapulted into the world's media as it won first prize for global innovation at the CES in Las Vegas. Since then, hundreds of thousands of users have taken advantage of this scientific program to "lose weight without dieting" by rebalancing their groceries and meals.

DietSensor helps you lose weight without dieting by suggesting groceries, ready-made menus, recipes or a meal planner tool to create healthy meals.

So why isn't the DietSensor program a diet? It helps you adopt the proven scientific fundamentals of healthy eating, with weight loss diet plans, or accompany your workout to regain muscle with its calories burned calculator and healthy food

You wonder how to lose weight in a sustainable way? We make accessible what science proposes, through a very simple daily weight loss nutrition app, which is also very rich and innovative 

AWARDS
Voted the most innovative App in the world at CES 2016

3 POSSIBLE USES

‚óè Free: enter your own food
‚óè Semi-guided: use our recipes and suggestions in real time
‚óè Guided: follow the pre-established diet plans

APP + HUMAN
‚óè Our experts answer all your questions via instant messaging 

HOW IT WORKS

You will start by defining your goal, profile and preferences in your nutrition tracker.
‚óè DietSensor calorie counter offers programs adapted to all situations (detox, low carb diet, dash diet, mediterranean diet, vegetarian diet, balanced diet, or high-protein diet) 

You will then be able to compose healthier meals with your own food with your nutrition calculator
‚óè Scan barcodes, search through a huge database. Your macro tracker will tell you what is good for you and how much is good for you. 

You'd rather be guided?
‚óè No need to spend hours on meal planning. If you want to lose weight fast, adopt menus calculated specifically for you (diet apps never offer this!).
‚óè Use the "tailor-made" meal planner, which takes into account what you like, what you have on hand, and what you ate this morning
‚óè Discover balanced and healthy recipes
‚óè Shopping lists are generated in 1 click 

You want the insight of a human expert?
‚óè Chat via instant messaging with our experts

Need weight loss motivation?
‚óè Receive advice, reviews, reminders and encouragement
‚óè Connect to the Google Fit app and track your diet and exercise automatically

PRICES & CONDITIONS OF SUBSCRIPTION  

To use all the features of the application, you will need to subscribe to one of the PREMIUM packages. If you do not subscribe or at the end of the subscription period, your account can be used with the (free) BASIC package and some features will not be accessible. We offer three subscription options with automatic renewal.

PREMIUM:
- 3 months: $27.49/quarter
- 6 months: $40,99/half year
- 1 year: $45,99/year


Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in price when renewing.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's account settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. 

Please read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at https://www.dietsensor.com/privacy-policy/

You wonder how to lose weight in a sustainable way? We make accessible what science proposes, through a very simple daily weight loss nutrition app, which is also very rich and innovative

AWARDS
Voted the most innovative App in the world at CES 2016

3 POSSIBLE USES

‚óè Free: enter your own food
‚óè Semi-guided: use our recipes and suggestions in real time
‚óè Guided: follow the pre-established diet plans

APP + HUMAN
‚óè Our experts answer all your questions via instant messaging

HOW IT WORKS

You will start by defining your goal, profile and preferences in your nutrition tracker.
‚óè DietSensor calorie counter offers programs adapted to all situations (detox, low carb diet, dash diet, mediterranean diet, vegetarian diet, balanced diet, or high-protein diet)

You will then be able to compose healthier meals with your own food with your nutrition calculator
‚óè Scan barcodes, search through a huge database. Your macro tracker will tell you what is good for you and how much is good for you.

You'd rather be guided?
‚óè No need to spend hours on meal planning. If you want to lose weight fast, adopt menus calculated specifically for you (diet apps never offer this!).
‚óè Use the "tailor-made" meal planner, which takes into account what you like, what you have on hand, and what you ate this morning
‚óè Discover balanced and healthy recipes
‚óè Shopping lists are generated in 1 click

You want the insight of a human expert?
‚óè Chat via instant messaging with our experts

Need weight loss motivation?
‚óè Receive advice, reviews, reminders and encouragement
‚óè Connect to the Google Fit app and track your diet and exercise automatically

PRICES & CONDITIONS OF SUBSCRIPTION

To use all the features of the application, you will need to subscribe to one of the PREMIUM packages. If you do not subscribe or at the end of the subscription period, your account can be used with the (free) BASIC package and some features will not be accessible. We offer three subscription options with automatic renewal.

PREMIUM:
- 3 months: $27.49/quarter
- 6 months: $40,99/half year
- 1 year: $45,99/year


Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in price when renewing.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's account settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Please read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at https://www.dietsensor.com/privacy-policy/

title: Low fodmap Diet - 30 days meal Plan
description:
I have created this app to help all peaple suffering from IBS to easely find ideas about what to eat every day on a low fodmap diet. it contains 90 + easy and affordable detailed recipes.

Low fodmap diet 30 days meal plan is very easy to use, after installation it can be used offline. you will be then able to follow a low fodmap diet for 30 days without any other researchs. 

If you have IBS and are following the low FODMAP diet to improve your digestive health by avoiding trigger foods then this app is for you . you will find a list of foods to avoid.

Note: this diet may be difficult to follow, and it is advisable to contact your health care professional or a dietitian to make sure that you are on the right track and getting enough dietary nutrients that you can consume.

Some infos you have to have : 

FODMAP stands for Fermentable Oligosaccharides, Disaccharides, Monosaccharides, and Polyols, which are short chain carbohydrates and sugar alcohols that are poorly absorbed by the body, resulting in abdominal pain and bloating.
FODMAPs occur in some foods naturally or as additives.
If you eat a lot of these foods you may have symptoms and signs like:
Gas
Pain
Bloating
Abdominal distention
Abdominal pain
Diarrhea
A list of examples of certain foods and drinks to avoid on a low FODMAP diet are some vegetables and fruits, beans, lentils, wheat, dairy products with lactose, high fructose corn syrup, and artificial sweeteners.
A list of examples of foods and drinks to eat on a this diet are certain vegetables and fruits, lactose free dairy, hard cheeses, meat, fish, chicken, eggs, soy, rice, oats, quinoa, non-dairy milks, and small servings of nuts and seeds.
This diet cuts out many common foods that may contain high FODMAP foods. They are eliminated or severely limited for 3-8 weeks, then gradually reintroduced into a low-FODMAP diet to see if they cause symptoms (elimination diet). It is not meant to be a permanent solution because it is very restrictive, but it may work well enough to be a treatment for people with gastrointestinal (GI) problems.
This type of dietary meal plan often is used to help with digestive symptoms from many different conditions, including, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), small intestinal bacterial overgrowth (SIBO), and other functional GI disorders.

title: Meal Planner for Weight Loss & Healthy Recipes
description:
Our Meal Planner for Weight Loss & Healthy Recipes App provide a simple way for busy singles, couples, and families to plan their meals and eat healthier. Our healthy Meal Planner for Weight Loss & healthy recipes are highly customizable so you can easily personalize a plan that works with your unique tastes and lifestyle.

Reasons you will love this app

‚úî 3 delicious healthy recipes for free for quick cooking, every day
‚úî Varied free healthy recipes 
‚úî Awesome Meal Planner for Weight Loss
‚úî Step-by-step photo tutorials to make sure each dish is foolproof
‚úî Save your favorite recipes in your personal list to cook them later
‚úî Quickly find the right dish with a recipe filter
‚úî Share your favorite recipes with friends
‚úî Find the nearest grocery store on the integrated map
‚úî Create a shopping list of several recipes, including prices
‚úî Portion calculator and nutritional information
‚úî Free cooking app

We offer to you a lot of weight loss recipes: main dishes weight loss recipes, snack weight loss recipes, salad weight loss recipes, soup weight loss recipes, sweet weight loss recipes, juice and freches weight loss recipes, low carb meat, low carb fish, low carb chicken, low fat casseroles, low carb breakfast, weight loss baking, weight loss pizza and other weight loss recipes.

All weight loss recipes are presented with simple and detailed instructions and photo.

Sign up to Recipes of the Day and join over 1,000,000 people who have used our Meal Planner for Weight Loss to eat healthier, reduce stress, lose weight, save money, and live happier, more productive lives.

Check out our top 5 benefits and features:

1. Cook healthy meals in about 30 minutes or less (even if you don't know how to cook)
We've reimagined and streamlined the cooking experience. Prepare meals quickly with our step-by-step and hassle-free cooking instructions.

You'll never again have to jump around looking for an ingredient, instruction, or piece of cookware that you may have overlooked.

2. No more stressful "What should I eat?" decisions to make
Each week you'll have a personalized meal plan with simple & healthy recipes that are catered to your exact needs and preferences.

Eliminate decision fatigue after a long day's work - simply pick a recipe from your meal plan and cook it in less time than it takes to pick up an unhealthy (and expensive) takeout meal.

3. Healthy meal plans that are uniquely your own
With the most personalization options of any minimal-waste meal planner out there, you can cook exactly how you want to eat.

From classic, flexitarian, pescetarian, low carb, paleo, keto, vegetarian & vegan diet types to gluten-free, shellfish free, fish free, dairy free, peanut free, tree nut free, soy free, egg free, sesame free, and mustard free allergy restrictions to 119 individual dislikable ingredients, your meal plans will be truly personalized to your specific needs.

4. Optimized & super fast grocery lists
When you build a new meal plan, a grocery list of all the ingredients you'll need for the week is automatically created. Simply grab your mobile, head to the grocery store, and get all your week's shopping done in about 20 minutes with our step-by-step grocery list optimized with standard grocery store layouts in mind.

5. Save money with minimal food waste
It's annoying when you purchase ingredients from the grocery store, cook a meal or two, and have a bunch of ingredients going bad by the end of the week, isn't it?

recentChanges:
This is Abradoodle‚Äôs biggest update yet!

comments: I love this game, but, they only allow you 12 free tickets every 40 minutes or so. It costs at least 4 tickets to play 4 cards in a round. So, this 12 tickets yet burned up pretty fast. And, who wants to stop playing and have to exit the game and wait 40 minutes for more tickets??? It's a hassle! So, when you run out of tickets, they offer in ad purchases to buy more tickets, and that's where they get you. I have not found a bingo game that is actually free to play. It's a shame!!!

ADDICTED!!!!!! I wish you would put an option in to use our coins to be able to buy at least 10 tickets. I'm a poor 49 year old with a son who plays 2 sports a senior in high school and a daughter who just graduated college and needed a reliable car. So I gave her mine, since she's an elementary school teacher and needs to mold the minds of the future game designer's who will take your jobs in the future..... Damn sorry to ramble on, let me buy tickets with coins. Respectfully, A broke Dad. Lol

Playing higher level now. Fun, but having fewer bingos, than when I had played for the first time. The reason I stopped this game, before, was cause I got tired of seeming to be forced to buy things to progress. I became angry an frustrated. Time will tell if I put up with this for long. Hate to stop. But I will. Their second chance will end. Will update.

By far the best bingo game I've played! The tutorial when starting the game is very helpful. So many options for avatar and dauber. The voice call outs are different from room to room which makes it more entertaining. The leveling up rewards are great. Not interrupted with ads. Not required to spend money (available if you want to). Only drawback is that your account doesn't work on multiple devices.

This is the only Bingo app I play. You don't have to use real money if you can't afford to. The graphics are neat and there's lots of 'rooms' to play. One of my favorite things is how all the callers sound different. Some times there are one or two callers that have a thick accent, but it's easy to watch the 'boards foe which number is called.

title: Eat the Rainbow Food Journal
description:
Our App is based on a popular nutritionist recommended diet called "Eating the Rainbow". We've built features following evidence-based research on the benefits of eating a whole-plant based diet to improve health and lose weight.

Our app helps you visualize your diet to ensure you are getting a wide range of nutrients from the food you eat. The kicker? Our app is totally free! We believe that good nutrition should be easy, fun, and accessible to everyone. 

A good guide to consuming a balanced diet is eating a rainbow of plant-based foods every day. The eye-catching colors of fruits and vegetables serve as a good guide for the nutrients they contain. Eating a colorful, varied diet full of plant foods ensures you can access a wide range of nutrients your body needs for good health. 


+ EAT BRIGHTER +
We could all do with more plants in our lives, whether we're vegetarians, vegans, omnivores, or carnivores. Especially the carnivores. So, whether you‚Äôre an adult looking to get more fruits and veggies into your day or a parent looking for ways to get your kids excited about nutritious food, our app is for you! 

We believe in keeping it simple. Nutritionists recommend eating a wide variety of plant-based foods to maximize your health. In short, that means:
1/ Eating a bunch of different fruits and vegetables, and
2/ Keeping your meals colorful! 

Choose daily & weekly targets to increase plant variety and access a wide range of nutrients in your foods! Nutritionists recommend targeting 10 different plant foods a day, and a total of 30 weekly. This target includes fruits, vegetables, herbs, nuts, legumes‚Ä¶ basically anything from a plant! 


+ FEEL BETTER +  
Plant foods provide a ton of benefits to our health. Eating more fruits & veggies has been linked to lower blood pressure, lower cholesterol, better blood sugar, lower rates of cancer, and weight loss. Go wild in the produce aisle. 

Our app helps you learn the science behind what makes your favorite fruits and vegetables so good for you. Stay tuned while we build nutritionist-approved recommendations into the app to help you explore the foods you eat. In the meantime, check out https://eattherainbow.app for healthy tips!


+ PLAY WITH YOUR FOOD + 
Eat The Rainbow makes healthy food fun! Our food tracker focuses on healthy eating, not weight loss or calorie counting like other nutrition trackers. 

Add the fruits and vegetables you eat to your daily food journal, and let us do the rest! We color-code plant-foods to help you search quickly, and to help you visualize your diet. 

Your rainbow will update dynamically based on which colors you‚Äôre eating. The more you eat, the darker the shade. See which colors you're lacking each day and week to help guide your next meal. Think of us as a meal planner with artistic flare.

Unlock unicorn status when you eat the rainbow each day or week. We‚Äôll also give you a gold star when you reach your goals. You‚Äôve earned it. 


+ IN PLANTS WE TRUST + 
We‚Äôre two food & tech fanatics, passionate about using technology to make eating more fun. Please get in touch with us to let us know what features you‚Äôre keen to see next. Seriously, we don‚Äôt bite! (Unless you‚Äôre an avocado. We love avocados.) 

Drop us a line at eattherainbowapp@gmail.com 

With love, Laura & Matt

summary: Nutritionist recommended food journal for individuals, parents and kids!
recentChanges:
- Ability to add favorite foods quickly
- Cosmetic changes to improve the usability
comments: Great overall! I'm working on eating more regularly and this app is what I'm using to transition away from fully logging every meal. Adding each item and seeing how many or what colors I'm lacking is fun and definitely inspires me to eat more and different plant based foods than I usually do (I struggle with purple, for example, so it's helped me try new ones in that category). I just wish various plant based milks (almond, coconut, etc) were listed, or that you could add your own food items.

I've been using myfitnesspal to track nutrients, but ended up using it in a harmful way, focusing way more on calories than on quality of food. So I switched to this, and I love it so far, really helpful for creating a healthier mindset towards healthy foods and what they can provide. Thank you fue this!
A little slow to get started, but smoother once you have a few 'favorites' logged. Fun way to get kids excited about trying new fruits and veggies. Great tool for adults, too!

Really good app. It's a bit slow and clunky to add foods though. It would be lovely to see some features like being able to quickly add common foods, or see recent foods first in the search, or to multi-add foods. Edit: The update is amazing! The new feature is super handy! Thank you for considering my idea ü§©
I love it! It has really encouraged me to eat a larger variety of fruits/vegetables because it's so fun to try and get the rainbow...lol....surprisingly üòÅ.

title: Solitaire TriPeaks: Play Free Solitaire Card Games
description:
Cards. They‚Äôve been around for literally centuries. They have long-lasting appeal.

Solitaire. Countless hours have passed while people have entertained themselves by playing solitaire. If boredom was as life-threatening as children proclaim, solitaire would have saved tens, possibly hundreds, of millions of lives. No joke. 

TriPeaks. Arguably the most fun Solitaire game of them all. 

Solitaire TriPeaks. No doubt about it - *the* most fun TriPeaks version out there. It‚Äôs a little bit Golf, it‚Äôs a little bit Pyramid, and it‚Äôs a whole lot of depth. It‚Äôs a deep game, my friend. A very deep game. 

Here‚Äôs the deal. You‚Äôve got the basics - the game itself. Then you throw in things like unique Hazards and Boosters, Wild Cards, a whole slew of tableau setups, and you‚Äôre just skimming the surface. You keep on playing, and then you‚Äôll discover whole new worlds - tons of levels, Clubs, leagues, the ability to chat with your Club Members, a Friend Center, and events that will challenge your mind, and satisfy your soul. We don‚Äôt play the hyperbole game. We state the facts.

Oh, and lest we forget, this game is like being on a vacation with a cast of some crazy characters you‚Äôll likely fall in love with pretty quick. There are the two hosts to the game, Tiki and Poi. Tiki‚Äôs a Tiki - nobody really knows what the heck he is, and that‚Äôs just how it is. And Poi? He‚Äôs his adorable dog and sidekick. Together, they‚Äôll make you laugh and keep you inspired to take on the next level. Then there are other characters as you move through the game, like Pele, the Volcano Goddess. Don‚Äôt mess with her. And Marina, she‚Äôs as sweet as sweet can be. There are penguins, bunnies, monkeys, a parrot and a curmudgeonly old Pirate named Captain Karma. 

Also, there‚Äôs the art. You won‚Äôt believe the art in these levels - it‚Äôs like out of this world, my friend. Every level provides an enticing background. Some make you want to take a vacation on the beach. Others make you want to fly in space, or delve the deepest depths of the ocean. 

There you have it. Download this one game today, and you won‚Äôt be searching the app store for much anymore.

Privacy Policy:
http://gsngamesnetwork.com/privacy.html

Don‚Äôt mess with her. And Marina, she‚Äôs as sweet as sweet can be. There are penguins, bunnies, monkeys, a parrot and a curmudgeonly old Pirate named Captain Karma.

Also, there‚Äôs the art. You won‚Äôt believe the art in these levels - it‚Äôs like out of this world, my friend. Every level provides an enticing background. Some make you want to take a vacation on the beach. Others make you want to fly in space, or delve the deepest depths of the ocean.

There you have it. Download this one game today, and you won‚Äôt be searching the app store for much anymore.

comments: Don't waste your time. It will be fun in the beginning but will get frustrating as you advance. It becomes extremely difficult to win. I have played the same level over 15 times to win and its impossible. I've went from having 90,000 coins to less than 3000 just trying to solve the same level (each game cost 3000 coins to play). I usually don't post comments, but this app made me do it.

I love this game but why so much for each level? Also, 6000 coins for 5 cards?! Half the time those cards do not have the cards you need so you spent 6000 coins for nothing. I love this game but I'm finding myself spending an obscene amount of money just to pass levels I've been stuck on for days! It seems like the higher the level the less cards they give you. The boosts cost 6000 coins each which is ridiculous. No more will I spend my money on this game which is clearly what they want.

2nd review. Again, it's a beautiful game but the decks aren't legitimate and I know in my gut that the cards are changing to make you keep spending your bank and each hand costs more and more, it takes the fun away from the game. It's not honest. I just won 5000 coins and I didn't get them. I watched that corner and it never changed. Shame.

Love this game . But for some reason it's having problems loading my progress this morning. I have restarted my phone. I have restarted the game several times and it's still stuck in the mode of loading my progress. I have almost 190,000 coins that I hate to lose if I have to uninstall and reinstall the game. My Wi-Fi is up and running well so that is not the issue. You have told players to go to menu and then ask for help. If you can't get into the game you can't go to menu and ask for help.

I downloaded this game as a reward offer was promised after completing level 65. I am currently on level 70 and they refuse to grant the reward of diamonds in the game app that it advertised and offered reward in. Beware...if you are looking to install this game for a promised reward for reaching a certain level then know they do not honor that promise!

comments: Its fun but not honest. There's an option where you spin to play. You can put in like $100,000 with the chance of winning $1 billion but that never happens. I played 20 rounds last night on this option and the only thing I got was double what I put in. And if that was the only option that would be ok but the way they advertise it is just a joke. You can also get free spins and you get the bare minimum on any of these also.

The game has become that bogged down with a dire amount of pop ups at startup to encourage you to spend obscene amounts of money in game that it rarely starts up without a hitch or crashing.... Don't believe the scripted response they post about their RNG, it's rigged plain and simple weighted towards those that spend or to get you to spend, far from random as the majority will lay testament to if you read the honest reviews on here...

Awful. Pointlessly cheating algorithm. No point in playing as you will lose. Plenty of far better poker apps that don't manipulate the game. And to pre-empt the standard cut and paste reply from the developers : the hands dealt in the first few rounds certainly were fixed - and blatantly so.

High level players playing on beginner tables going all-in on every hand before the flop! It's not very enjoyable. Edit: response to developers response; the problem is the high level player's that are joining the beginner levels (where I am) that make it impossible for beginners to enjoy themselves because the sharks are constantly going all in, so the beginners can't even learn the game or build up their bank. A level 160 shouldn't be at the same table as a level 12 (unless they are friends).

This app is horrible it always kicks me out of the app and usually when I'm in the middle of a game and get a winning hand. Sometimes it won't let me bet and folds for me and the players with the higher level always win majority of the time. ***every since i wrote this review now it won't even let me join a table it just kicks me out of the app completely. This game sucks

title: fodjan ‚Äì Mobile Feeding Management for Dairy Cows
description:
fodjan App supports you in your daily tasks around the feeding management of your dairy herd:

   ‚Ä¢  Adapt and document Rations
   ‚Ä¢  Share rations with colleagues, your feed advisor or veterinarian
   ‚Ä¢  Feed mixing
   ‚Ä¢  Document and evaluate your feeding processes

This saves time and improves the animal health and performance of your dairy herd.

MAIN FUNCTIONS:

   ‚Ä¢  Create and manage RATIONS & FEEDGROUPS
   ‚Ä¢  Automatically import your FEED CERTIFICATES
   ‚Ä¢  Hints for HEALTH RISKS out of the ration, e.g. potential acidosis 
   ‚Ä¢  Stepwise RATION PROPOSALS, e.g. ‚ÄòMore Milk‚Äô or ‚ÄòHealthier & Cheaper‚Äô
   ‚Ä¢  EVALUATIONS on milk yield and feeding, e.g. milk report
   ‚Ä¢  DOCUMENT feeding with the ‚ÄòFeed Now‚Äô function
   ‚Ä¢  Add USERS and assign access rights

FREE: The fodjan app is unlimited free. Some functions may be activated with a PREMIUM app package, e.g. more ration suggestions and evaluations.

YOU WANT MORE?
If you want to go deeper into the feeding management and the ration calculation for dairy cows, try fodjan Pro. More information on our website www.fodjan.de

YOUR FEEDBACK MAKES THE APP EVEN BETTER
constantly improving the app and looking forward to your feedback so that we can design the app to fit your day-to-day work. Please write us your suggestions for improvement by e-mail: feedback@fodjan.de.

title: Strongr Fastr Workout, Meal and Diet Planner
description:
Strongr Fastr tells you what to eat and what workouts to do in order to meet your fitness goals- including lose fat and build muscle / tone as well as weight loss, bulking, or maintaining your weight.

It gives you a healthy meal plan and matches you with a workout routine. The meal plan meets your macros, ensures you get the right amount of protein and calories and is fully customizable- swap any meal out for another one- Strongr Fastr makes sure the replacement is healthy and meets your macros too. You get simple recipes and a simple grocery list to make shopping and meal prep easy. 

The exercise routines fit your schedule, goals, and equipment and can be weighted or bodyweight and can include cardio. Pre-loaded routines include Greyskull LP, 531 BBB, 531 Triumvirate, 531 Building the Monolith, GZCLP and GZCL Method, Texas Method, Madcow 5x5, PHAT routine, PHUL routine, Lyle McDonald's Generic Bulking Routine, PPL routines, all of which are proven bodybuilding or powerlifting routines. 

Why Strongr Fastr?

Our meal plans are clean, realistic and flexible and the nutrition targets are based on the core tenets of flexible dieting and bodybuilding nutrition- making sure they have the right amount of calories in protein. Our healthy recipes are tasty but simple and don‚Äôt require a bunch of strange, expensive health-food, making it easy for you to stick on plan. Clean eating has never been easier. The routines have all been used by millions to help build muscle and burn fat. Strongr Fastr is your mobile personal trainer that takes out all the work and research of creating your own exercise program and meal plan that‚Äôs tailored to your goals. It helps you get fit, build muscle, increase strength, and lose weight - faster.

Meal Planner-

‚Ä¢ Healthy meal plans built around your macronutrient targets- it determines the targets for you or you can input your own
‚Ä¢ Database of hundreds of easy, quick, healthy, clean recipes 
‚Ä¢  Add your own recipes 
‚Ä¢ Fully customizable- swap out any meal to another that meets your macros (IIFYM- if it fits your macros)
‚Ä¢ Personalized by your grocery budget
‚Ä¢ Includes organized shopping list
‚Ä¢ Supports group meal planning
‚Ä¢ Automatically adjusts your nutrition targets over time
‚Ä¢ Supports standard, vegetarian, vegan, keto, low carb, paleo diets and dietary restrictions including dairy, lactose, eggs, peanuts, tree nuts, soy, gluten, fish, and shellfish

Exercise Routines:

‚Ä¢ Get matched with a workout program that meets your schedule, goals, and equipment needs
‚Ä¢ Choose from any of the preloaded routines including: Greyskull LP, 531 BBB, 531 Triumvirate, 531 Building the Monolith, GZCLP and GZCL Method, Texas Method, Madcow 5x5, PHAT routine, PHUL routine, Lyle McDonald's Generic Bulking Routine, and PPL routines
‚Ä¢ Ability to incorporate cardio
‚Ä¢ Video instructions show proper form
‚Ä¢ Progressive training plans combine fat burning & muscle building
‚Ä¢ Automated progression- ensures that you keep progressing

See Your Progress Overtime:

‚Ä¢ Progress charts of weight loss/gain
‚Ä¢ Progress charts for individual exercises and volume

Advanced Features:

‚Ä¢ Edit workout routines, including the ability to add periodization with multiple training cycles, automatic progression of exercises, or autoregulated progression of exercises
‚Ä¢ Input your own nutrition targets (calories, protein, carbohydrates, fiber)

Workout routines and macro recommendations are free. Upgrade to premium for the meal planning functionality- includes a free trial.

Support: philip@strongrfastr.com
Business Inquiries: mary@strongrfastr.com
Website: https://www.strongrfastr.com/

Any problems or feature suggestions? Let us know! We‚Äôre good listeners.

FB: StrongrFastr
IG: StrongrFastr
Twitter: @StrongrFastrApp

comments: Great app! Was super impressed when I reached out and had several emails back and forth. This app was perfect for me because it took all the mental work out of getting healthy. Deciding on a workout routine was intimidating. Eating healthy even more so. Even if I wasn't pairing with a workout, deciding what to eat has always been difficult for me and often resulted in a lot of food waste. Not anymore! I am learning how to cook so much and my diet is tastier than ever actually!

Awesome. This app has everything I need. I can track my weight, meal plan, schedule workouts...and it has stats galore. There is lots of flexibility in the setup, so I can schedule a cheat day each week into my plan. There are plenty of recipes to use, and if you go off-plan you can add things manually. There are loads of features. It's exactly what I was looking for.

App is pretty good, has a lot of features and if you're willing to pay it offers a lot more. I highly recommend his, but 2 stars for the following reasons: the weight doesn't increase weekly by default (at least on the PHAT routine), and it doesn't have T bar or Hex bar as options when substituting for others. Add t bar and hex bar and I'll increase my rating Edit: dev responded and made clarity to all my issues. Highly recommend it

Great structure! I love how much I can customize! There are a variety of options for popular workout routines. Within that I can select my rest days, and choose from a huge database of movements based on my equipment available. By following the routine it is helpful in selection of weight and keeping me on task with appropriate rest time between sets. I want to explore the nutrition/meal component more. It is so cool to have everything in one place. Thank you!

This has been exactly what I've been looking for. The ability to pick from a variety of workout plans, set different goals, meal planner, and the grocery list all in one has been easy to use and makes everything easier and faster for me. A couple things: the food search gets glitchy and there's a delay, and maybe the addition of vegan or no-dairy diet restrictions. Also, am I able to update the days I can work out and the length of time, mid week/routine? Love this app!

title: Yahoo Mail ‚Äì Organized Email
description:
Thanks for checking out the Yahoo Mail app‚Äîthe best email app to organize your Gmail, Microsoft Outlook, AOL, AT&T and Yahoo mailboxes. Whether you need a clutter-free mailbox, added customization, different views for deals, receipts, and attachments, or even more storage, we‚Äôve got you covered. 

Favorite features:

Use any email address
Don‚Äôt make your other inboxes jelly. Add your Gmail, Outlook or AOL account and keep everything in one place. Custom settings, colors and notifications make it a breeze to keep your accounts separate.

Unsubscribe
Go forth and unsubscribe from the spam and junk mail you don‚Äôt want to see in your inbox. Yahoo Mail shows all the mailing lists you're subscribed to on one screen and makes it easy to opt-out in one tap.

Today view
Rain or shine, you‚Äôre one tap away from what‚Äôs happening. Find weather and news highlights right from your email app.

 Attachments view	
Looking for that one doc from that one person? Or, a photo from brunch three Sundays ago? Don‚Äôt panic, It‚Äôs right here. See all of your photos and files attachments in one easy view.

Customization
Your inbox, your vibe. Customize the bottom nav bar with the folders and views you care about most. Then, pick custom sounds, themes, swipes to add your own flavor and unboring your inbox. 

Travel view
Travel stress-free. This view keeps all of your flight information in one organized spot. Smart Updates, from gate changes to delays and cancellations, will instantly appear in the app, so once you check in‚Äîyou can check waaaaaay out.

Deals view
Expires today? Challenge accepted. See the deals from your inbox in one quick view or enable location permissions to see a map of deals near you and get notified in real-time as you walk into your favorite stores.

Groceries view
Win at groceries, every time. Add your grocery store loyalty cards to save coupons that will automatically get applied at checkout. 

People view
Only see emails from your favorite people. Ignore the robots.

Receipts view
No more crumpled receipts in your pocket. Find them neatly organized in your inbox. 

Sounds + notifications
Choose from several categories of notifications, custom sound alerts and visual settings‚Äîso, you get the reminders you need. And none you don‚Äôt.  

Accessibility
Features high contrast themes, dynamic text resizing, and optimized for use with VoiceOver screen readers. Plus, folders at the bottom of the Inbox allow assistive technology users to navigate with less effort.

1000 GB storage
You can‚Äôt see your whole world without room to roam. Download the app and you‚Äôll never have to delete memories to get your mail again.

Yahoo Mail Pro
Get ad-free mail on Yahoo Mail for Android and priority customer support.

+	Available as an in-app purchase at $0.99/month or $9.99/year
+	Subscription will auto-renew each month or year within 24 hours of your renewal date
+	Manage or cancel your subscription via Account Settings

Terms of service: https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/terms/product-atos/comms-mailadfree/index.htm

Privacy policy: https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/products/mail/index.htm

https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/terms/product-atos/comms-mailadfree/index.htm and privacy policy at https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/products/mail/index.htm

Please note: This app features Nielsen‚Äôs proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. You may also visit Settings in the app to opt-out of Nielsen measurement.

recentChanges:
This latest release includes a brand new Videos tab where you can:
‚Ä¢ Watch live local and primetime NFL games for free on your phone all season long
‚Ä¢ Access other sports video content on demand when there are no live games scheduled including highlights, predictions, recaps, and more
comments: I hate that ads are automatically placed at the top of my email every time I open the app. Then, when Im scrolling down through my emails, there is this wierd break in the list to show me yet another advertisement in the background. Also, deleting large amounts of email is tedious and takes forever. Half the time, it crashes before deleting anything. That being said, apart from the advertising forced on me, the app looks good and I like that I can change to color of the bar at the top.

This app is harder to use after I updated. The files no longer display a constant subfolder. I have to select from the main folder every time. Also, it takes longer to move from one folder to another. It still has the issue of not allowing me to move a subfolder, so I have to create a new subfolder, move contents from one to another, then delete the old one. The improvements have not improved it. I am a bit sorry I updated.

Really bummed after recent updates. Before, when you wanted to move a number of emails to the same folder and opened up the folders list, it displayed the folder you were using. Now, whenever you open the folders list, you're at the beginning of the list and the first folder. So each time you have to repeatedly scroll to the proper folder. I also don't like the links to similar emails that appear at the top of each email. You have to scroll down to see the email message. Put em at the bottom.

What's happened with this app? It constantly freezes up. I have to keep closing and opening it in an attempt to read my mail. I've used this app for a long time with no problems but lately it is just a horrible experience. I am using a Samsung S2 tablet. I've had similar problems on my S9 phone. My Internet is fine. I have no issues with anything else. What's up?

Nothing but problems since having to reload app on the 20th of October. Been a loyal subscriber for 20 years, but will change if improvement isnt seen in the next day or so. App is taking forever to update and replicate on Samsung S2 Tablet. Never had this issue on the 'old' application. The S20 phone doesn't seem to have a problem other than continually trying to load. It's is not a network or wifi issue.

title: Peel The App üçå Scan ingredients on labels & menus
description:
ü•´ üìÑ üç´  DETECT HARMFUL INGREDIENTS ON FOOD LABELS AND RESTAURANT MENUS  üç´ üìÑ ü•´

Peel is the easiest way to learn about and detect the harmful ingredients that may conflict with your food intolerance or diet: 

With PEEL SCAN, you can scan the ingredients list on any FOOD LABEL, RESTAURANT MENU, or RECIPE and get an instant answer: "Avoid" or "Safe" based on your food intolerances (e.g. Gluten, Dairy, Yeast, Fructose, etc.), your dietary considerations (e.g. No Added Sugars, No Artificial Sweeteners, No Harsh Food Colorings, etc.), or a popular diet you follow (e.g. Vegan, Vegetarian, Paleo, Palm Oil Free, etc.). 

With PEEL SEARCH, you can skip Google and lookup thousands of ingredient names to instantly check if they fit your diet.

Peel will help you make healthy choices for you and your family :) 


üòé üí™  WHY PEEL IS DIFFERENT  üí™ üòé

‚ñ∂ WORKS ON ANY INGREDIENT LIST, NOT LIMITED BY BARCODES: Peel does NOT rely on static barcode databases (which are constrained to geographical regions resulting in limited or outdated data points). Peel uses OCR technology and therefore allows you to directly scan and analyse ingredients on any food label, restaurant menu, or recipe. As long as there are ingredients, in English, you‚Äôre getting a real-time assessment. 

‚ñ∂ GIVES SIMPLE DIET-BASED SCIENTIFIC ADVICE: Peel provides straightforward advice: "Avoid" or "Safe to eat" based on your diet preferences. No generic product assessment, no information overload. Peel gives scientific & objective assessment of ingredients, backed by our Expert Nutritionists and Nutritional Therapists. 

‚ñ∂ ANALYSES MULTIPLE DIETS AT ONCE: If you select more than one diet in Peel (paid plan), every time you scan or search, you will get an aggregate recommendation based on all your diets/preferences.   


üçé üçå  DIETS WE COVER   üçå üçé  

‚ñ∂ INTOLERANCES 
Gluten 
Wheat 
Cow Dairy 
Casein 
Lactose 
All Dairy 
Yeast (Baker's & Brewer's) 
Baker's Yeast 
Brewer's Yeast 
Fructose 
Eggs - Coming Soon
Soy - Coming Soon
Corn - Coming Soon
Nuts - Coming Soon

‚ñ∂ POPULAR DIETS
Vegan
Vegetarian
Palm Oil Free
Paleo
Low Lectins
Keto - Coming Soon
Low FODMAPS - Coming Soon

‚ñ∂ DIETARY CONSIDERATIONS 
No Added Sugars
No Artificial Sweeteners
No Harsh Food Colorings
No Harmful Flavourings

NOTE: We take your health with the utmost importance. In case of allergies or any serious diseases, please reach out to the product manufacturer for further confirmation on the scan results and certitude about the contents product.

We‚Äôre still a small team, but working hard with expert nutritionists and doctors to add more diets on the platform. If you still can‚Äôt find your diet in the list of supported ones, feel free to reach out to us and propose one.

We love brutal feedback >> peeltheapp@gmail.com.

For our terms and conditions, please visit: https://www.peeltheapp.com/about-peel/terms-of-service. 

Download Peel The App now and take the first step towards a healthier lifestyle. We're proud to be supporting you along this journey.

comments: Great experience with the app so far! It's extremely comprehensive and really opens up options for those of us who don't always have the time to cook meals from scratch. Being able to use the app to quickly look up all ingredients without missing anything is awesome. I for one don't have every single ingredient ever made out of animal products memorized as they can be unrecognizable words, so this app is immensely helpful!
This app is a game changer, it completely changed my approach to buying food and searching for ingredients to know if they fit my gluten intolerance. Thank you Peel
Amazing app! Super helpful! Thank you Peelüíúüíúüíú
Been waiting over a year for this app to come to Android from iOS. Thanks for finally making it happen!

I'm celiac and I hate eating/shopping for GF foods. Its so stressful/horrible!!! This app just turned the tides on this feeling I've had my ENTIRE LIFE. Thank you to my Reddit person ramihallal!!!!! You kept me in the loop about this app and when it was ready for andriod!!!!!!ü§éü§éü§éü§éü§éü§é THANK YOU!!!!

title: textPlus: Free Text & Calls
description:
Call and message your friends with a real phone number - no phone service required! SMS text any US or Canada number or call worldwide.

#1 free text and call app with a local phone number of your choice. 
Send and receive unlimited sms / text / MMS / group messages to anyone in the US or Canada.
Ad-supported or cheap local & international calling - you choose how to call!

textPlus is the ONLY app where keeping in touch is made simple, cheap and hassle free.

*********************************************
textPlus also lets you do more: 

- Turn your tablet into a phone for free texting and calling with a real US number! 
- Great for keeping in touch with family/friends in the US / Canada while traveling abroad
- Group texting / message / send MMS & SMS
- Toll-free calling from anywhere in the world with no restrictions!
- Unlimited free inbound calling and calls - your friends can always reach you
- Access your chat and call history on any device with free cloud hosting
- Save tons of money on your mobile plan

IS IT REALLY FREE?
Yes - no fees to send unlimited SMS messages and you can earn credits to place a call (inbound calls are completely FREE). 

HOW IS IT FREE?
The app comes with a few ads. If you don't like ads, you can purchase a subscription to remove them. 

Great SMS phone alternative for: 

- anyone needing a second number for work / privacy
- kids 
- seniors
- travelers to and from the US
- anyone looking to save money on cell phone bills.


*********************************************

Highlights:

- Full picture messaging (MMS): send, receive and save pictures
- Customizable text-tone, ringtone & vibration
- Customizable themes
- Quick Reply to easily (and quickly) respond to friends
- Unified inbox: send and receive your texts directly via any device as your one-stop SMS texting app!
- Real SMS texting and calling: text and call ANY phone that accepts SMS texting, and ANY phone for calling.
- Voicemail
- Works over WiFi or data 

FOLLOW TEXTPLUS
www.facebook.com/textplus
www.twitter.com/textplus
Questions? Email support@nextplus.me

Ads By Facebook
Facebook wants to show ads that are relevant to you. We may consider ads for you based on information you share on Facebook and your use of other websites and apps. To learn more about this type of advertising and your choices about it, visit https://www.facebook.com/about/ads.

Location data may be used for providing you more relevant ads.

comments: Sometimes I wonder why some apps are really being made in the first place when you're not able to use it. I tried signing up and after the bot verification process, it ended up displaying "can't connect to text+ service" multiple times! Developers should be responsible for their creation and should fix issues so to get a better audience. Revenue isn't only what matters here. Integrity does too. So please devs

No u didn't fix the issue about the phone returning to the previous screen. Also when choosing notification sounds, I'd choose one to listen to & it'd save it & go back to the settings screen. Therefore I had to reopen it each time to go through every sound to make final choice. Then when I went to ringtone none of the choices made a sound .

Pls what happen to textplus service yesterday, suddenly my textplus just logout, i use my gmail to login back, i didn't.. Pls find something to do oooo, even i want to create another one, but it didn't , pls why this app is doing like this, or else cancel this app üò°

Ive relied on textplus for use with work. I am a senior software engineerand cannot use cell service in some locations. Either due to work location or the employer i am under contract with. Ive only had a couple issues with textplus but since its free i have no room to complain. It is great for off grid use and i refuse to switch to another.

Like if you only want to text this is a good app, granted sometimes when the ads start playing the timer doesn't go down so you're stuck with an ad that's left paused and you need to restart the app. It was not properly described, because you have to pay or earn credits to make phone calls. But other than that if you're only texting it's okay

title: Diarrhea Diet Tips Foods Help
description:
Diarrhea Diet Tips Foods Help is a free app that provides you complete information about diarrhea causes symptoms treatment dietary guidelines and remedies for the treatment. Diarrhea is not considered a disease but is a condition or symptom caused by of certain other diseases. 

Diarrhea is the frequent passage of loose, watery, soft stools with or without abdominal bloating, pressure, and cramps commonly referred to as gas. It can come on suddenly, run its course, and be helped with home care to prevent complications such as dehydration.Dysentery is diarrhea that contains blood, pus, or mucus.

You may experience diarrhea as a result of a number of conditions or circumstances. Potential causes of diarrhea include:

‚Ä¢ Food intolerance, such as lactose intolerance
‚Ä¢ Food allergy, celiac disease or gluten allergy
‚Ä¢ An adverse reaction to a medication like antibiotics
‚Ä¢ Viral infection
‚Ä¢ Bacterial infection 
‚Ä¢ Intestinal disease
‚Ä¢ Parasitic infection
‚Ä¢ Gallbladder or stomach surgery

Generally, the symptoms depend on the cause. The person may feel one or more of the following:
* Nausea
* Abdominal pain
* Cramping
* Bloating
* Dehydration
* Fever
* Bloody stools
* Mucous in stools
* Noisy stomach
* Frequent urge to evacuate your bowels 
* Large volume of watery stools

Diet modification is the major help to treat diarrhea. The person suffering with the problem needs to get proper rest and soft diet or BRAT diet but diet consistency can be modified as the condition improves. Including probiotics like curd helps in keeping gut healthy.

comments: I love this app. The slimes realistic, and when you tap or drag the screen, the slime reacts as if it was a real slime. It is so satisfying that it makes me feel like I am actually touching slime. All the other mini-games are great too. There are so many ingredients to choose from. But it does take long to collect them. And I do not care about ads. People who complain about ads are impatient. I am yet to try Squishy Magic. Please add a thermochromic slime that changes color when touched.

This game is surprisingly awesome. Especially for those of you who are a fan of slime. I am a big fan of slime and I also enjoy making them so I love making, naming and choosing slime in this game even if you do it virtually. Just one thing, though, I noticed that one of the amazing prizes is very hard to get. Which is the thing I always hope most for. You will find out after playing this game. So what are you waiting for? Install this, right now!

This game is great! It teaches you the ingredients to how to make different slimes, and you get to actually play with the slime you made inside the game when you finish it! You have decorations and colors you can add to your slimes, and its easy to get slime types, colors, and decorations! This is super satysfying ASMR. Would i recommend this game? YES, DEFINETLY, ABSOLUTLY

I love it!! <3 Its super realistic and relaxing and it relieves my anxiety and stress everything is just so relaxing!!! I definitely recommend this to everyone its amazing and I love it you guys did a great job on this app its perfect! But one thing after playing with the game for a few minutes it gives you an ad but they're really easy to skip and there not that long :) ‚ô°‚ô°‚ô°

This game is the best!!! :) Its so satisfying and stress relieving and you can make lots of different slimes and you can watch ads for coins game is so fun and it is fun to collect all the Slime colors decorations and slime I really like to collect the Slime colors because there are so many and all them are beautiful I already have half of them already i would love to have all of them and theres NO PROBLOMS :)))))

comments: This is the absolute best slots game, that I have ever played. The graphics, in the games are unique and the wins play better than all so far. Fun and addictive. But you run out of free coins really fast!!! It would be nice if they would offer more ways to earn them. Once you run out of free spins, which is REALLY fast, you have to buy coins to play!!! It sux!!! And if you're like me, you know that to win more you HAVE to do a MAX BET!!! That is where they get you!!! You use up all of your free spins this way!! THEN YOU HAVE TO BUY MORE SPINS!!! DONT GET SUCKED IN LIKE I DID!!! IT ISN'T WORTH IT!!!!

I understand it is a play-to-win game and so I had no problem making the occasional purchase - but recently their greed has just gotten to be too much. The way the game is programmed to purposely work against you to force more purchases has taken any fun or sense of the excitement out of the game. They aren't even coy about it; it's just blatant and irritating. I won't be spending another penny on any Playtika games.

Here we go again with the app doing more cool features which causes loading issues that go on for months. Always the same advice to uninstall and reinstall which does nothing. It seems this always happens close to tournaments ending so you can't reach the grand prize. Also too many contests going on at the same time, so you are being forced to play. Just what are these "cool features?"

Everything in this online casino is about trying to get you to spend money on air. Everytime you switch games you have to navigate through 6 ads begging for money. Enough is enough. One ad is ok two is tollerable but so many ads begging for money is insane. If I was to spend money at an online casino it would be one where I have a chance to win real money. Sorry ceasers but your online casino is well below par in my view.

title: Allergy Travel Cards (Translate Your Allergies)
description:
Don't risk your health while you travel. 

This app communicates your food allergy cards in 36 languages for the 14 most common food allergies, or lifestyle choices, for over 500 unique allergy cards.

Allergy Travel Cards offers full offline support so you can travel with the app and not worry about needing network access. Cards can be downloaded, shared, kept in your notification tray for quick access, stored on the main page of the app or can be created on the fly. 

The free version is fully functioning and allows cards to be created in English, Dutch, Czech, French, German and Italian for all 14 food allergies.

The premium version offers all 36 languages, adding support for over 190 countries. 

Allergy cards for the following food allergies are provided - 
Gluten Allergy (Coeliac, Celiac, GF, Gluten)
Nut Allergy
Tree nut Allergy
Celery Allergy
Fish Allergy
Dairy Allergy (Lactose Allergy)
Lupin Allergy
Molluscs Allergy (Shellfish Allergy)
Mustard Allergy
Sesame Allergy
Soya Allergy
Sulphides / Sulfides Allergy
Crustaceans Allergy
Eggs Allergy


This app stores no personal data and has the smallest permissions possible (storage for downloading cards).

Eat Safely, throughout the world.

comments: Great app to take the stress out of travelling with coeliac. Some feed back. Can we have the ability to lock the selected cards, I find I keep inadvertantly deleting them. USA flag on English version... Really?

Terrible...I downloaded and paid for the app to prevent any issues while traveling in Europe. Portuguese and Italian servers asked who did the translation. They understood the allergy so I guess there's that but I would highly recommend you go with a different app.
Great app, love the ability to download and share cards
This particular app was well thought out and so l bought the pro version without a second thought. l like it a lot

Edit: Taken directly from the app description. "Gluten Allergy (Coeliac, Celiac, GF, Gluten or Wheat Allergy)". A gluten allergy is not a wheat allergy. Products can be gluten free but contain wheat. This is a dangerous description. I downloaded this because I travel regularly and have a wheat allergy. Shoving wheat (and believing this to be the same as a gluten allergy or coeliac disease) in with gluten shows a fundamental misunderstanding of the condition. Worrying in an allergy card app.

title: Flashlight (free & without popup ads)
description:
Free, safe and effective LED flashlight app without intrusive popup ads and without unnecessary permissions.

The most important features of the flashlight:
- includes a flashlight widget,
- gesture support, double shake device sideways to turn on/off,
- bright light and high power,
- easy, effective and fast,
- can work when the device is locked,
- safe and without unnecessary permissions,
- free and without popup ads.

Why does the flashlight app require CAMERA permission on older devices?
Technically the flashlight is part of the camera, so sometimes it is required. 
We absolutely do not use camera to preview the image.

comments: Easy to load. No ads. Works as advertised. Not a five -yet. If it's still going good a few months from now, I'll come back and upgrade my rating. Okay I've had this app for several months. It has been very dependable. I am upgrading my rating to a 5. It's been two and a half months since my last comment. The app continues to perform very very well. I have recommended it to friends, and I recommend it here. If you need a cell phone flashlight, this is probably the best one you can get.

Have had this flashlight app for a while and love it! It does what it's supposed to do, without all the unnecessary extras, no annoying adds, and it doesn't glitch on me. Have had it for a year or 2 now, but have been using it every night since our fish unexpectedly had babies (we thought/we're told she was a male...surprise)! The babies are tiny and hard to see, honestly. But this flashlight makes it a lot easier! Great for walking to the bathroom when out camping, too!

I've been looking for this app off and on for roughly 7 years, now. All the others I've tried have too many bells and whistles (flashing strobe lights), gimmicky color changes, or just plain weird variations of patterns (spiraling, hypnotic, etc.). All I wanted was a super-bright flashlight that was on-off at the touch of a button, and this app fills the bill perfectly. Even better, the app stays open for one-click OFF when I'm done.

Update 10.10.20: Still just one ad, once in a while, to Rate 5, even if its already a 5, just one click back and i'm back to no ads on the screen & Best Light!... THANKS Developer! [ ... 1st day rated5] ... installing... I have been looking for years for a better light and mine is still Awesome... THIS FLASHLIGHT IS SO BRIGHT, YIKES! (btw Previous lights had pop-ups sending me onto Browser etc! NO POPUPS, so far... So Thanking Now! Simple! Sleeker! Brighter! Awesomest,SoFar...

It's a simple app that does just what it needs to. The ads at the bottom aren't intrusive. My favorite feature is that I can use the flashlight while having a different app open and active without it automatically turning off the flashlight.

title: Hepatitis Help Prevention Foods Liver Diet Tips
description:
This is a free app containing information about hepatitis disease symptoms causes treatment and diet & food tips. Hepatitis is a disease that affects the organ liver ‚Äìthat plays a vital role in keeping our body healthy by removing impurities from the food we eat. Everything you eat and drink passes through your liver.

Hepatitis is generally caused by virus and is classified into five different types: Hepatitis A Hepatitis B hepatitis C hepatitis D and hepatitis E. Hepatitis B, C and D occur primarily due to contact with infected bodily fluids. The primary causes of Hepatitis A and E are consumption of contaminated water and food. Other causes include eating raw oysters or raw shellfish or raw meat - which carry a higher risk of a Hepatitis A infection.
Not all forms of hepatitis are infectious. Alcohol, medicines, and chemical may be bad for the liver and cause inflammation. A person may have a genetic problem, a metabolic disorder, or an immune related injury. Obesity can be a cause of liver damage which can lead to inflammation. These are known as non-infectious causes.

Eating a balance diet plays important role in treatment of hepatitis. The diet should include foods that are easy on the liver and exclude foods that cause the liver to work harder as this can delay a patient‚Äôs recovery from the disease.

Fruits and vegetables should be a significant part of any diet to help in recovering from a liver disease. They are full of essential nutrients and are easy to digest. As a bonus, they also contain antioxidants, which can protect the liver cells from damage.
Healthy proteins in the form of low-fat milk and dairy products along with lean meats, beans, eggs and soy products can also be a part of a healthy liver diet.
Avoiding deep fried spicy and oily foods is a restriction the patient should follow. 
Drinking more water and healthy fluids helps in quick recovery.

title: Healthy Luxe - Easy Healthy Recipes
description:
Better health in your pocket! Healthy Luxe app is home to over 400 nutrient dense recipes that are delicious and easy to prepare. The app caters to a number of different dietary requirements from gluten free, dairy free, nut free and refined sugar free to regimes such as vegan, vegetarian and paleo. Upon selecting your personal dietary requirements, only the recipes that are relevant to you will be displayed.

For premium members of Healthy Luxe app you will also have access to recipe videos, detailed nutrition panels with a macro nutrients breakdown as well as key micro nutrients for each and every recipe, an ingredient spotlight on the key benefits of a primary ingredient in each recipe, customisable meal planner that is tailored to you based on your preferences / dietary requirements and you can chat to a nutritionist directly through the app or book an online consultation. You will also have access to exclusive new recipes added weekly. 

The Healthy Luxe app gives you all the tools you need to take control of your health, learn how to make more informed food choices and how to prepare delicious food that will satisfy your taste buds and nourish your bodies.

APP FEATURES:

NUTRITIOUS RECIPES:
-> Over 400 recipes including basics, breakfast, main meals, desserts and sides.
-> Caters to a number of dietary requirements and preferences including gluten free, dairy free, refined sugar free, nut free, vegan and vegetarian.
-> How-to cooking demonstration videos.* 
-> New recipes added weekly.*
-> Ingredient spotlight highlighting the key benefits of a primary ingredient for each recipe.*
-> Detailed nutrition panel for each recipe with a breakdown of macro nutrients and key micro nutrients*. 
-> Book a nutrition consultation through our app.
-> Chat to a nutritionist through our app.*
-> Offline downloads to access your favourite recipes at anytime.*
-> Save recipes to a favourites folder. 
-> Health tips to integrate into every day life.
-> Recipe collections sponsored by our favourite health food brands and direct links to their respective online stores.
-> Occasional in-app purchases will be available for exclusive recipes (note: if you are a premium member of the app you will have access to all recipe collections with no additional cost). 

MEAL PLANNER:*
-> Create your own customisable meal plan based on personal preferences and health goals.
-> Upon answering a few nutrition questions and selecting dietary requirements, we will recommend recipes that are best suited to you.
-> You can add multiple recipes to each allocated time slot if you‚Äôre cooking for a group of people or wish to prepare a main & side dish.

SHOPPING LIST:
-> Add ingredients to your shopping list at the click of a button.
-> Smart shopping list organised by recipe! 

*Indicates features that are only available to those who subscribe to the app. 

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING:

Healthy Luxe is free to download with access to hundreds of free recipes, health tips and shopping list feature. Premium members require an active subscription available on a monthly or yearly plan. For monthly subscriptions, users are billed once per month and for yearly subscription, users are billed once per year. Subscriptions are automatically renewed unless cancelled prior to the renewal date. Members who choose a monthly subscription have access to a 2 week free trial. 

ABOUT HEALTHY LUXE: 

The Healthy Luxe app was created by a mother and daughter team, Jennifer Murrant and Hannah Singleton, with combined skills of nutrition, naturopathy, coaching psychology, media, photography, food styling, a love of cooking and of course, passion for health and wellbeing. Our focus is on variety, balance and great flavour. All photography is by Healthy Luxe unless otherwise stated.

To learn more about Healthy Luxe, please visit our website www.healthyluxe.com.au and follow us on Instagram @healthyluxe for daily updates.

For support please contact hannah@healthyluxe.com.au.
