You also have facility to directly contact Dietitian if you want to consult your diet and nutrition related issues and can also get your personalized diet chart as per your case and body Parameters. You can also consult the dietician for your queries.

Tips for Better Digestion and Metabolism
Warning Signs of Bad Digestions:
Factors that affect your metabolism
Side Effects of a Slow Metabolism
Side Effects of a Fast Metabolism
Good Food for Better Digestion and Metabolism
Food to Avoid for Better Digestion


Dieting ideas and tips of this app have been carefully reviewed by Experienced and professional dietitians carefully. If you require additional assistance from real professional dietitians, app allows you to contact the dietician from the App to consult your queries and problems online. You can even seek for your personalized diet chart from the dietitian by using the options from the App.

If you have any medical history or have any additional queries, you can contact dietitian by tapping the Contact button within the App.

title: mobiCeliac [Scanner]
description:
WARNING: This app ONLY includes gluten-free info for SPAIN.
--------
mobiCeliac [Scanner] is an app for your device that allows you to get gluten-free food info for SPAIN:
- Use your device camera as a reader of barcode labels (EAN13, UPC, etc) found in packaging of food & drink products and drugs/medicines you can find in SPAIN.
  This app checks automatically whether or not it is included in the Food and Drink Directory and in the Medicines Directory of gluten-free products in SPAIN.
- Learn to recognize all Food Categories and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level
- Learn to spot all product Ingredients and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level

mobiCeliac is the only gluten-free target app for Spain appearing in the "European Directory of Health Apps" promoted by the European Commission (http://www.mobiceliac.com/2013/directorio-europeo-de-aplicaciones-medicas/)

After installing the app, you will need to:
- Purchase a subscription to data updates. It includes a 7 day free trial period to access the full database
  Just select the main option "Settings"  > "License Management" and get your subscription
- Download the database
  Select the main option "Data Update", tap the "Download" button and wait until the data download finishes successfully.
Now you can access more than 20,000+ gluten-free food & drink barcodes and all medicine barcodes that are distributed or sold in SPAIN.

This app is targeted to help people suffering from Coeliac Disease (CD) or other gluten-sensitivity diseases.
The Info Guides are compatible with other Spanish Societies gluten-free products list (ACySG, SMAP and FACE)

title: Food Additives
description:
Today's food is full of additives. Are they dangerous?
Our app helps you find the answer. Try it, it's free!

This app is the perfect tool while food shopping. In a second, you can find out if they are safe for you and your family or if they are suspicious or dangerous. It also lets you know if they are suitable for vegetarians, vegans or different religious groups.

The app shows the ingredients' legal status in Australia and New Zealand, Europa and the United States. It allows you to quickly check on more than 500 ingredients. You can search them by E-code, by name or by alternative names.

Features:
- You can search for food additives by E-number, by name or by alternative name(s).
- Fast E-CODE Computer for easy and fast search just in codes.
- Light theme and dark theme.
- Customized details page.
- You can filter additives based on text queries, or on risks.
- The lists can be sorted by names or by E numbers.
- A new favorites list can be managed by user.
- The history list retains the last additives that you searched.

Extra:
- It allows you to check whether an additive is suitable for vegans, vegetarians or for people from different religions.
- It allows integration with Google search widget.
- Zoom in the description field in details page can be done by scale gesture.
- Highlight description words.

Some of additives are harmless, many not quite healthy and several are dangerous.
Many people have experienced various negative reactions to food additives. Certain groups may be more susceptible to adverse effects, such as asthma sufferers, chemically sensitive and allergic individuals, pregnant women or hyperactive children.

So here they are: preservatives and sweeteners, food colorings or taste enhancers, unveiled!

comments: Constant pop ups wanting you to purchase. You have to say no to 3 ads in a row before you can spin again. A few spins later...there they are again. Hit what they consider a "big win" which can be quite often and guess what??? AD!!! Wanting you to multiply your winning by paying $4.99. I played for maybe 5 minutes and had to say "No" to so many pop-ups that I am uninstalling and never playing this game again.

LOVE this slot game! I play a lot of slots, but usually delete them because you don't win and barely get enough in the daily bonus to keep playing. This one however is perfect! Lots of fun slots with different exciting bonuses on every slot (which is a must have for me, I don't like basic slots) and you ACTUALLY win! I LOVE it! Easy 5 star rating (:

Early still, but it has cool slots and at least if you lose your ass, you can watch ads to earn yourself back into the game pretty quickly. That's a huge plus for me. I absolutely hate slot games that give a crappy bankroll to start and drains it in no time just to try to sell coin packages. We'll designed and big game selection too. Keep up the good work!

I haven't seen "buy this" pop ups THIS awful since the late 90s just before pop up blockers were made to stop the disgusting greedy bs. This developer needs to get a grip. I was getting PAID to play this and try it out and I'm doing it is THAT bad. They need to rethink their policy on that. For real. Someone on their team probably deserves to be fired for this not happy nostalgia, this needs to stop. 100% trash till then. Update: just bc there's an x doesn't make the avalanch of pop ups okay.

This game was great after I paid a couple bucks for a purchase to make ads go away (been playing nearly 2 yrs). But now, the Level Race and the Winning Cards are super annoying and interfere with tournaments. I get that you want to give people other options to get more coins, but you should also give players the option to opt out of these things. I buy the coins on my own and being harassed by these constant pop-ups is a deterrent. Once my coins are exhausted I'll likely just delete the app.

title: Find Real Food
description:
Description 
USA only! Free 30 day trial; subscription required after initial 30 days.
Purchase of a subscription enables access to website and Android versions, for access across all your devices with a single login!
Visit www.findrealfoodapp.com

Find the most amazing, nutrient dense foods - NEAR YOU! Find Real Food Locations allows you to search among 15,000 meticulously researched, pre-approved healthy foods and locate stores nearby by using its GPS enabled interactive maps.

SEARCH products and find out which ones are sold near you! This guide has the winning list of over 15,000 meticulously researched foods and brands highest in nutrient density, and lack of additives and processing.

DISCOVER new and healthy foods that can be shipped to your doorstep, anywhere in the U.S.! See user ratings and read user reviews to help discover and learn about the most nutrient dense, healthy foods available, and have them shipped directly to your home.

Healthy grocery shopping can be such a challenge with so many brands to choose from and tricky labels that hide harmful ingredients! It‚Äôs hard to know what to buy, no matter whether you are following a Traditional diet, Paleo, Primal, Vegetarian, or GAPS diet. Good quality ‚ÄúReal Food‚Äù is at the foundation of every one of them!

In this easy-to-use grocery guide, over 15,000 food and beverage products from 30 different categories have been meticulously researched by the Weston A. Price Foundation (WAPF), a not-for-profit organization founded in 1999, dedicated to education, research, and activism on health-promoting, traditionally prepared, nutrient-dense, whole foods in the human diet.

Benefits of this app include:
‚Ä¢Find locations near you which sell great approved foods in stores, Farmer‚Äôs Markets, and at small local farms.
‚Ä¢Save time and money choosing exceptional quality healthy brands and groceries.
‚Ä¢Trust Weston A. Price Foundation‚Äôs well researched list of ‚ÄúBest Quality‚Äù rated brands and foods.
‚Ä¢Discover new and amazing foods available for shipment anywhere in the U.S.
‚Ä¢Learn what qualifies as ‚ÄúBest‚Äù rated Real Food, and what to avoid in each category.
‚Ä¢Read food ratings and reviews on products and brands by other users.
‚Ä¢Easily share about brands and products you love with friends on Facebook.
‚Ä¢Be part of a community of Real Food lovers, and add your own ratings and experiences.

Features:
‚Ä¢ 30 searchable food and beverage categories including milk, cheese, yogurt, butter, eggs, seafood, beef, veggies, poultry, nuts, bread, baking supplies, snacks, oils, etc.
‚Ä¢ 1,200+ food brands, 15,000+ products and 100,000+ locations throughout the country
‚Ä¢ Easily filter to narrow down searches by category, brand, quality, or user-rating
‚Ä¢ Easily rate and review products to share your opinion
‚Ä¢ Suggest new products to be reviewed by the WAPF for inclusion in the guide

Save time and money and improve your health by using this guide to find stores near you that sell WAPF approved products which meet nutrition experts criteria, who researched which products and brands are best. Each category of food must uphold specific quality standards in order to qualify for the guide.

Foods approved by the Find Real Food WAPF Shopping Guide include:
‚Ä¢Biodynamic and organic
‚Ä¢Grass-fed (free range) beef and wild game
‚Ä¢Pasture-raised poultry and eggs
‚Ä¢Wild caught seafood
‚Ä¢Raw or minimally processed grassfed whole milk and dairy
‚Ä¢Cultured dairy and Fermented veggies
‚Ä¢Soaked/sprouted grains and nuts

Visit our website for tutorials, FAQs, and to contact us with any suggestions at www.RealFoodMobileApp.com
Subscriptions :
30 Day free Trail
6 Month $3.99
Annual $5.99
Non-Renewing Subscriptions
http://findrealfoodapp.com/page/terms-and-privacy-policy

comments: The app itself was pretty good. I wish there was a trial period before you have to pay so you can at least see what products are available. I subscribed but they don't have an unsubscribe option, so for a couple months I had to pay for it until I figured out how to unsubscribe (you have to find the app on Google Play and go to "manage subscriptions"). At least the subscription is cheap though so if the app doesn't have what you want, you haven't lost much money.
Weston A. Price was the real deal. Love it

Paid for and downloaded this app over 6 months ago. Never got to use it as it gave a message stated my subscription expired. I reached out several-several times for help and no one ever got back to me. It feels like being scammed. I paid for a service I never received. Very disappointing. The app should be free until you work out the bugs and get it to a decent level of function.

Did not appreciate the auto subscription renewal at all. Nor do I remember being asked to approve the  auto renewal.  It just stole 30 minutes of my time trying to figure out how to stop the auto renewal.  Also I did not notice one bit of improved functionality by paying the most I have ever paid for an Android app.  Nor do I approve of my name being included in this review.  I am being generous giving this  two stars.  I will also bet that I can not come back here and bump my review up if I later learn to like this app.   I find it unacceptable to have reviews that can not later be changed.  After paying $20 I also learned that almost nothing is sold local by farms. ANd if it is not sold by a local farm I sure can not afford to buy it. Mail order is totally out of the question, for me economically.    There is no easy way to find anything. The app is still confusing.  Don't get me wrong I love WAP but sure do not like this app at all. An instructional video would be a lot of help.

I agree with others about the out of date information about the farms listed on the site/app. I paid $13 for a 6 month subscription and the best information they can give me is that a  local chain grocer sells Applegate products. Well duh! I have noticed that when I went shopping. This app is completely useless, it won't give you information you already know, and is NOT updated.

title: Mexican recipes free cooking apps
description:
Mexican recipes app offers you many healthy and quick recipes. These include side dish recipes, soup recipes, tortas recipes, stew recipes, chorizo recipes, bistec recipes, recipes for breakfast and recipes for dessert.

Festive recipes
We have curated a tasty recipe collection to celebrate Chinese New year, American super bowl. Cook romantic Mexican recipes for valentine's day, thanksgiving, easter.

Popular healthy mexican recipes of the month
Recipes like mexican street tacos, traditional chiles en nogada, 30 minute chicken fajitas, grandma's chicken noodle soup, mexican pozole, simple perfect enchiladas, broccoli soup and chilaquiles verdes are popular in January & February.

Simple mexican food recipe instructions with picture
Every healthy Mexican recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many light recipes for free in our Mexican recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Mexican recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite Mexican food recipes
Add your favourite healthy Mexican recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved Mexican food recipes offline. You can also create healthy Mexican recipe collections on the basis of weekend party ideas, vegetarian, dinner ideas, lunch ideas, mexicano etc.

Mexican Food Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for healthy Mexican recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover Mexican food recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have healthy Mexican recipes for people following paleo, gluten-free, keto and vegetarian diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have lactose-free recipes, egg-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, dairy-free recipes and peanut-free. Nutritional information like carbs, cholesterol, calories and fat are available in the Mexican recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be tasty and easy with Mexican recipes. Start eating Mexican food recipes with proper meal planner ideas and grocery shopping list.

We offer lots of healthy Mexican recipes:
Cook tasty Mexican food recipes at home using chicken leg, mexican blend cheese, pickled red cabbage & lime juice. Recipes for classic healthy Mexican dishes like mexican beef and rice skillet, carne asada, pambazo mexicano: chorizo-potato sandwich, beef birria recipe and beef chimichangas recipes are available in the app. Our favourite Mexican food recipes include gordita supreme, guacomole recipe, mexican wedding cookies, and fish soup.

Our healthy Mexican recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for buritto, appetizer, pozole etc. Now that you've our Mexican food recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: Cook It Allergy Free & Dealing with Food Allergies
description:
The key to allergy-free cooking is to substitute and separate. With these steps, everyone can enjoy meals and stay safe from an allergic reaction.

Planning meals around food allergens, whether for you or your child, doesn‚Äôt have to be complicated and stressful. All it takes is certain kitchen organization tactics and some simple food swaps.

Any food could provoke an allergic reaction, says Matthew Greenhawt, MD, an allergist at the University of Michigan Allergy Clinic and an assistant professor at the division of allergy and immunology with the University of Michigan Health Center in Ann Arbor. But he says eight foods account for 90 percent of food allergies: milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, and soy.

It‚Äôs rare, but some people, especially children and young adults, can have a severe, life-threatening allergic reaction (anaphylaxis) if they come in contact with these foods. So you want to keep them not only out of dishes you prepare, but also away from ‚Äúsafe‚Äù foods to avoid cross-contamination.

Packing a lunch Free-From the top food allergens is easy with Enjoy Life Foods. All Enjoy Life products are free from wheat, gluten, dairy, peanuts, tree nuts, egg, soy, fish and shellfish, so pack school lunches with confidence.

Give your child their lunchtime favorites knowing each snack and treat from Enjoy Life Foods is allergy-friendly, gluten-free, non-GMO and contains no artificial ingredients. Each product is made at a special, allergy-free facility, so you can nosh without worry. Those living with celiac disease, a gluten intolerance or even a sensitivity can snack away too. All Enjoy Life Foods are gluten and wheat free. And that‚Äôs not all! Products never contain genetically modified organism (GMO) ingredients. With Enjoy Life you can expect delicious natural ingredients, with no artificial anything. So go ahead and eat freely!

The Food Allergens app aims to assist people living with food allergies, which are:
How to Live With a Soy Allergy
How to Get Tested for Food Allergies
How to Deal with Food Allergies
How to Treat Allergies
How to Live With Food Allergies
How to Recognize Peanut Allergies
How to Live With Allergies to Corn
How to Cope with a Milk Allergy
How to Live With an Allergy to Seafood

Food allergies are a defensive response by your immune system to a specific food protein that you may eat. Food allergies are relatively uncommon, affecting 6 ‚Äì 8% of children and up to 3% of adults, and they can have symptoms that range from mild to life-threatening.But by eliminating trigger foods and caring for your overall well-being, you can successfully deal with your food allergies.
Food allergies can be minor or they can be a major health risk ‚Äî even deadly. They can cause hives, constipation, diarrhea, bloating, anaphylaxis (closing of throat), or rash. When testing for food allergies, it is important you do not try to diagnose it on your own.

It has a list of all the common allergens, where they are found, foods to avoid, alternatives and baking ingredient replacements.

Contents:

4 Ingredients Allergies
Abundance Allergies ; egg, nut & dairy 
Allergy cooking with ease
Allergy free afternoon tea
Allergy Free Coach recipe
Allergy-free cooking everyone loves
Allergy-free cooking for kids Allergy Friendly Recipe Allergy Plate

Allergy safe family food ; 185 easy and delicious allergy safe recipes Cooking for Isaiah ; gluten-free & dairy-free recipes for easy delicious meals

Cooking for kids with allergies Cut out the crap ; gluten free, dairy free and preservative free cooking 

Everyday with allergies ; 101 quick and easy recipes free of eggs, dairy and nuts

Finally.. food I can eat! ; a dietary guide and cookbook for people with food allergies and dietary restrictions

If you like this Application please consider leaving a positive review and/or rating for it in the store.

Do not hesitate to make your comment, suggestion, advice and so on via kzapps88@gmail.com

title: City Milk Transport Simulator: Cattle Farming
description:
It is time to become a city milk transporter by driving a milk tank truck. Cover your sleeves and take the charge of the milk van delivery and enjoy the fun of dairy milk. Once you download this milk truck driving fun you will get to know that milk transportation is a duty of great responsibility for that you need to work with a huge truck supply. Play milk supply and enjoy milk distribution missions which are full of exciting features. When you start to play this milk delivery game you will get to know from dairy milk factory to milk cargo transporter is full of fabulous environment and interesting fresh milk delivery thrill. Realistic driving experience and stunning physics of dairy transport has been waiting for you. With all these stunning features the it has many levels which are full of surprises. Just be the part of TwoTwenty Games and have fun with milk bottles and milk supply.
 
The first mission of milk factory simulator is to drive tanker from city to village area. If you ever dream about new milk farm then this offroad city roots is best for you. This pure cattle farming cow game is full of exciting missions such as milking cow. Here you will get a message that cows are bleating and you have to work on milk bar. The next level of truck driving game is to load milk basket into deliver village to city. Let us assure you that this milk trailer has the fun of cargo transporter. While working in this cow milk factory you came to know that some construction is required for cow farm construction. A pure farming cow  is one of the best delivery games in the market. If you milk factory farming games then play this construct cattle  farming house and complete its all tasks. You have brought material for construction as a village milkman now construct cattle house. You need more cattle‚Äôs in you form transport cow and buffalo from city to new farm and be a great villager milk supplier. The next mission of cattle farming is to load forage at trailer and transport and enjoy the milk truck driving. Transport the cows and buffaloes milk bottles to your customers and have fun.
 
City Milk Transport Simulator: Cattle Farming Features:

‚òÖ Play our village dairy milk on any Android device
‚òÖ Buckle up your seat belt and take control of driving and parking
‚òÖ High-quality 3D graphics
‚òÖ Many hours of free fun of real tanker truck driver
‚òÖ Awesome environments of tanker transport simulator
‚òÖ Enjoy awesome game design, created by a team of top game designer.
‚òÖ Enjoy super immersive environment and realistic sound effects.
‚òÖ Finish all levels, with different objectives and challenges
 
Download City Milk Transport Simulator: Cattle Farming  and enjoy the FREE thrill of mega cargo truck. When you play it you will enjoy the fun of animal transport as well as cattle farming.
Do not forget to rate us or give us feedback!

title: Milk Transport Big Truck Simulator 2019
description:
Milk Transport Big Truck Simulator 2019
Looking to play a unique game with an engaging and interesting gameplay? Download Milk Transport Big Truck Simulator 2019, a highly captivating game.
The gameplay of this game is unique yet simple. You will have to play as a dairy supply truck driver and transport milk to different parts of the city. 
The real challenge in this cow milk transport game is to make the deliveries within the given time. So, drive your milk van delivery carefully yet speedily to ensure you reach the destinations on time and your recipients aren‚Äôt kept waiting. 
In this game, apart from donning the role of city milk transport driver, you will also have to deliver milk in off-road areas as well. More deliveries you make on your milk supply truck, the more money you will get.

These are some of the most remarkable features of this farming milk transport game:
Highly-captivating graphics

title: Bring! Grocery Shopping List
description:
Bring! simplifies grocery shopping for millions of shared households.

With the help of shared shopping lists, integrated recipes, loyalty cards and individual shopping suggestions, Bring! will help you save time, money and energy while organising your grocery shopping and accompanies you through the entire shopping process ‚Äì from the inspiration to the joint planning until the final purchase.

Try it out now ‚Äì it's free! 

WHAT‚ÄôS IN IT FOR YOU:

- Create your shopping list easily with just clicks.
- Manage multiple shopping lists with everybody in your household. 
- Leave your heavy wallet at home and save all your loyalty cards in your Bring! wallet instead.
- Get inspired by seasonal, special featurings and tons of other cool food content every day.
- Easily import the recipes and ingredients from your favorite recipe platforms and food blogs.

BETTER PLAN TOGETHER
Create and share shopping lists with your family, colleagues and friends and personalize them for any occasion or store ‚Äì at home, in your office, holiday cabinet or for travels with friends. Manage your shopping lists together via smartphones, tablets and your smartwatch and the voice assistants of Amazon Alexa and the Google Assistant. Send clever, ready-made messages to inform your contacts that you are going shopping or have changed the list. Add your own photos to the items on your shopping list to always let your friends know what brand to buy. You will also get individual shopping suggestions and reminders tailored to your needs ‚Äì so there's always milk for coffee in your fridge.

GET NEW FOOD INSPIRATION
Find daily cooking inspiration, as well as tips and tricks in the Bring! Inspiration Stream. Get inspired by seasonal, special featurings and tons of other cool food content every day. Easily import the recipes and ingredients from your favorite recipe platforms and food blogs on the web via the share extension of your browser. Like your favourite recipes and save them in your own collection. See what‚Äôs trending now and which recipes and food blogs other users love. Check out our inspiration stream and new tools now to have more fun & be more efficient while planning your meals and grocery shopping with others:
- Quantity calculator & item predictor for recipes
- Like and share your favorites recipes with others
- See what food trend you can't miss

WHY BRING!?
The Bring! app can be downloaded for free. 
Quick and free registration via Google and Facebook accounts.

YOUR FEEDBACK
Your inputs will help us steer Bring! in the right direction and create the best shopping experience for you and millions of shoppers around the world. 
Contact us: feedback@getbring.com

We can't wait to hear from you,
Your Bring! Team

comments: Great system, really handy for the whole family!!! It would make more sense though if you had to tap and hold the items to remove them from the list and just tap once to edit... So basically the other way around. Because the way it works now it happens to us quite often that we accidentally remove items from the list. But other than that, super happy with the app :)

Okay so I've used it for the first time for shopping yesterday, and yeah random things did get added to my list. It was frustrating because it was items that we go through regularly and it made us doubt if we actually needed it or not. Also I wish the inspiration page was bigger. I wish there were 100s of recipes you could search for rather than there be the same 5 recipes on a list. Over all I love the idea of this app, but it needs some work. I'll keep using it for now.

Great app and would normally give it five stars but recently the Wear OS app doesn't seem to be sending notifications? It's strange as I can get notifications from Bring! to my phone when the Wear OS app isn't installed but obviously can't view my list on my watch without the app. But when I install the Wear OS Bring! app on my watch the notifications no longer come through. Any ideas? Have made sure all relevant notification permissions are set up on both the Watch and Phone apps so I don't think the issue is there.

Great app. We live far from town and sometimes one of us will head out to do the shopping. Anything I miss from our shopping list can be sent automatically from my wife's list and vice versa. This is how web based apps should all work.

Amazing grocery/shopping list app.. why? 1) Share lists easily for others to add to 2) Google assistant integration for hands free operation 3) WearOS support 4) stores your loyalty cards in one place 5) clean and intuitive interface 6) responsive development team 7) always improving and incorporating user feedback.

title: Hide Pictures & Videos - Vaulty
description:
We're celebrating 10 years being the app millions trust to protect their privacy!

‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ  ‚ÄúVaulty asks for the least in return for the most.‚Äù - Naked Security

‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ  ‚ÄúFor people with private videos or private pictures on their phone Vaulty could be a life saver.‚Äù - BlueStacks

------------------------
EASY TO USE
------------------------

‚ñåHide Pictures & Videos Within Vaulty
1. Open Vaulty, then tap the lock icon at the top,
2. Tap an album,
3. Tap thumbnails to select files, then tap the lock at the top to hide them.

‚ñå‚ÄùShare‚Äù Pictures & Videos From Other Apps
1. While viewing a picture or a video, tap the share icon,
2. Select Vaulty from the list of apps,
3. Vaulty will remove the pictures and videos from your gallery and hide them safely in your vault.

------------------------
SECURITY FEATURES
------------------------

‚ñåImage & Video Hiding
Lock up any images and videos, then view them from inside the app's beautiful, fast and powerful gallery.

‚ñåPassword Protection
Stay protected. Use a PIN or text password to protect your Vaulty vaults.

‚ñåFree, Automatic, Online Backup
Save your hidden media even if your phone is broken or lost.

‚ñåMultiple Vaults
Keep different vaults to show different people.

‚ñåMugshot
Snap a pic of anyone who enters the wrong password.

------------------------
MEDIA FEATURES
------------------------

‚ñåOrganization
Create new albums. Sort and filter by various attributes. Rename items. Vaulty offers everything a gallery should and then some to keep your pics and vids well sorted.

‚ñåSlideshow
Rotate to fit screen. Random sort. Play GIFs & videos. Vaulty's slideshow allows the ultimate hands-free viewing experience.

‚ñåFull Zoom
Zoom beyond pixel-to-pixel levels to fully enjoy the complete resolution of your pictures (& GIFs).

‚ñåVideo Format Support
Vaulty can play any video your device can handle and if there's a format your phone can't handle natively, Vaulty can securely display your video in third-party apps.

------------------------
Need help? We're always here for you. Go to: http://squidtooth.freshdesk.com/

descriptionHTML:
We're celebrating 10 years being the app millions trust to protect their privacy!

‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚ÄúVaulty asks for the least in return for the most.‚Äù - Naked Security

‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚òÖ ‚ÄúFor people with private videos or private pictures on their phone Vaulty could be a life saver.‚Äù - BlueStacks

------------------------
EASY TO USE
------------------------

‚ñåHide Pictures & Videos Within Vaulty
1. Open Vaulty, then tap the lock icon at the top,
2. Tap an album,
3. Tap thumbnails to select files, then tap the lock at the top to hide them.

‚ñå‚ÄùShare‚Äù Pictures & Videos From Other Apps
1. While viewing a picture or a video, tap the share icon,
2. Select Vaulty from the list of apps,
3. Vaulty will remove the pictures and videos from your gallery and hide them safely in your vault.

------------------------
SECURITY FEATURES
------------------------

‚ñåImage & Video Hiding
Lock up any images and videos, then view them from inside the app's beautiful, fast and powerful gallery.

‚ñåPassword Protection
Stay protected. Use a PIN or text password to protect your Vaulty vaults.

‚ñåFree, Automatic, Online Backup
Save your hidden media even if your phone is broken or lost.

‚ñåMultiple Vaults
Keep different vaults to show different people.

‚ñåMugshot
Snap a pic of anyone who enters the wrong password.

------------------------
MEDIA FEATURES
------------------------

‚ñåOrganization
Create new albums. Sort and filter by various attributes. Rename items. Vaulty offers everything a gallery should and then some to keep your pics and vids well sorted.

‚ñåSlideshow
Rotate to fit screen. Random sort. Play GIFs & videos. Vaulty's slideshow allows the ultimate hands-free viewing experience.

‚ñåFull Zoom
Zoom beyond pixel-to-pixel levels to fully enjoy the complete resolution of your pictures (& GIFs).

‚ñåVideo Format Support
Vaulty can play any video your device can handle and if there's a format your phone can't handle natively, Vaulty can securely display your video in third-party apps.

------------------------

comments: Customer service is very worst. I have registered one complaint more than 5 times. But no one is response. When I was restore my mobile all my images was lost. Only 50 images backup I got. I registered my complaint again and again. But I didn't get my lost images...

10/12/20 - This app used to work great, then Android 11 came. I am using a Pixel 2 device that otherwise works with everything. The app has really suffered in performance since the update. It takes a really long time to restore pics and videos back to the gallery, and at times I can't even find them once they are restored. It's a shame as the app used to work almost instantly and was great. - The fix mentioned below was because the app wouldn't even load, that was fixed.

This app has been amazing for 10 years straight! I can't believe it's been that long. Dear developer of this app, thank you for your attention to simplicity, detail and simply having the courage to not bloat this app over time! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

It does what it does. Would like the option to have data stored in the cloud only, and load pictures and videos when needed. More options in slideshow would be great (time per picture, randomize button more accessible).
Android 11 killed the app. Crashing, can't play my videos anymore, can never find my exports in my gallery. Please fix the issues with Android 11.

title: Thai recipes
description:
Thai recipes app offers you many tasty and quick recipes. These include stew recipes, snacks recipes, deep fried recipes, appetizer recipes, recipes, rice recipes, recipes for steamed and recipes for casserole.

Festive recipes
We have created the ultimate Thai recipes for¬† Chinese New year, American super bowl. Celebrate this season of romance with tasty valentines day recipe and much more. .

Popular traditional thai recipes of the month
Recipes like raspberry ice cream in a bag, asian vegetable broth, grilled chicken, griddled vegetables with melting aubergines, pelmeni, borscht, broccoli soup and no-bake peanut butter treats are popular in January & February.

Simple healthy thai recipe instructions with picture
Every thai food recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many light recipes for free in our Thai recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Thai recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite traditional thai recipes
Add your favourite healthy Thai recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved Thai food recipes offline. You can also create traditional thai recipe collections on the basis of dinner ideas, lunch ideas, vegetarian, cooking style, cuisine etc.

Healthy Thai Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for Thai food recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover traditional thai recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have healthy Thai recipes for people following vegetarian, keto, paleo and gluten-free diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have gluten-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, egg-free recipes, seafood-free recipes and lactose-free. Nutritional information like fat, calories, cholesterol and carbs are available in the Thai recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be easy and healthy with Thai recipes. Start eating Thai food recipes with proper meal planner ideas and grocery shopping list.

We offer lots of traditional thai recipes:
Cook tasty healthy Thai recipes at home using beef, low-salt soy sauce, cabbage & cloves of garlic. Recipes for classic Thai food dishes like tuscan skirt steak, pork belly slices, fish soup, baked spaghetti and bbq chorizo potato salad are available in the app. Our favourite traditional thai recipes include solyanka, creamy mushroom soup, korean chicken hotpot soup, and ukha.

Our healthy Thai recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for grilled, drink, cake etc. Now that you've our Thai food recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: Facebook
description:
Keeping up with friends is faster and easier than ever. Share updates and photos, engage with friends and Pages, and stay connected to communities important to you. 

Features on the Facebook app include:

* Connect with friends and family and meet new people on your social media network
* Set status updates & use Facebook emoji to help relay what‚Äôs going on in your world
* Share photos, videos, and your favorite memories.
* Get notifications when friends like and comment on your posts
* Find local social events, and make plans to meet up with friends
* Play games with any of your Facebook friends
* Backup photos by saving them in albums
* Follow your favorite artists, websites, and companies to get their latest news
* Look up local businesses to see reviews, operation hours, and pictures
* Buy and sell locally on Facebook Marketplace
* Watch live videos on the go


The Facebook app does more than help you stay connected with your friends and interests. It's also your personal organizer for storing, saving and sharing photos. It's easy to share photos straight from your Android camera, and you have full control over your photos and privacy settings. You can choose when to keep individual photos private or even set up a secret photo album to control who sees it.

Facebook also helps you keep up with the latest news and current events around the world. Subscribe to your favorite celebrities, brands, news sources, artists, or sports teams to follow their newsfeeds, watch live streaming videos and be caught up on the latest happenings no matter where you are!

The most important desktop features of Facebook are also available on the app, such as writing on timelines, liking photos, browsing for people, and editing your profile and groups. 

Now you can get early access to the next version of Facebook for Android by becoming a beta tester. Learn how to sign up, give feedback and leave the program in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/133NwuP 

Sign up directly here: 
http://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.facebook.katana

Problems downloading or installing the app? See http://bit.ly/GPDownload1
Still need help? Please tell us more about the issue. http://bit.ly/invalidpackage

Facebook is only available for users age 13 and over.
Terms of Service: http://m.facebook.com/terms.php.

comments: I could say a lot of things about Facebook and its' very interesting ways of getting zucced, but we are talking about the app itself so here we go: I'm quite used to Facebook app being heavy and full of glitches. But since one of the latest updates, I'm not able to save pictures to my phone. I click 'Save to phone', but it does not save. This is the only app that has this issue.

I Love it because I have found people that I haven't seen in decades. And you can really keep in touch your family and friends. Chat face to face. Especially with the Coivd 19 going. I just think Facebook is the best App. They have ever came out with. I don't think anything could ever top it. So I Just want to thank the Guy Who invented Facebook. Thank you So Very, Very, Very, Very Much. Sincerely Blanche Gilbert : Family, and Friends.

I can't even log on, it. Keep saying my notifications needed to be on, well I never turned it off. I've complained about the issue but I guess they made their money, so the hell with people who have a issue, I got so many people into this game, now I can't do anything Thanks for nothing , I'd give you 1/2 star, because I liked the game

The app works great unless you dare to say anything contrary to the liberal agenda. Expect a lot of censorship, revoking of advertising, and even blocking of your account if you express anything rightwing or moderate. Its a pity, because Facebook used to be a great place where all ideas could be shared and discussed. Now, you can only share and discuss PC ideas or face repercussions. Imagine such a structure when we discovered the earth was a sphere. Oh right. This is exactly what happened then.

The app has been constantly logging me out after the last few updates; and I just noticed today that uploaded videos don't get treated the same way as photos when it comes to privacy settings. Why can't I select my own audience for videos without having to delete them or forever have them accessible to everyone on my friends list? Especially if I use the profile video option, I like choosing my privacy for each post on my own.

comments: Love the app. But there is no way to see my blocked numbers. I blocked a number by accident and deleted the text conversation, and didn't have the number saved. I know it's a lot to process, but now I'm missing out on some income because I can't unblock, or find the number. The help guide isn't any help at all in this matter. Is this a premium function?

For me a good app. I recently changed phones to Samsung. It would not let me call or text anyone from my contact list even though i gave it permissiom. Thjs pissed me off. Contacting them is useless. The do not care. I figured out if i manually called the number and let it ring a couple of times, not answer this created a message in my inbox and i was able to text. It sucked till i figured this out. Now that i know the game i am happy. On another note. Only use this app with head phones

At first I was going to give this app between 4 and 5 stars. Now I am going to give it a two because all of a sudden the app is not working. It working fine yesterday. I can't dial out or send text messages. I was able to receive a missed call from my boyfriend. And my phone didn't even ring. What the hell this needs to be fixed. We have children at home and if something were to happen. I couldn't even reach anyone but 911. This is not COOL.

Had this app for a few months, had issues sending images and then was told to pay for my number or I would lose it. Chose to pay, and according to my Google account it was supposed to be a charge of $8.99, yet I was charged TWICE, one for $9.74 and another for $5.41. Total of $15.15. This is a scam.

Worked absolutely amazing for a year. No issues. Then recently it stopped working. Wont let me log into my account. Keeps freezing. Clearing cache & data did nothing. Uninstall & reinstall did nothing. Lost everything. Support is slow to respond. Incredibly disappointed.

title: CSID AR
description:
Through the power of augmented reality, you will get an inside look at Congenital Sucrase-Isomaltase Deficiency (CSID). CSID is a disorder that causes a reduction of the enzyme activity needed to break down and absorb table sugar (sucrose).

Toggle between a healthy digestive system and a CSID system. Take a close-up look at the inner wall of the small intestines and then zoom into the very surface of the microvilli, where the sucrase-isomaltase enzyme is expressed. CSID may include any or all of the following symptoms: chronic, watery diarrhea, gassiness, bloating, abdominal pain, and constipation. Symptoms can vary from mild to severe. Infants, children, and adults are all susceptible. Diagnosing CSID can be difficult because the symptoms are similar to several other, more common gastrointestinal disorders, including toddler‚Äôs diarrhea, IBS-D, celiac disease, or lactose intolerance.

Only your doctor can diagnose you. Share this app with your physician. No 3D glasses required!

title: WhatsApp Messenger
description:
WhatsApp from Facebook

WhatsApp Messenger is a FREE messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family. Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

WHY USE WHATSAPP:

‚Ä¢ NO FEES: WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family, so you don't have to pay for every message or call.* There are no subscription fees to use WhatsApp.

‚Ä¢ MULTIMEDIA: Send and receive photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

‚Ä¢ FREE CALLS: Call your friends and family for free with WhatsApp Calling, even if they're in another country.* WhatsApp calls use your phone's Internet connection rather than your cellular plan's voice minutes. (Note: Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. Also, you can't access 911 and other emergency service numbers through WhatsApp).

‚Ä¢ GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily stay in touch with your friends or family.

‚Ä¢ WHATSAPP WEB: You can also send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer's browser.

‚Ä¢ NO INTERNATIONAL CHARGES: There's no extra charge to send WhatsApp messages internationally. Chat with your friends around the world and avoid international SMS charges.*

‚Ä¢ SAY NO TO USERNAMES AND PINS: Why bother having to remember yet another username or PIN? WhatsApp works with your phone number, just like SMS, and integrates seamlessly with your phone's existing address book.

‚Ä¢ ALWAYS LOGGED IN: With WhatsApp, you're always logged in so you don't miss messages. No more confusion about whether you're logged in or logged out.

‚Ä¢ QUICKLY CONNECT WITH YOUR CONTACTS: Your address book is used to quickly and easily connect you with your contacts who have WhatsApp so there's no need to add hard-to-remember usernames.

Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

WHY USE WHATSAPP:

(Note: Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. Also, you can't access 911 and other emergency service numbers through WhatsApp).

‚Ä¢ GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily stay in touch with your friends or family.

title: MyFodmaps: IBS Diet Guide and Fodmap Food List
description:
How MyFodmaps Helps You
1. Quickly learn the basics, scientific benefits & drawbacks, and how to get started on a low fodmap diet.
2. Quickly refer to the fodmap levels food reference list any time you need to see what you can eat in order to stay avoid IBS symptoms such as gas, bloating, abdominal pain, and diarrhea.
3. Easily search recipes and meal prep ideas using in the recipes section.

What are FODMAPs? 
FODMAP is an acronym for fermentable oligo-, di-, mono-saccharides and polyols. These are basically all simple carbohydrates that can trigger digestive symptoms like gas, bloating, and stomach pain. Avoiding them is not always easy as they are found in all different types of foods, natural and processed. Additionally, some people are only triggered by one or two of the FODMAPs, not necessarily all of them. The diet focuses on avoiding all fodmaps that irritate your digestive system for a certain amount of time, and then reintroducing them gradually


Why? 
The biggest benefit of the low-FODMAP diet is reduction in IBS and digestive symptoms. This is not a diet targeted to lose weight or gain muscle, but for a higher quality of life from removing digestive issues.


MyFodmaps Diet Guide:
-The Basics: What are Fodmaps?
-The Benefits: Backed by scientific studies, not by fad homeopathic guru practitioners.
-Side-Effects of the Diet: Does an IBS diet such as this one cause problems long term?
-FAQ: Frequently asked questions about this gut healthy program.
-How to Get Started: The three stages explained: Restriction, Reintroduction, and Personalization.
-Food List: See 100s of different foods fodmap levels to see if they will affect your body
-1000s of low Fodmap Recipes
-Diet Translations for English, French, and Spanish


The information in this app is not intended to replace a one-on-one relationship with a qualified health care professional and is not intended as medical advice. MyFodmaps encourages you to make your own health care decisions based upon your research and in partnership with a qualified health care professional.

For Support Issues, please email us at prestigeworldwide.app@gmail.com

title: Diarrhea: Causes, Diagnosis, and Management
description:
Diarrhea, also spelled diarrhoea, is the condition of having at least three loose or liquid bowel movements each day. It often lasts for a few days and can result in dehydration due to fluid loss. Signs of dehydration often begin with loss of the normal stretchiness of the skin and irritable behaviour. This can progress to decreased urination, loss of skin color, a fast heart rate, and a decrease in responsiveness as it becomes more severe. Loose but non-watery stools in babies who are exclusively breastfed, however, are normal. 
The most common cause is an infection of the intestines due to either a virus, bacteria, or parasite ‚Äì a condition also known as gastroenteritis. These infections are often acquired from food or water that has been contaminated by feces, or directly from another person who is infected. The three types of diarrhea are: short duration watery diarrhea, short duration bloody diarrhea, and persistent diarrhea (lasting more than two weeks). The short duration watery diarrhea may be due to an infection by cholera, although this is rare in the developed world. If blood is present it is also known as dysentery. A number of non-infectious causes can result in diarrhea. These include lactose intolerance, irritable bowel syndrome, non-celiac gluten sensitivity, celiac disease, inflammatory bowel disease, hyperthyroidism, bile acid diarrhea, and a number of medications. In most cases, stool cultures to confirm the exact cause are not required. 
==========================
APP FEATURES
==========================
This exclusive app will help to understand the Diarrhea symptoms, Diarrhea Treatment, Diarrhea causes, Diarrhea diagnosis, Diarrhea Prognosis, Diarrhea Epidemiology and history. 
Here are features that make this app better than all other Diarrhea Disease apps - 
-	UI of app is very user responsive and easy to navigate. 
-	Easily Change the page.
-	Data of app is collected from various research reports.
-	You can access these favorites whenever you want.
-	Share your favorite benefits with your friends and family through email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, and WhatsApp.

All these features are available for free.

==========================

Our team are nonstop working hard on creation this app. Please feel free to review and email us for any questions/suggestions/complications. title: Allergy Analyzer
description:
Allergy Analyzer for smart phones aims to provide support in the search for relationships between allergic symptoms and contacts or influences from food, activities or situations.

Allergy Analyzer enables you to
- Analyze which combinations of allergic complaints and food, activities or situations (contacts) occur most often and make an analysis of the correlation between types of complaints and types of contacts
- Calculate the correlation coefficient of complaints and contacts that occur together
- Get a graphic insight into the occurrence over time of complaints and contacts
- Review and edit previously entered contacts and (allergic) complaints
- Select only categories of (allergic) complaints relevant to your situation to be shown in the app, or add new types of complaints
- Add your own types of food, activities or situations for which you want to register contacts in the app

Allergy Analyzer can be used in two modes:
- Quick scan: you enter date and time of complaints and contacts, and Allergy Analyzer presents for a chosen type of complaint, the number of combinations of complaints and contact types that occurred within a (user-selected) period of time after a contact, giving you an insight into which combinations of contacts and complaints occur most frequently;
- In-depth analysis: in addition to time of complaints and contacts, you also enter the amount or intensity of contacts and the intensity or severity of complaints, and Allergy Analyzer shows the correlation between types of contacts and complaint types (if at least five combinations are found of contacts and complaints), giving you an understanding of how the severity of complaints correlate with the amount or extent of contacts.

Allergy Analyzer is available in Dutch, English, French, German, Portuguese and Spanish.
This app does not provide medical advice nor does it substitute for medical advice. When experiencing allergic symptoms you are advised to contact a doctor.

Permissions:
- Internet access is only required to enable advertisements in the app.

title: Easy Vegetarian recipes by Recipeno (ENGLISH)
description:
Need inspiration for vegetarian recipes? Seeking simple, healthy & exciting recipes for your vegetarian diet? Download our free app, Easy Vegetarian Recipes by Recipeno! Our app includes 150 easy vegetarian recipes so far and more are added every month. Our recipes contain eggs & dairy, vegetables & fruits, nuts, seeds & grains, legumes and use honey, fruits & sugar-substitutes for sweetening. What's more, our recipes do not use white sugar and are soy-free.

Why Easy Vegetarian recipes by Recipeno: 

‚Ä¢ 150 vegetarian recipes - more added every month, with detailed nutritional information
‚Ä¢ Need to cook for more or less people? Just set the servings of a recipe to your needs
‚Ä¢ Don't know how to convert weight units? Simply, choose between gr or oz and all recipes will be displayed in your chosen unit
‚Ä¢ Don't know how much a teaspoon weighs? That's why all measurements are also presented in grams or oz
‚Ä¢ Do you have food allergies? All you have to do is to state your allergens, so to eliminate recipes containing them
‚Ä¢ Do you want ideas for snacks, desserts, pizzas and more? That's great, simply view recipes by meal type
‚Ä¢ How to keep track of the recipes you liked the most? Add them in your favourites list
‚Ä¢ How to keep track of the ingredients that you need to buy? Add them in your shopping list and and share it through apps in your device
‚Ä¢ Want to know how much time you will need for a recipe? Total recipe time is shown in recipes lists, and Prep & Cooking time is shown in each recipe
‚Ä¢ Don't you have access to the internet at all times? Don't worry, you can access our easy vegetarian recipes even if offline. You will just need the internet to update the app and receive new recipes

Here are some easy vegetarian recipes that your will find in our app:

Download our free app and cook your easy vegetarian recipes! Enjoy!

title: RxDiet: Food as Medicine
description:
RxDiet crafts hyper personalized family grocery / meal kits around your tastes, dietary restrictions, allergies and food waste all at the click of a button for as little as $3.00 per meal. Delivery is free with our $1.50/week membership. Save money, time, the environment and most importantly your body - eating with RxDiet.

We are on a mission to help you discover how personalised nutrition by dieticians, doctors and shoppers can make a substantial difference in living a happier and healthier life.

Treat medical conditions and reach dietary goals with customized grocery / meal kits:
- Just like Blue Apron, HelloFresh, Sun Basket, EveryPlate, Dinerly, Plated, Green Chef we send you the food you need for our recipes
- RxDiet allows you to choose from 3+ diets such as: Vegetarian and Vegan diets
- Choose from 8+ allergies including lactose intolerance, celiac disease, nut allergy
- Avoid ingredients that you may dislike, we will exclude them for you

- Save $2,000 a year in food waste and 140h a year in grocery shopping
- For medical conditions such as Diabetes, High Blood Pressure, Kidney failure and weight loss / sport performance our Doctors prescribe personalized nutritional treatment.

RxDiet Subscription includes:
- 7 day free trial

- Dietary preferences

- Nutrient information including: potassium, sodium, fiber, added sugar, saturated fat, unsaturated fat, and cholesterol to make sure you are hitting your daily targets
- Tracking based on your goals and/or treatment

To unsubscribe email us at membership@rx-diet.com

Terms and Privacy Policy: https://www.rx-diet.com/terms-and-conditions.html

title: Low FODMAP Diet
description:
FODMAP stands for‚Ä¶deep breath‚Ä¶Fermentable Oligosaccharides, Disaccharides, Monosaccharides, and Polyols.

And that‚Äôs science talk for a type of carbohydrate that‚Äôs hard to digest and found mainly in plant-based foods, dairy products, and sweeteners.

But just for the sake of thoroughness, let‚Äôs unpack this acronym one word at a time.

It starts with fermentable because these carbs ferment easily in the colon.

Then come three types of saccharides, which are sugar molecules found in foods.

Monosaccharides are often called simple sugars because they have a very simple structure. Mono means one and saccharide means sugar. So, one sugar.

The monosaccharides are‚Ä¶

# Glucose
Glucose is a type of sugar also known as blood sugar, which is found in our blood and produced from the food we eat (most dietary carbohydrates contain glucose, either as the sole form of sugar or combined with the other two simple sugars given above).

When people talk about ‚Äúblood sugar levels,‚Äù they‚Äôre talking about the amount of glucose floating around in the blood.

# Fructose
Fructose is a type of sugar naturally found in fruit, and also found in processed products like sucrose (table sugar) and high-fructose corn syrup, both of which are about 50% fructose and 50% glucose.

Fructose is converted into glucose by the liver and then released into the blood for use.

# Galactose
Galactose is a type of sugar found in dairy products and it‚Äôs metabolized similarly to fructose.

Oligosaccharides are molecules that contain several monosaccharides linked together in chain-like structures. Oligos is Greek for a few, so a ‚Äúfew‚Äù sugars.

These sugars are one of the components of fiber found in plants, which our bodies are able to partially break down into glucose (leaving the fibrous, indigestible parts behind to do good things in our guts).

Many vegetables also contain fructo-oligosaccharides, which are short chains of fructose molecules. These are metabolized accordingly (the ‚Äúchains‚Äù are broken and the individual fructose molecules are then converted into glucose for use).

Another common form of oligosaccharide that we eat is raffinose, which is comprised of a chain of galactose, glucose, and fructose (called a trisaccharide), and which can be found in beans, cabbage, brussels sprouts, broccoli,asparagus, other vegetables, and whole grains.

Galactooligosaccharides round out the list of oligosaccharides, and are short chains of galactose molecules. These are indigestible but play a role in stimulating healthy bacteria growth in the gut.

Disaccharides are molecules that‚Äôs composed of two monosaccarides .

Two common examples of disaccharides are milk sugar (lactose), which is made from glucose and galactose, and table sugar (sucrose), which is made from glucose and fructose.

Last but not least is the polyols, which are also called sugar alcohols, and which are a group of low-calorie, sweet carbs that can be substituted for table sugar.

If you recognize or suspect a chronic food intolerance may be inflicting you to feel this fashion ‚Äì and area unit determined to find precisely what those downside foods area unit ‚Äì this sample plan is for you.

The 7-Day Low FODMAP Diet set up for IBS could be a Dietician-made set up that helps you briefly eliminate FODMAPs from your diet, that area unit an established trigger of Irritable viscous Syndrome (IBS).

Before you start this type Low FODMAP diet, you should ask your personal doctor or dietician first. Choose water as your drink (Consume less sugar intake). This meal plan is high restrictive and temporary. It is not appropriate for certain medical conditions. Prepare all foods yourself at home where possible. Keep a food diary.

This app makes identification of high and low FODMAP foods easier to assist you together with your FODMAP friendly diet. this may be useful in reducing symptoms for folks with IBS, Irritable intestine Syndrome, Crohn's disease, Colitis, hereditary disease and numerous alternative food intolerances, food sensitivities, and abdomen issues.

comments: Never able to play more than 2-3 rounds. The winnings never get close to the cost of playing. First time I get a coin bonus of spin wheel. I try to play 4 cards with Max bet as it recommend. Before I even enter the bingo room. The game crashes when I come back. There's no pending game and my coins are gone! Of course nobody respond to you!

I am giving it 5 stars as overall it seems like a fantastic Bingo game.. The ONE thing that I DISLIKE is not being able to add friends in the game. "Someone sitting on a commode in the Sahara Desert could be in the fans group". One never knows. I added friends from the fan page in another Bingo game and got hacked quite frequently. PLEASE address this. Otherwise thanks to the developers for a.great game!

Would not recommend. This is a money game. You can NOT play more than a few games. The task you are ask to do are to the extreme. You can NOT progress in this game. They ask you for email to send bonuses. Which don't get. They say to like their Facebook to receive bonuses. They don't post you any. You might get two bingos a day. If you actually want to play for a bit. You have to save for over a week to do so. You are asked to add people. But you are limited to 5 gifts ever 6 hours. Rip Off!!

I received 6 pop-ups in a row trying to get me to spend money on the game. 6!!! While I can understand needing money to support the game, this game is excessively bad with annoyances. Game is purposely built so you run out of chips to spend no matter the amount you bet. It's just a program that asks for your money with the facade of being a game.

I really like the game ... But I am having trouble with inviting people onto the game ... It keeps sending me to some kinda mobile log in to Facebook and when I want to change password it sends it to a different fb account that I had forgotten about over ten years ago... Plus it is connected to my fb that I use now ... Could you please help

title: FREE NOW (mytaxi) - Taxi Booking App
description:
FREE NOW (formerly mytaxi) is a licensed ride-hailing app for taxis in 10 European countries. Book easily, pay in-app quickly and complete your trip safely!

HOW IT WORKS
1. Enter your destination
2. Book a taxi near you
3. Track your taxi driver's arrival
4. Pay your fare easily through the app

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Prebook a taxi up to 4 days in advance (e.g. for an airport transfer)
‚Ä¢ Hassle-free in-app payment with your credit card
‚Ä¢ Share your ride so friends and family know where you are
‚Ä¢ Rate your driver and let others know how much you enjoyed your taxi ride
‚Ä¢ Save your home and work addresses and book a taxi even faster

SIMPLIFY YOUR BUSINESS TRIPS
Automatically collect your receipt by email after each trip paid through the app or skip manual expense reportings after each business trips by using a FREE NOW business account.

EASY AIRPORT TRANSFER
Book a cab last minute or up to 4 days before your flight. Do you need a pickup? No problem, just collect your luggage, order a cab with our app and follow the in-app walking directions to the FREE NOW pickup point within your Terminal.
FREE NOW is available for both business and holiday travel at Europe's largest airports, including: London Heathrow/City/Gatwick/Stansted, Dublin, Frankfurt, Madrid-Barajas, Barcelona El-Prat, Munich, Rome Fiumicino, Manchester, Lisbon, D√ºsseldorf, Vienna Schwechat, Milano Malpensa, Berlin Tegel and Malaga.

BOOK THE RIGHT TAXI FOR YOU
Taxi XL: Cab with more than 4 seats (vans)
Taxi Wheelchair: Accessible cabs
Taxi Eco: Eco-friendly taxis with electric, gas or hybrid drive
Exec: Luxury cab for business passengers (only in Dublin & Cork)
Match: Share a cab and travel expenses (available in Limerick, Warsaw, Hamburg and Dublin)

SHARE YOUR TAXI EXPERIENCE
Invite friends and family to try out FREE NOW with your personal gift code which you can find in the app and earn credits for your next cab ride.

TRAVEL ALL OVER EUROPE
The FREE NOW cab service is available across 9 countries in around 100 European cities, among them:
UNITED KINGDOM: Brighton, Edinburgh, London, Manchester, Nottingham, Oxford, Reading, Derby, Leicester
IRELAND: Cork, Dublin, Galway, Limerick, Waterford
GERMANY: Aachen, Augsburg, Berlin, Bochum, Bonn, Bremen, Cologne, Dortmund, Dresden, D√ºsseldorf, Duisburg, Essen, Erlangen, Frankfurt, Gelsenkirchen, Hamburg, Hannover, Ingolstadt, Leipzig, L√ºbeck, Mannheim, Munich, M√ºlheim/Ruhr, Nuremberg, Offenbach, Potsdam, Stuttgart, Westerland (Sylt), Wiesbaden
AUSTRIA: Salzburg, Vienna
POLAND: Katowice/Silesian Agglomeration, Krakow, Poznan, Tricity (Gdansk/Sopot/Gdynia), Warsaw, Wroc≈Çaw
ITALY: Milan, Rome, Turin
PORTUGAL: Lisbon, Porto
SPAIN: Barcelona, Madrid, Sevilla, Valencia
ROMANIA: Bucharest

FREE NOW (formerly mytaxi) and Hailo joined forces in 2016 to keep you moving as UK's and Ireland's leading taxi and app.

SUPPORT
If you have any questions, please visit the help & contact section of the app (via your profile) to see our most frequently asked questions. Alternatively, please get in touch at uk.support@free-now.com in the UK, or ireland.support@free-now.com in Ireland.

title: Prize Claw
description:
Introducing PRIZE CLAW!

For years, you've been going to arcades and carnivals, trading quarters for the chance to grab toys and candy with a motorized claw. Claw games are filled with tense moments of wondering if the claw will drop your prize, coupled with the triumph of finally receiving it! PRIZE CLAW recreates that experience for your Android while adding many exciting new features! 

Step up to the machine and maneuver the claw to grab coins, gems, stuffed animals, cars, dolls, and so many more! This claw game is much more than the standard grabbing you get from arcade machines, however: PRIZE CLAW is filled with all sorts of unique items, powerful effects and challenging missions. Special gems grant you bonuses to enhance your collection power, and you can trade the prizes you collect for extra special bonuses. Tons of prizes aren't the only thing you can trade in: All the coins you collect can be spent to upgrade your claw, activate your unique powers and even customize your machine! If you run out of grabs, don't fret! It won't take long before you receive more. Keep checking back to complete your collection and unlock more stuff!

Features:
- More than 60 prizes to collect!
- Multiple machines to play on with different prizes, powers and looks!
- A special puzzle to complete for each machine!
- New 3D graphics with customizable machines, claws and joysticks!
- Simple to play but with tons of missions to challenge your skills!
- Earn more bonuses for playing every day!
- Huge variety of bonuses and effects!

Check back for future updates!

NOW AVAILABLE: PRIZE CLAW 2 - Check it out!

Prize Claw is a free game that is supported by the ads we and others display. To do this, we work with a variety of online advertising partners who collect data from users of our games and other games to show you ads that are relevant to your interests. Do not install or launch our games unless you consent to this use and sharing of data, as further explained in our Privacy Policy (http://gamecircus.com/privacy-policy/).

title: Calcium Calculator‚Ñ¢
description:
Do you get enough calcium from the foods you eat? How do you know?
Calcium Calculator is an easy way to assess, compare, and make a plan to eat better.

Key App Functions:

- Find out your daily calcium requirements
- Assess your calcium intake from food
- Learn how to get more calcium from foods you love, including meal and snack ideas.
- Create a personalized plan to improve your diet
- Get daily reminders to put your plan into action

Calcium Calculator is a quick and easy tool for assessing your calcium intake, and making a plan to make sure you‚Äôre getting enough! You can also explore what foods have calcium, and determine which foods you enjoy contain the most calcium.

This app is free with no ads, because we think tools to support health should be available to everyone.

Did you know?
- Many people do not get enough calcium in their diets.
- People who have low calcium intake throughout life are more likely to suffer from osteoporosis, and have a higher chance of breaking bones. (Osteoporosis Canada, 2010, 2014; Health Canada, 2018).
- Experts recommend getting calcium from food first, rather than supplements.
- Getting enough calcium from food can also indicate a healthy diet in general (Rafferty and others, 2011), and calcium is a key nutrient in the DASH‚ÄîDietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension‚Äîdiet (Sacks and others, 2001)

Do you follow a special diet?
- Calcium Calculator uses a validated food list including a wide variety of foods‚Äîvegetables, milk products, plant-based protein and more! Research suggests that focusing on food, instead of calories, is better for long term health. So, whether you have an allergy or are following a keto, vegan or heart healthy style of eating, Calcium Calculator can work for you.

Are you a doctor, dietitian, nurse, physiotherapist or other health care clinician?
- Use Calcium Calculator with your patients or clients to follow up between appointments‚Äîso they can sustain healthy habits.
- Show clients how to assess and plan for optimal health using the new demo mode. To use, select "More", then "Show how this app works"

Calcium Calculator was developed by Registered Dietitians (RD), based on an educational behaviour change model, and is a validated assessment tool to determine calcium adequacy.
Learn more here: https://bcdairy.ca/nutritioneducation/articles/the-calcium-calculator-now-a-mobile-app

Maybe I missed something. Also it mislabeled milk is having 300 mg of calcium when it only has 250. It also mislabeled almond milk is having 250 when it actually has 450. Can you look into this please thank you so much.

While registering, after completing yesterday's food diary, the app freezes up. Tried uninstalling & reinstalling it 3 times. So frustrating because my health coach highly recommends! My phone is Android - Samsung Galaxy Note 10. Thank you.
It is ok. But the database of food items is very very limited. It should have more common fruits and vegetablea and non veg included.
Creating an action plan froze up on me also. It gets through the first page and then doesn't allow moving on to the second page. LG G8 Android 9
The database of food items is.very limited. It should include all the common fruits and vegetables
